79b8('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sngon gyi
80a1('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po
80a2('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
80a3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po myed
80a4('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos po mye/ da pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so// 
80a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigaso// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
80a6('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba rnams dbus
80a7('bum): su myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dbus
80a8('bum): su myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dbang po rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dbang po rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dbang po rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol
80b1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ stobs rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// stobs rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// stobs rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi
80b2('bum): lag rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags
80b3('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dbus su myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol
80b4('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so// 
80b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan rnams phyin mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ 
80b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad myed pa rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chad myed pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
80b7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
80b8('bum): pa rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thard pa brgyad dbus su
81a1('bum): myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu phyi ma'i
81a2('bum): mtharang myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dbus su myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed
81a3('bum): pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa dbus
81a4('bum): su myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa rnams
81a5('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzind rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ting nge/ 'dzin rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin nas
81a6('bum): dus su myi dmyigs so/ shes rab kyil rol tu byin pa la spyod pa gsus kyi sgornams sngon gyim par myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi ston phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo nasus dbus su
81a7('bum): myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu phyi ma'i mthur myi dmyigs so// de bzhin
81a8('bum): gagags pa'i stobs bcu dbus su myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu byond pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myi 'jigs pa bani sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa bzhi phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs
81b1('bum): pa bzhi dbus su myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag/ 
81b2('bum): par rig pa bzhi dbus su myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po sngon gyi mthar gyi dmyigs so// byams pa chen po phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// byams pa chen po
81b3('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stod ngani rtse/ snying rje chen po sngon gyimapar myi dmyigs so// snying rje chen po phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// snying rje chen po dbus su myi dmyigs so/ shes pa/ 
81b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// 
81b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dbus su myi dmyig so// shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thams su sa b+ha nyid ston gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bzlas pa nas/ 
81b6('bum): pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bams cud shes pa nyid dbus su mI dmyigs so// shes rabA k+Shi pa mang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i rgyu/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ 
81b7('bum): sa rnam du zhes pa nyid bye ma'i ma par myi dmyigs so// las sbyin ma shes pa nyid dngas su myi dmyims so// shes rab kyi pa du tu sbyin pa la spyod pa'i / rnam pa thams sa myed du panyi don
81b8('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhye nang pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das
82a1('bum): la 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni zab bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi
82a2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab po/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
82a3('bum): zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab bo ka sha
82a4('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha da rol tu phyind pa zab bo/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i de bzhin nyid zag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu
82a5('bum): sna'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab kho// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i
82a6('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold
82a7('bum): tu phyind pa zab bo/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu sgra'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu dri'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
82a8('bum): ro'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg gi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos kyi de bzhin nyid zab yi/ 
82b1('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes/ 
82b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i rnam par shes pa'i bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab
82b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab
82b4('bum): kyi pha ro lda tu phyinang pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zab bo sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir
82b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol / tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
82b6('bum): bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg
82b7('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu na
82b8('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
83a1('bum): tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor
83a2('bum): ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
83a3('bum): sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ga rang ti'i bu chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu mye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ 
83a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khamams kyi de bzhin nyid/ 
83a5('bum): zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa'i de
83a6('bum): bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa phab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i/ 
83a7('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes
83a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab po/ 
83b1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu sred pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lend pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu srid pa'i de bzhin
83b2('bum): nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rga shi'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
83b3('bum): ba zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi
83b4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin
83b5('bum): nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa// ti'i bu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
83b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
83b7('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid stong pa
83b8('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de
84a1('bum): bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab bo/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu
84a2('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
84a3('bum): ba zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
84a4('bum): rol de tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dA ti'i bu chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir
84a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi
84a6('bum): de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab bo/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngo bo nyid
84a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
84a8('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang dag par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rdzu 'phrul
84b1('bum): gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu dbang po'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu stobs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir
84b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid
84b3('bum): zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i
84b4('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshad dmyed pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
84b5('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu mthar/ 
84b6('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid
84b7('bum): zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzind kyi de bzhin nyid zab
84b8('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i de bzhin
85a1('bum): gnyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab boka sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab bo/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i de/ 
85a2('bum): bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab bo/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
85a3('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
85a4('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab bo// gsol pa/ bcom
85a5('bum): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa gting dpag dka'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal paka sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs/ gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting
85a6('bum): dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'bye shes gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
85a7('bum): gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'oka sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
85a8('bum): gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba' gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa gting dpag dka'o/ 
85b1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dga'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
85b2('bum): lus gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs gting
85b3('bum): dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu sgra gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu dri gting dpag dka' ba'i
85b4('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'oka sha ra dwa ti'i bu ro gting dpag dga' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg gting dpag
85b5('bum): dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi rnam par
85b6('bum): shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag
85b7('bum): dka'oka sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes
85b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam
86a1('bum): par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa gting / 
86a2('bum): dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
86a3('bum): phyi nad pa gting dpag dkag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dra ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir
86a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o / ke sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/ dend pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg
86a5('bum): pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
86a6('bum): rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba gting
86a7('bum): dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa gting dpag dko'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
86a8('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// 
86b1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu chu'i khams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu mye'i khams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra/ 
86b2('bum): dra ti'i bu rlung gi khams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa
86b3('bum): ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i khams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dra ti'i bu ma rig pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra tra
86b4('bum): ti'i bu 'du byed gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag raka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// 
86b5('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu mying dang gzugs gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched drug gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
86b6('bum): gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o/ ga ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag
86b7('bum): dka'o// ga ra dwa ti'i bu sred pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lend pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// 
86b8('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu srid pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i/ 
87a1('bum): 6bu rga shi gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka 'og shA ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// 
87a2('bum): sha ra dra ti'i bu chu la khrims kyi pha rol da tu phyi nad pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa gting dpag dka'o/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes
87a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dra ti'i bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'osha ra dra ti'i khu bsam
87a4('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dra ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa gting dpag dka' ba'i
87a5('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa/ ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi stong
87a6('bum): kha nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi nang stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// 
87a7('bum): ga ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting pag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu chen po stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
87a8('bum): tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu don dam pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus byas stong pa nyid gting dpag
87b1('bum): dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu mtha' las 'das/ 
87b2('bum): ba stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o
87b3('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang bzhin stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin
87b4('bum): pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad stong pa nyid gti dang dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa gting dang dag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
87b5('bum): gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gting dab ga dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting rabs
87b6('bum): dka'o ga ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi
87b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o// shwa ra d+hU ti'i bu dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag
87b8('bum): gting dpag dka' ba'i phyiraro shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o ka sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang dag par spong ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa
88a1('bum): ti'i bu rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dra ti'i bu dbang po gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o
88a2('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu stobs gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi yan lag gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o
88a3('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i la ma ya na lag brgyad pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dra ti'i bu 'phags pa'i bden pa gting dpag dka' bI phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang
88a4('bum): ba gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra d+ha/ ti'i bu tshad myed pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold
88a5('bum): tu phyi nad pa gting dpag dka'o/ sha ra dra ti'i bu gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyi nad pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i rnam par tha rad pa brgyad
88a6('bum): gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o
88a7('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu mngon par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i
88a8('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin gting dpag dkara' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa gting dpag dka'o/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs kyi sgo gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir
88b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi 'jigs pa bzhi gting
88b2('bum): dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu snying rje chen
88b3('bum): po gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// 
88b4('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu thams cad shes pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dra ti'i bu lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi
88b5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha ro lad tu phyind pa gting dpag dka'o// gsol da pas/ bcom
88b6('bum): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ched ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba tshang
88b7('bum): myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa
88b8('bum): tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba tshad myed
89a1('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chang myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce chad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
89a2('bum): phyind pa chad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus chad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid chad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa chad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 
89a3('bum): gzugs tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu sgra tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu dri chad myed pa'i phyir shes
89a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu ro chad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa tri'i bu reg tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
89a5('bum): tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos tshad myed pa'i phyir shes/ rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi/ rnam par shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
89a6('bum): byinang pa chad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i burna ba'i rnam par shes pa ched myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i rnam par shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
89a7('bum): tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i rnam par shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi rnam par shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
89a8('bum): tu phyin pa chad byed do// shar dwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam par shes pa chang myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa chad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa chad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol / 
89b1('bum): tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin
89b2('bum): pa tshang myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
89b3('bum): chad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab
89b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i// 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab da kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i
89b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba tshad myed pa'i
89b6('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid
89b7('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa tshad myed// 
89b8('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu chu'i khams tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu mye'i khams tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra tra
90a1('bum): ti'i bu rlung gi khams tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa tI'i bu nam mkha'i khams chud myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed
90a2('bum): ya shar dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i khams chad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha ro long tu phyind pa ched myed do// shar dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa chad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa chad byed do// shAr dwa ti'i
90a3('bum): 'dra byeb byed pa'i phyi nas rab kyi ba royo tu byin pas ca'o// na ti'i burnam pabanas papar byed pa'i phyi gas rab kyi la ros tu byin pa car byed do// ar ni ti'i phying dang gzugs cad byed pa'i/ 
90a4('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa tshad myed do// sha raHti'i bu skye mched drug tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ dpa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes/ 
90a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i du tshor ba tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu sred pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
90a6('bum): tu byind pa chad byed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lend pa myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa changad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu srid pa chad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rogang tu phyind pa chad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
90a7('bum): rga shi tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshul khrims
90a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa tiH/ 
90b1('bum): bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa chang/ 
90b2('bum): myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do// 
90b3('bum): shar dwa ti'i bu phyi stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi nang stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa
90b4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid chad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu chen po stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
90b5('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus byas stong pa nyid tshad/ myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// 
90b6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu mtha' las 'di sa pa stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
90b7('bum): pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nang pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
90b8('bum): patshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed// 
91a1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// 
91a2('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
91a3('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
91a4('bum): yang dag par spong ba tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
91a5('bum): dbang po tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu stobs tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi yan lag tshad myed
91a6('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed dog sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i bden pa tshad myed pa'i phyir
91a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan chad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu chang myed pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
91a8('bum): tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par tha rad pa brgyad chad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
91b1('bum): pa tshad myed dog sha ra dwa ti'i bu mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa
91b2('bum): dang smon pa myed pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu mngon par shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzind chad myed
91b3('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs kyi sgo tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu tshad myed pa'i
91b4('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa chad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi 'jigs pa bzhi tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu so so yang dag par rig
91b5('bum): ba bzhi chad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa nad myed do/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu snying rje chen po tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi
91b6('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad chad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu thams cad shes pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lam gyi rnam
91b7('bum): pa shes pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do// 
92a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po bdun pa'o// / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
92a2('bum): riyang tu byin pa la spyod pa lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe / gal te gzugs zab ces bya bar gyi/ 
92a3('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'du shes zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ 
92a4('bum): gal te 'du byed zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myig zab
92a5('bum): ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal ten bzab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te snga zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
92a6('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod do ltagal te lus zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang ba la spyod do// gal te gzugs zab
92a7('bum): ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sbal ba ces bya bar gyi spyod na shes rab kyi ba ro gang tu phyin pa la spyod ngo do// gal te dri bab ces bya bar gyi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpa/ 
92a8('bum): baspyod do/ gal te ro bab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spod do// gal te reg pa pa ces bya ba ba myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro la tu phyid pa la spyod ngo // gas te chos zab ces bya
92b1('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myig gi rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes/ 
92b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
92b3('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa lta zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
92b4('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa zab cezhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// dgal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi
92b5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi
92b6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
92b7('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zab ces
92b8('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg
93a1('bum): pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol de tu phyind pa
93a2('bum): la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sa'i khams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa
93a3('bum): la spyod do// gal te chu'i khams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mye'i khams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rlung gi khams
93a4('bum): zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ la spyod do// gal te nam mkha'i khams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes
93a5('bum): pa'i khams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol de tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ma rig pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed zab
93a6('bum): ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mying dang gzugs zab ces bya bar myi spyod/ 
93a7('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te skye mched drug zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gald te reg pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
93a8('bum): pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sred pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lend pa zab ces
93b1('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te srid pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te skye ba zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
93b2('bum): ba la spyod do/ gal te rga shi zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do
93b3('bum): ga lad te tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod/ 
93b4('bum): gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
93b5('bum): phyind pa la spyod do// gal te shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind/ pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te nang stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
93b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te phyi stong pa nyid ze ba ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
93b7('bum): phyind pa la spyod do// gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chen po stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
93b8('bum): la spyod do// gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// 
94a1('bum): gald te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
94a2('bum): spyod do// gal te thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// 
94a3('bum): gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rang gi mtshan
94a4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po myed
94a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po myed
94a6('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yang dag par
94a7('bum): spong ba rnams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dbang po rnams zab ces bya
94a8('bum): bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te stobs rnams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
94b1('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha/ 
94b2('bum): rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te bsam gtan rnams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te tshad myed pa rnams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do
94b3('bum): gal te gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par tha rad pa brgyad zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// 
94b4('bum): gal te mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zab ces bya bar/ myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa la spyod do// gal te rnam/ par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed
94b5('bum): ba zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mngon par shes pa rnams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ting nge 'dzind rnams
94b6('bum): zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zab ces bya
94b7('bum): bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myi 'jigs pa bzhi zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zab ces bya bar myi spyod na
94b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te snying rje chen po zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes
95a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te thams cad shes pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod
95a2('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi zab pa nyid gang
95a3('bum): yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin no// 'du shes kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'du shes ma yin no// 'du byed kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'du byed ma yin no// 
95a4('bum): rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// myig gi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni myig ma yin no/ rna ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rna ba ma yin no// sna'i zab pa nyid
95a5('bum): gang yin pa de ni sna ma yin no// lce'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni lce ma yin no// lus kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni lus ma yin no yid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni yid ma yin no// gzugs kyi
95a6('bum): zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// sgra'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sgra ma yin no// dri'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni dri ma yin no// ro'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni ro ma yin no// reg gi zab
95a7('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa de ni reg ma yin no// chos kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni chos ma yin no// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni myig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// rna ba'i rnam par
95a8('bum): shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang
95b1('bum): yin pa de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni yid kyi rnam par
95b2('bum): shes pa ma yin no// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// sna'i 'dus
95b3('bum): te reg pa'i zab pa'i nyid gang yin pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni
95b4('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa
95b5('bum): de ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba ma yin no/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba ma yin no// sna'i
95b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
95b7('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i zab
95b8('bum): be nyid gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no// sa'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams ma yin no// chu'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni chu'i khams ma yin// 
96a1('bum): mye'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mye'i khams ma yin no// rlung gi khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khams ma yin no// nam mkha'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i khams
96a2('bum): ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no// ma rig pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa ma yin no// 'du byed kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'du byed ma
96a3('bum): yin no// rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// mying dang gzugs kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mying dang gzugs ma yin no// skye mched drug gi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni skye mched drug
96a4('bum): ma yin no// reg pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni reg pa ma yin no// tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin no// sred pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sred pa ma yin no// len pa'i zab pa
96a5('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni lend pa ma yin no// srid pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni srid pa ma yin no// skye ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni skye ba ma yin no// rga shi'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rga shi ma
96a6('bum): yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin nog/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no/ 
96a7('bum): ma pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i bab pa nyid gang yin pa de 'thod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// brtson 'grus bya tu pha rol tu phyin pa'i bab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pas yin
96a8('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// 
96b1('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// phyi stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// 
96b2('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni don
96b3('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// mtha' las 'das
96b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nga nyid ma yin no// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// dor ba myed
96b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no// chos thos cad stong pa nyid kyi zab pa
96b6('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni myi
96b7('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// 
96b8('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no// yang dag
97a1('bum): par spong ba rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no// dbang po rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni
97a2('bum): dbang po rnams ma yin no// stobs rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni stobs rnams ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnas kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i
97a3('bum): zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no// bsam gtan rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni bsam
97a4('bum): gtan rnams ma yin no// tshad myed pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa/ de ni tshad tu myed pa rnams ma yin no// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par/ 'jug pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
97a5('bum): par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no// rnam par thard pa brgyad kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ma yin no// mtha ra kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mthar kyis
97a6('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa ma yin
97a7('bum): no// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni ting nge 'dzind rnams ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni
97a8('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin no// myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni myi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin no// so so yang
97b1('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no// snying rje chen po'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni snying rje chen po yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs
97b2('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no// thams cad shes pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gang yin pa de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no// rnam pa
97b3('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te
97b4('bum): gzugs gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'du
97b5('bum): shes gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te
97b6('bum): rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myig gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal
97b7('bum): te rna ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sna gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod no shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lce gting dpag dka'
97b8('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ 
98a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sgra gting dpag dga' zhes bya bar myi spyod na
98a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dri gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ro gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi
98a3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te reg gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te chos gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
98a4('bum): tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te myig gi rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind dpa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gting
98a5('bum): dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// 
98a6('bum): gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang/ 
98a7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa gting pag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi
98a8('bum): srung ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te snga'i 'dus te reg pa gtong / 
98b1('bum): dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus
98b2('bum): te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ 
98b3('bum): gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka'
98b4('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gral te sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// 
98b5('bum): gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis
98b6('bum): tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sa'i khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// 
98b7('bum): gal te chu'i khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mye'i khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
98b8('bum): la spyod do// gal te rlung gi khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te nam mkha'i khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes
99a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ma rig pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar
99a2('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na
99a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te mying dang gzugs gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te skye mched drug gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na
99a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes
99a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sred pa gting dpag dka 'a zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lend pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes
99a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te srid pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te skye ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
99a7('bum): phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rga shi gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
99a8('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya
99b1('bum): bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka' ba zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te bsam gtan gyi ba
99b2('bum): rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa/ 
99b3('bum): la spyod do// gal te nang stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te phyi stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa
99b4('bum): la spyod do// gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te stong panyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes
99b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dog/ gal te chen po stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka'
99b6('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
99b7('bum): gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te
99b8('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa lnga
100a1('bum): shAg gaslong do / gal te rang ba'in stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar gyi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar gyi spyod na shos rab kyi
100a2('bum): rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod do// gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi
100a3('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gting
100a4('bum): dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang da pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyidagating dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
100a5('bum): pa la spyod do// gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams gting dpag dka' zhe
100a6('bum): bye bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dbang po rnams gting
100a7('bum): dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te stobs rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te byang chub kyi yan lag
100a8('bum): rnams gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
100b1('bum): spyod do cha gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te bsam gtan rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
100b2('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te tshad myed pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya
100b3('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par tha rang pa brgyad gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mtha ra kyis gnas pa'i
100b4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa gting dpag
100b5('bum): dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la/ spyod do// gal te mngon par shes pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// 
100b6('bum): gal te ting nge 'dzi nad rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
100b7('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myi 'jigs pa bzhi gting dpag dka' zhes bya/ 
100b8('bum): bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te snying rje chen po
101a1('bum): gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi
101a2('bum): pharol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te thams cad shes pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lam gyi rnamo pa shes pa nyid
