101a3('bum): gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir
101a4('bum): zhe naka sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin no// 'du shes kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin
101a5('bum): ba de ni 'du shes ma yin no// 'du byed kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin/ ba de ni 'du byed ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// myig gi
101a6('bum): gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni myig ma yin no// na ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rna ba ma yin no// sna'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni snga ma yin no// lce'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni
101a7('bum): lce ma yin no// lus kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni lus ma yin no// yid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni yid ma yin no// gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// 
101a8('bum): sgra'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni sgra ma yin no// dri'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni dri ma yin no// ro'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni ro ma yin no// reg gi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa
101b1('bum): de ni reg ma yin no// chos kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni chos ma yin no// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni myig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i gting
101b2('bum): dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang
101b3('bum): yin pa de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni yid kyi rnam
101b4('bum): par shes pa ma yin no// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni
101b5('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni lde'i
101b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg
101b7('bum): ba ma yin no// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i gting dpag
101b8('bum): dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no// 
101b9('bum): phyi'i rgyas te rkyen kyim tshoragating bag da/ gang yin palce'i 'dus te ba'i rgyam tshor ba ma yin no/ 
102a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba sa gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa
102a2('bum): de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba ma yin no// sa'i khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams ma yin no// chu'i khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni chu'i khams ma yin no// 
102a3('bum): mye'i khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni mye'i khams ma yin no// rlung gi khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khams ma yin no// nam mkha'i khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni
102a4('bum): nam mkha'i khams ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi dgating dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no// ma rig pa gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa ma
102a5('bum): yin no// 'du byed kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni 'du byed ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// mying dang gzugs kyi gting dpag
102a6('bum): dka' ba gang yin pa de ni mying dang gzugs ma yin no// skye mched drug gi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni skye mched drug ma yin no// reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni reg pa ma yin no// tshor ba'i gting
102a7('bum): dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin no// sred pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni sred pa ma yin no// lend pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni lend pa ma yin no// srid pa'i gting dpag
102a8('bum): dka' ba gang yin pa de ni srid pa ma yin nog skye ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni skye ba ma yin no// rga shi'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rga shi ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i gting dpag
102b1('bum): dka' ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyi nad pa ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad
102b2('bum): pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin no// bsam gtan
102b3('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
102b4('bum): ba ma yin no// nang stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin ba de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// phyi stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag
102b5('bum): dka' ba gang yin pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba
102b6('bum): gang yin pa de ni chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ 
102b7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin
102b8('bum): ba de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag
103a1('bum): dka' ba gang yin pa de ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rab bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi gting
103a2('bum): dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba yin pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
103a3('bum): kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
103a4('bum): kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma
103a5('bum): yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma yin no// yang dag par spong ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yI ba deni yang dge bar spong ba ma yin no
103a6('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ma yin no// dbang po'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni dbang po ma yin no// stobs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni stobs ma yino// 
103a7('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag gi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag ma yin no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no
103a8('bum): legs pa'i bden pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa ma yin no// bsam gtan gyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan ma yin no// chad myed pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang
103b1('bum): yin pa de ni chang myed pa ma yin no// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ma yin no// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang
103b2('bum): yin pa de ni rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ma yin no// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no// rnam par thard par
103b3('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa ma yin no// mngon par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba
103b4('bum): gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa ma yin no// ting nge 'dzi nad kyi gting dang ga dka' ba gang yin pa de ni ting nge 'dzind ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni gzungs kyi sgom
103b5('bum): yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma yin no// myi 'jigapa bzhi'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa/ de ni myi 'jigs
103b6('bum): ba bzhi ma yin no// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma yin no// snying rje chen po'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni snying rje chen po ma yin no// 
103b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma yin no// thams cad shes pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni thams cad
103b8('bum): shes pa nyid ma yin no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams/ 
104a1('bum): byag cad ma khyend pa nyid ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshig gal te gzugs chad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi/ 
104a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du shes tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ 
104a3('bum): gal te 'du byed tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myig tshad
104a4('bum): myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sna tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod
104a5('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lce tshad myed do/ zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lus tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
104a6('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// 
104a7('bum): gal te sgra tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dri tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ro tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na
104a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te reg tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te chos tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// 
104b1('bum): gal te myig gi rnam par shes pa chad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa chad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
104b2('bum): gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te
104b3('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa chad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal
104b4('bum): te myig gi 'dus te reg pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
104b5('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
104b6('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
104b7('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba tshad myed do zhes bya
104b8('bum): bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
105a1('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba chad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
105a2('bum): la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba chad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sa'i khams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
105a3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod dog/ gal te chu'i khams chad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mye'i khams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// 
105a4('bum): gal te rlung gi khams chad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te nam mkha'i khams chad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// 
105a5('bum): gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed tshad myed do/ zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la/ 
105a6('bum): spyod do// gal te 'du byed tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te
105a7('bum): mying dang gzugs tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te skye mched drug chad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te reg pa tshad myed
105a8('bum): do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba chad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te sred pa chad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes
105b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lend pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// ga lad te srid pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
105b2('bum): pa la spyod do// gal te skye ba tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rga shi tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sbyin pa'i
105b3('bum): pha rolang tu phyi nang pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ 
105b4('bum): gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes
105b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu
105b6('bum): phyind pa tshang myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te nang stong pa nyid chad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te phyi stong pa nyid chang
105b7('bum): myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid chad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid tshang
105b8('bum): myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te chen po stong pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid
106a1('bum): tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus ma byas
106a2('bum): stong pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te
106a3('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
106a4('bum): spyod do// gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshad myed do shes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na
106a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myi dmyigs pa stong pa
106a6('bum): nyid chud myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// 
106a7('bum): yen ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad myong ngo zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chang myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyidang/ 
106a8('bum): la sbyong do// gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yang dag par spob ba rnams chad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
106b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dbang po rnams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
106b2('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te stobs rnams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
106b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes bya bar mya spyad na shes rab kyi phyir lang tu phyind pa la spyad dro/ gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu pha rold tu
106b4('bum): phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ dgal te bsam gtan rnams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na
106b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te tshad myed pa rnams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
106b6('bum): 'jug pa rnams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par tha rad pa brgyad tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// 
106b7('bum): galang te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu chad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang
106b8('bum): smon da ma myed pa tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mngon par shes pa rnams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// 
107a1('bum): dngas sus sa byed dopas bya bar gyi spyod dgasarab roso tu srid pa la spong ngo // gas te ga zus kyi sgo rnams par myed do zhes bya bar gyi slong na shes rab kyi la la tu byin pa la spyod do// 
107a2('bum): gapa'i bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs bcu chang byed de zhes bya bar gyi spyod ma shes rab kyi ba ro lang tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myi 'jigs pa pa'i chang byed do zhes bya bar gyi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa la spyod na
107a3('bum): g.yang te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te snying rje chen po tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// 
107a4('bum): gal nye sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyang chang byed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do/ nga gal te thams cad shes pa nyid chad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyong na
107a5('bum): shes rab kyi phyi rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do/ gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid chad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// galang te rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang / 
107a6('bum): pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// 
107a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po brgyad pa// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi tshad myed pa
107a8('bum): gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// tshor ba'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin no// 'du shes kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni 'du shes ma yin no// 'du byed kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni 'du byed ma yin no// rnam par
107b1('bum): shes pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// myig gi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni myig ma yin no// rna ba'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba ma yin no// sna'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni sna ma yin no// lce'i
107b2('bum): tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni lce ma yin no// lus kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni lus ma yin no// yid kyi tshad myong ba gang yin pa de ni yid ma yin no// gzugs kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// sgra'i tshad
107b3('bum): myed pa gang yin pa de ni snga ma yin nog/ dri'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni dri ma yin no// ro'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni ro ma yin no// reg gi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni reg ma yin no// chos kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni chos
107b4('bum): ma yin no// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni myig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i tshad myed da pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// sna'i rnam par
107b5('bum): shes pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni snga'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par
107b6('bum): shes pa'i chang myed pa gang yin pa de ni sa kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i chad myed pa gang yin pa de ni
107b7('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// lce'i
107b8('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i chad myed pa gang yin pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chad myed pa gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ 
108a1('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor
108a2('bum): ba'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba ma yin no// lce'i
108a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
108a4('bum): rkye nad kyis tshor ba ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no// sa'i khams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa
108a5('bum): de ni sa'i khams ma yin no// chu'i khams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin ba de ni chu'i khams ma yin no// mye'i khams kyi chad myed pa gang yin pa de ni mye'i khams ma yin no// rlung gi khams kyi tshad myed
108a6('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khams ma yin no// nam mkha'i khams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i khams ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams
108a7('bum): ma yin no// ma rig pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa ma yin no// 'du byed kyi tshad myed ma gang yin pa de ni 'du byed ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// mying
108a8('bum): dang gzugs kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni mying dang gzugs ma yin no// skye mched drug gi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni skye mched drug ma yin no// reg pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni reg pa ma yin no// tshor ba'i
108b1('bum): tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin no// sred pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni sred pa ma yin no// len pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni len pa ma yin no// srid pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni srid pa ma yin no// 
108b2('bum): skye ba'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni skye ba ma yin no// rga shi'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni rga shi ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no/ tshul khrims
108b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin no/ brtson
108b4('bum): 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa ma yin no// bsam gtan gyi pha ro lang tu phyi nad pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi
108b5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i chad myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa ma yin no// nang stong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni nang
108b6('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin nog phyi stong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chad myed pa
108b7('bum): gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/ 
108b8('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
109a1('bum): kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// dor ba myed pa stong pa / 
109a2('bum): nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chad myed pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni
109a3('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mang myed pa gang yin pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// myi dbyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chad myed pa gang yin pa de ni myi dmyigs pa stong
109a4('bum): pa nyid ma yin no// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// 
109a5('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar
109a6('bum): gzhag pa rnams ma yin no// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
109a7('bum): ma yin no// dbang po rnams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po rnams ma yin no// stobs rnams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni stobs rnams ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin
109a8('bum): ba de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi tshad
109b1('bum): myed pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no// bsam gtan rnams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan rnams ma yin no// tshad myed pa rnams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni tshad myedapa
109b2('bum): pa rnams ma yin no// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyi tshad myed pa gang
109b3('bum): yin pa de ni rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ma yin no// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no
109b4('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon rna pa myed pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed
109b5('bum): pa ma yin no// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin/ ba de ni mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni ting nge 'dzi nad rnams
109b6('bum): ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma
109b7('bum): yin no// myi 'jigs pa pani 'i chang myed pa ma ba yin pa rnams 'amal so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no// snying rje chen po'i chang byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ 
109b8('bum): snying rje chen po ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no// thams cad shes pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ 
110a1('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa
110a2('bum): gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa kye ma bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni de ltar zab bo/ de ltar gting dpag dka'o/ 
110a3('bum): de ltar rtogs par dka'o/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di ni de ltar chad ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar
110a4('bum): du zhugs pa'i mabun du bshad par myi bgyi ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thos nas 'jigs sdang zhing bskrag par 'gyur du mchi'o// the tsom dang nem nur
110a5('bum): 'tshal du mchi'o// mos par yang myi 'gyur du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
110a6('bum): pa bab mo 'di bstanang par bgyi ste/ des ni shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur ro// the tsom dang nem nur 'chal bar myi 'gyur te/ thos nas/ 
110a7('bum): kyang gong nas gong du mos pa dang / 'dzind pa dang / 'anang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis che dang
110a8('bum): ldan pa shar dwa ki'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
110b1('bum): 'di bshad na nyes pa cir 'gyur/ sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ ke'u shi ka gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo
110b2('bum): 'di bstan na de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ 'jigs par 'gyur/ sdang bar 'gyur skrag par 'gyur te/ phyir ldog par 'gyur ro// spong bar 'gyur ro// de ni mos par yang myi
110b3('bum): 'gyur te/ ke'u shi ka theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di thos nas spangs pa'i phyir/ go log par ltung bar 'gyur ba'i las mngon
110b4('bum): bar byed cing stsogs pa dang las byas pa dang bstsags pa des kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang dka' ba de lta bu'i gnas yod do// 
110b5('bum): brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa ga ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstand pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na myi 'jigs myi sdang / skrag
110b6('bum): bar myi 'gyur ba lta yod dam/ smras pa/ ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur ba de dag ni
110b7('bum): ring po myi thogs par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstanang par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig gam/ gnyis las myi 'da' bar
110b8('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du lung bstand par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa dang / sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 
111a1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur zhing // thos nas kyang gong nas gong du
111a2('bum): 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / ji ltar bstand pa'i shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas pa de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'o// pha rold tu phyin
111a3('bum): pa drug la spyad pa'o// sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dpel gsal bar bdag gis spobs so// bde bar gshegs pa'i de'i dpe' gsal
111a4('bum): bar bdag gis spobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig/ da sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol dpa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste
111a5('bum): dper na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo'i rmyi lam na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pasgom zhing bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / brtson
111a6('bum): 'grus rtsom pa dang / bzod pa bsgrub pa dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba nas snying po byang chub la mchis pa'i bar du gyur na 'ang / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
111a7('bum): de ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur par rig par bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyid kyis ma log pa zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
111a8('bum): pa bsgoms pa dang bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / bzod pa bsgrubs pa dang / tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang / sbyin pa yongs su gtang ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshald te/ 
111b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di
111b2('bum): thos par 'gyur te thos nas kyang 'dzind cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan du bgyid pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smyind pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
111b3('bum): kha zab mo 'di 'dzind cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni/ yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o// sangs
111b4('bum): rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur ba'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rig sa kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
111b5('bum): tu lung bstand pa dang nye bar gyur da pa ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab
111b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zab mo 'di 'thang cing 'thad par gyur nas kyang 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du rI gas k+Shi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na myed pa
111b7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par rig par bgyi ba dag go// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad brgya pa zhig nas 'byung ba 'am/ 'brog dgon
111b8('bum): pa dpag tshad nyis brgya pa dang / sum brgya pa dang / bzhi brgya pa dang / lnga brgya pa nas 'byung ba zhig mchis la/ de 'byung ba'i tshe grong dang / grong khyer dang grong rdal dang / khoms dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi
112a1('bum): n+ya/ snga ltas ba lang rdzi 'am/ phyugs rdzi 'am sa mtshams sam/ gza' shing gi ra ba phun sum tshogs pa 'am/ nags tshal phun sum tshogs pa mthong ngam/ de ma lags pa gzhan yang mtshan ma gang / 
112a2('bum): gis grong ngam grong khyer ram grong rdal lam khams samargyal po'i yo brang 'khor mchis pa'i mngon pa'i snga ltas de lta bu dag mthong na de 'di snyam du gyu ra te/ snga ltas 'di dag snang ba las na/ 'di nas grong ngam
112a3('bum): grong khyer ram grong rdal lam/ khams sam / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ni nye'o snyam ste dbugs 'byind par 'gyur zhing de la slan chad rkun po'i 'jigs pa 'am/ chom po'i 'jigs pa 'am/ gcan zan khro bo'i 'jigs
112a4('bum): pa 'ams bkres pa dang / skom pa'i 'jigs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gang gi tshe// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zab mo 'di
112a5('bum): 'thad par gyur pa te 'thang bar gyur nas kyang 'dzinang pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kaM kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe byang chub seMs
112a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni lung bstan pa la nye bar gyur par rig par bgyi ba ste/ ring po myi thogs par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro// byang chub
112a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des de slan cad nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sas 'jigs par myi bgyi'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di lta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / 
112a8('bum): mnyan tu mchis pa de nyid bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi snga ltas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin tesha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis da dung
112b1('bum): yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus spongs pa skyed cig/ gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig rgya mtsho 'ching rnam chen po blta bar 'tshal nas/ de rgya mtsho chen po blta ba'i slad du// 
112b2('bum): de ji lta ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po dang nye bar mchis pa de lta de ltar ldum bu 'am ldum bu'i mtshan ma 'am/ ri 'am ri'i mtshan ma mthong na/ des 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po thag nye ste 'di nas rgya mtsho
112b3('bum): chen po ring po myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni bags kyis gzhol ba ste/ 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po'i drung du da ni ring po myed do// de dang nye ba na ni ldum bu 'am ldum bu'i mtshan ma 'am/ 
112b4('bum): ri 'am ri'i mtshan ma gang yang myed do zhes bgyi bar rig da par bgyi'o// de ltar skyes bu de'i myig gis rgya mtsho chen po ma mthong du lags kyang / des bdag ni rgya mtsho chen po dang nye bar
112b5('bum): gyur da to// rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di na yod do// rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di phan chad myi ring ngo zhes bgyi bar rtogs par 'chal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
112b6('bum): pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzind pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen pos kyang / bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
112b7('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod bskal pa 'di snyed cig/ bskal pa brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig/ bskal pa stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig/ bskal pa brgya stong gi phrag ni 'di
112b8('bum): snyed cig bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi phrag ni 'di snyed cig na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bla na myed pa yang dag
113a1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon sum du lung bstan pas da dung lung ma bstan gyis kyang bdag ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang nye bar gnas par blta'o// 
113a2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur du yod la/ mnyan tu yod do// thos nas kyang gzung du yod do// bcang
113a3('bum): du yod/ klag tu yodapa/ kun chub par byar yod/ tshul bzhin du yid la byar yod do zhes bgyi bar rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ dpyid kyi dus la bab ste/ ci shing gi lo ma dang / 
113a4('bum): mdab ma lhags nas kha dog du gyur pa'i che/ 'dzam bu'i gling nga gi myi rnams kyis ring po myi thogs par lo ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
113a5('bum): ltar lnga ltas 'di dag rtsi shing las snang ngo zhes bgyi bar 'tshal par bgyi ste/ gang gi tshe rtsi shing rnams lo ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par gyur pa de'i tshe 'ang / bud myed
113a6('bum): dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag gis ci shing gi lo ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa de dag mthong nas nyams bde bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal
113a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po yang gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang mnyan du mchis te/ thos nas kyang 'dzind cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing
113a8('bum): kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smyinang par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
113b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyem bkur bgyis par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des kyang / 'di ltar bdag
113b2('bum): gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang ka mnyan tu yod pa dang / ji skad du bstand pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan byar yod pa ni
113b3('bum): sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur to zhes bgyi bar 'chal par bgyi'o// de na lha'i bu sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag kyang / byang
113b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i snga ltas de dag mthong de nas/ sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam gas lung bstand par gyur pa la 'ang/ snga ltas 'di dag byung gis
113b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di yang ring po myi thogs par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bste nad par 'gyur ro zhes dga' zhing spro la yid bde zhing
113b6('bum): nyams bde bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na bud myed sbrum ma ni/ ji lta ji ltar bcar nye ba de lha de ltar slar zhing lus ngal la rgyun zhan cing / myi dga' la kha zas yi gar myi mchi zhing / 
113b7('bum): rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyang chung ngu gyur te/ nyams myi bde ba des smra ba nyung zhing bstend pa'i ngang tshul ma mchis la/ sngon gyi tshul bzhin ma lags pa'i yid la bgyid pa bstend pa dang / bsnyend pa des rnam
113b8('bum): ba de lta bu'i tshor ba myong bar gyur pa te/ bud myed gzhan dag gis bud myed de'i mtshan ma ji lta ji ltar mthong ba las/ bud myed 'di ni ring po myi thogs par bca' bar 'gyur ro zhes bgyi bar 'tshal to// 
114a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur ba legs pa'i spyod pa spyad pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis
114a2('bum): yongs su bzung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smind pa rnams la'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di 'thad par gyur pa te/ 'thad par gyur da nas kyang 'dzind cing 'chang ba dang klog cing kun chub
114a3('bum): khar bgyis pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ring po myi thogs par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan
114a4('bum): par 'gyur bar rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu legs so legs so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis spobs pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus skyes so// 
114a5('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byorard kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdzas
114a6('bum): kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag de ltar legs par yongs su bzung ba ni ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga 'di ltar byang chub sems
114a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang ga skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang myi'i skye bo'i tshogs phal po che'i don dang bde ba'i phyir bla na myed pa
114a8('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yang dag par 'jug ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can brgya stong mang po la phan 'dogs ste// bzhi
114b1('bum): gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang gasnyan par smra ba dang / don tu spyod pa dang / don mthun par spyod pa de dag gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par skul lo// kha dag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par
114b2('bum): 'jug la/ gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par skul log bdag kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug la/ gzhan yang bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang dag par skul lo bdag kyang bsam
114b3('bum): tad gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug la gzhan yang bsam gtan gsum pa la yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug la/ gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang dag par
114b4('bum): sku ma log bdag kyang byams pa'i ting nge 'dzi nad la snyoms par 'jug da lag gzhan yang byams pa'i ting nge 'dzind la yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin pa la snyoms par 'jug la/ 
114b5('bum): gzhan yang snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par skul log bdag kyang dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzind la snyoms par 'jug la// gzhan yang dag 'a ba'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang btang
114b6('bum): bsnyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug la ga gzhan yang btang bsnyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug la gzhan yang nam mkha'
114b7('bum): mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par bskul lo/ bdag kyang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug la/ gzhan yang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par bskul lo// bdag kyang cung zad myed
114b8('bum): pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug la gzhan yang cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la snyoms par 'jug la/ gzhan yang 'du shes myed
115a1('bum): 'du shes myed myin skye mched la yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong la gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang tshul khrims srung lagazhan
115a2('bum): yang tshul khrims la yang dag par bskul lo/ bdag kyang bzod pa sgom la gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang brtson 'grus rtsom la gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul lo
115a3('bum): bdag kyang bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug la gzhan yang bsam gtan la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang shes rab sgom la gzhan yang shes rab la yang dag par skul lo// de dag shes rab kyi pha rol
115a4('bum): tu phyind pa la gnas shing thabs mkhas pas/ sems can rnams rgyu nad/ tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god kyang bdag rgyu nad tu zhug/ nas pa'i 'bras bu thob par myi byed do// gzha
115a5('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god kyang bdag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par myi byed do// gzhan phyir myi 'ong ba'i'abras bu la rab tu 'god kyang / bdag phyir
115a6('bum): myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par myi byed do// gzhan dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu 'god kyang bdag dgra bcom pa nyid thob par myi byed do// gzhan rang byang chub la rab tu 'god kyang bdag rang byang chub mngon tu
115a7('bum): myi byed do// bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan stong phrag du ma dag kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par bskul lo// bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha
115a8('bum): ro lad tu phyi nang pa la spyod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan stong phrag du ma dag kyang / tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod la
115b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gzhan stong phrag du ma dag kyang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan stong
115b2('bum): phrag du ma dag kyang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod lak+Sha/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan stong phrag du ma dag kyang / bas
115b3('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul lo \u0f7f/ bdag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan stong phrag du ma dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa
115b4('bum): yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang phyir myi ldog pa'i sa yongs su gnon la/ gzhan yang phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu 'god do// bdag kyangasangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed la
115b5('bum): gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang sems can yongs su sbyin par byed la gzhan yang seMs can yongs su smind par bya ba
115b6('bum): ma yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa skyed la/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo yongs su
115b7('bum): sprob la/ gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo yongs su sbyong ba la yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par byed la// gzhan yang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par skul lo// 
115b8('bum): bdag kyang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzind la/ gzhan yang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin la
116a1('bum): gzhan yang mtshan phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang gzhon nu'i sa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin la gzhan yang gzhon nu'i sa phun sum tshogs pa la yang dag par
116a2('bum): skul lo// bdag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom la gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom la/ gzhan yang yang dag par spong ba bzhi la
116a3('bum): yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom la/ gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang dbang po lnga sgom la gzhan yang dbang po lnga la yang dag par skul lo/ 
116a4('bum): bdag kyang stobs lnga sgom la/ gzhan yang stobs lnga la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom la nga gzhan yang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la yang dag par skul lo/ 
116a5('bum): bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom la// gzhan yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgom la/ gzhan yang
116a6('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi sgom la gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang tshad myed pa bzhi sgom la/ gzhan yang tshad myed pa
116a7('bum): bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgom la/ gzhan yang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang rnam par tha rad pa brgyad
116a8('bum): sgom la/ gzhan yang rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la yang dag par skul log bdag kyang mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom la/ gzhan yang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
116b1('bum): pa dgu la yang dag par skul log bdag kyang rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa sgom la/ gzhan yang rnam par thar da pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa
116b2('bum): la yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang mngon par shes pa lnga sgom la/ gzhan yang mngon par shes pa lnga la yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang ting nge 'dzind thams cad la snyoms par 'jug la gzhan yang
116b3('bum): ting nge 'dzind thams cad la yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad sgom la/ gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
116b4('bum): stobs bcu sgom la/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs da bcu la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang myi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom la/ gzhan yang myi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par
116b5('bum): skul lo/ bdag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom la gzhan yang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par sku lo bdag kyang byams pa chen po sgom la/ gzhan yang byams pa chen
116b6('bum): po la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang snying rje chen po sgom la/ gzhan yang snying rje chen po la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgrub la gzhan yang sangs rgyas
116b7('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed la/ gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang
116b8('bum): bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong la/ gzhan yang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo
117a1('bum): bskor la/ gzhan yang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la yang dag par skul lo// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
117a2('bum): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan mang po dang ldan pa de dag/ sems can thams cad kyi slad du// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa la spyod cing / bla na myed pa
117a3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya babacom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtsha rang to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
117a4('bum): chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bsgom pa yod ngas su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems
117a5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam gzugs kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes
117a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam tshor ba'i 'phel ba yang
117a7('bum): dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpal sems dpa'
117a8('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam 'du shes kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
117b1('bum): bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam 'du byed kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma
117b2('bum): mthong ba de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
117b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe gnam rnam par shes pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa sgom
117b4('bum): ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub se dmas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin da pa la spyod pa'i tshe / nam myig gi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes
117b5('bum): su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems
117b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rna ba'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
117b7('bum): bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam sna'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe
117b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
118a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe / nam lce'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab
118a2('bum): 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam lus kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
118a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam yid kyi 'phel ba yang
118a4('bum): dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa'
118a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che/ nam gzugs kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mtho/ nga ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
118a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam sgra'i 'phel ba
118a7('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
118a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i che/ nam dri'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs
118b1('bum): par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che/ nam ro'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems/ 
118b2('bum): dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe sha nam reg gi
118b3('bum): 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa'
118b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam chos kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshebyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
118b5('bum): tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che / nam myig gi rnam par shes pa'i
118b6('bum): 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' seMs
118b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi
118b8('bum): pha rol tu phyi nang pa'i bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe / nam sna'i rnam par shes pa'i
119a1('bum): 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
119a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe ga nam lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
119a3('bum): chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe ga nam lus
119a4('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mtho dang pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po shes nyin rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par
119a5('bum): 'gyur ro// rab 'byorarang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che ba nam yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma
119a6('bum): mthong ba de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi ba
119a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bsgom pa
119a8('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i che/ nam rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma
119b1('bum): mthong ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
119b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang
119b3('bum): pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par
119b4('bum): rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yo ngas su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da byang chub sems
119b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che/ nam lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems
119b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
119b7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa
119b8('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor
120a1('bum): ba'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 
120a2('bum): rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe gnam rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i 'phel pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
120a3('bum): ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
120a4('bum): rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che/ nam sI 'dus te sa pa'i rkyen gyis tshor dpa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
120a5('bum): gi bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor bya ba chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rom tu byi nang pa la spyod pa'i cha/ rnam sde'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
120a6('bum): tshor ba'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems
120a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ na ma lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe / byang chub sems dpa' sems
120a8('bum): dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam yid kyi
120b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 
120b2('bum): rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshenam sa'i khams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
120b3('bum): dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe / nam chu'i
120b4('bum): khams kyi phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol/ tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
120b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam mye'i khams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshebyang chub sems dpa' seMs
120b6('bum): dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i che / nam rlung
120b7('bum): gi khams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da byang
120b8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe / nam nam mkha'i khams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
121a1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol pa tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe ga nam
121a2('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mthong bya de'i tshebyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab
121a3('bum): 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam ma rig pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems
121a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa na bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
121a5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam 'du byed kyi 'phel ba yang dag pararjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su
121a6('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che/ nam rnam par shes pa'i 'phel ba yang dag papa rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe
121a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' pos dpa 'a chen po'i gis rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa
121a8('bum): ma skyem pa'i mig nam gyi dang gzugs kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma 'asong pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa 'ag sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'atu
121b1('bum): rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam skye mched drug gi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
121b2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam reg pa'i 'phel po
121b3('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
121b4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ namatshor ba'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
121b5('bum): phyi nang pa bsgom yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam sred pa'i 'phel ba yang
121b6('bum): dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon
121b7('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam le nad pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom
121b8('bum): ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam srid pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe
122a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
122a2('bum): tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam skye ba'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 
122a3('bum): rab 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ na ma rga shi'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
122a4('bum): chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems nga dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
122a5('bum): su rdzogs par 'gyur ba/ 'byor de byang chub sems rna nas la spyod pa'i tshe nam sbyin pa'i pha
122a6('bum): rol tu phyind pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems
122a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ram tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes
122a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu byind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe / nam bzod pa'i pha rol tu
122b1('bum): phyi nang pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor na
122b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe / nam brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe / byang chub sems
122b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod
122b4('bum): ba'i tshe/ nam bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub na sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol de
122b5('bum): tu phyinang pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nang pa la spyod pa'i tshe sa nam shes rab kyi
122b6('bum): 'i lang tu phyind pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nang pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 
122b7('bum): rab 'byorarang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam nang stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
122b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
123a1('bum): ba gnam gyi stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 
123a2('bum): rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro lad tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / nam phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe byang chus sems dpa'
123a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i cho / nam
123a4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 
123a5('bum): rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe / byang chub
123a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
123a7('bum): nam don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
123a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
123b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa khasgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'phel
123b2('bum): ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
