168b8('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 
169a1('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bsam gtan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// 
169a2('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni tshad myed pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ 
169a3('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su
169a4('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dgad ni rnam par thar da pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs
169a5('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mngon par shes pa rnams yod/ su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni ting nge 'dzi nad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ 
169a6('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni gzungs kyi sgo yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ 
169a7('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro
169a8('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 
169b1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan par 'gyur te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don tu skye bo mang po'i don byed par 'gyur ro// 
169b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ni ngas rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod do// 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
169b3('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
169b4('bum): dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod do// de dag tshe 'das nas kyang 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'id byang chub kyi don tu spyod pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de dag
169b5('bum): gzhan la yang 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don tu rnam pa de lta bu nyid brjod par 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs
169b6('bum): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur te/ de dag ni bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
169b7('bum): bzlogs par myi nus na sdig to la mos pa dang / sdig to'i spyod pa can shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la spong ba gzhan gyis lta ji smos sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i
169b8('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thos nas dga' zhing nyams bde ba rgya chen po skye bar 'gyur ro// 'di ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog pa
170a1('bum): byang chub kyi don du skye bo mang po yang dge ba'i chos la 'god par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni nga'i mdun du 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub
170a2('bum): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po byang chub tu rab tu dgod par bgyi'o// yang dag par bstan par
170a3('bum): bgyi'o// yang dag par ga zeng stong par bgyi'o// yang dag par dga' bar bgyi'o// phyir myi ldog pa rwa lung bstan par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i tshig smras so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu
170a4('bum): mo de dag gi tshig ni sems la sems kyis rnam par blta ste 'dangs rjes su dgyes pa mdzad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs par dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
170a5('bum): rnams kyi spyan sngar yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de ngag gis 'di skad du/ bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spro nga pa'i tshe/ srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong
170a6('bum): phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po byang chub tu dgod par bgyi'o// yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o// yang dag par bskul bar bgyi'o// yang dag par gzeng bstod par bgyi'o// yang dag pa
170a7('bum): dga' bar bgyi'o// phyir myi ldog par lung bstan par bgyi'i zhes bya ba'i tshig smras so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams de dag gis
170a8('bum): kyang rigis kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu ma de dag gi tshig dang / sems la thugs kyis rnam par gzigs te/ rjes su rtses pa yang ngo // gar na to burigs kyi bu dag rigs kyi bu ma de dag byang chub sems
170b1('bum): nga slong sa ma sog chags pargyamagasang po dang / srog chags stong phragasang po dang / srog chags pacu stong thag pa 'o nar myed pa srung dasu phyur chogs nga gru yod
170b2('bum): yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ yang dag par bskul bar 'gyur/ yang dag par gzeng bstong par 'gyur/ yang dag par dga' bar byed par 'gyur/ phyir myi ldog par khung gon par 'gyur ro// gar dwa ti'i gyi
170b3('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs bu mo de dag ni gzugs dang sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg la mos pa rlabs po cher 'gyur te/ de dag sbyin brlabs po che gtong bar 'gyur ro// sbyin pa rlabs po che btang zhing / dge ba'i rtsa
170b4('bum): brlabs po che mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro// de dag dger bu'i rtsa ba rlabs chen po mngon par 'du byas nas/ rnam par smin pa ngarlabs chen po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba dag/ rnam par smin/ 
170b5('bum): rlabs chen po yongs su bzung nas/ sems can de dag nyid kyi don tu rnam par smin pa rlabs po che las/ de bas kyang rlobs che ba'i rnam par sbyin pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar gyi
170b6('bum): 'am nang gi dngos po de dag kyang / sems can de nyid la yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
170b7('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba dang / 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid kyis ston pa mngon tu gyur pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag la rten par 'gyur ro// de dag
170b8('bum): gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mngon sum du thos nas// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu yang srog chags pa/ 
171a1('bum): phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro// yang dag par skul bar 'gyu ro/ 
171a2('bum): yang dag par gzeng stong par 'gyur ro// yang dag par dga' bar byed par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'das pa dang / 
171a3('bum): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams las/ chos gang thugs su ma chud ba de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so// de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid gang thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so// sems can
171a4('bum): rnams kyi sems thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis pa ni ngo mtshar che ste/ 'di ltar 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen tos/ 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang
171a5('bum): yongs su mkhyen to// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sa rgyas kyi zhing dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen/ to/ ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ses
171a6('bum): dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to// ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to// da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs
171a7('bum): rgyas kyi zhing dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhags shing 'tshe// 
171a8('bum): sbyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegasapa dgra bcom po yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 'al yang tu phyin pa drug pa'ang dag ga slang du/ bcan par brgyad mang / yang drag para'i rdzogs pa/ 
171b1('bum): sangs rgyas de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to// bcom ldan 'das gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
171b2('bum): dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gi slad du/ brtson par bgyid cing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag tshol ba dang / yongs su tshol ba'i rje/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo pha rol
171b3('bum): tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag tshol ba dang / yongs su tshol ba las/ la las ni btsal ba las/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di dag thob par 'gyur/ la las ni thob par myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis
171b4('bum): bka' stsal pa ka sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni de lta ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu nga dang rigs kyi bu mo brtson 'grus myi gtong ba de dag kun gyis kyang dad pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di dag thams cad 'grub par
171b5('bum): 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar rigasakyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gi don tu brtson par byed pa'i phyir ro// gsol ba
171b6('bum): ji lags/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mdo sde zab mo zab mo/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di dag kun kyang 'grub par 'gyur ram// bcom ldan 'das kyis pa
171b7('bum): stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu nI kris kyi bu mo de dag gis mde sde/ zab mo zab mo// pha rol tu phyind ba drug dang ldan pa 'di dag 'grub par myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas myed skabs myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
171b8('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems can rnams yang dag par ston cing / yang dag par skul pa dang / yang dag par gzeng stong pa dang / yang dag par dga' bar byed
172a1('bum): ba' dang / 'god cing rab tu gzhog pa las kyang / de bzhin du 'gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'das nas kyang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag 'grub par 'gyur ro/ 
172a2('bum): de dag ni nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas ka sems can yongs su smyin par ma byas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar
172a3('bum): tuji skad du bstan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag las brtson 'grus nyam par myi 'gyur ro// / shes rab kyi pha rolangs phyin pa stong phrag brgya ba las/ le'u sum cu gcig go// 
172a4('bum): shes rab// / bam po bcu gnyis pa// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab
172a5('bum): 'byord kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa na pha rold tu
172a6('bum): byin pa drug la spyod pa/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag gi yon tan yongs su rjod pa ni 'di dag lags na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang riH
172a7('bum): kyi bu mo blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bdu chub tu spyod pa de dag la bar chad du 'gyur ba ji lta bu dag mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor nga spobs pa bcang 'bya ste skye na/ rag
172a8('bum): 'byor da de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ji'i slad du spobs pa ha cang 'phyi skye bar 'gyur/ de ni ji'i slad du/ byang chub sems/ 
172b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ 
172b2('bum): pa'i tshig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' ba
172b3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dka' ba
172b4('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed na/ rab 'byor nga rnam grangs des shin ra tu 'phyi ste/ spobs pa skye bar 'gyur ro// de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
172b5('bum): gzhan yang shin tu myur bar spobs pa skye na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji'i slang dug shin tu myur bar
172b6('bum): spobs pa skye bar 'gyur ba de ni rnga'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos brgyad kyi las su rig par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lang ba/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems
172b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ 
172b8('bum): la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ha cang yang myur bar spobs pa skyel/ des rlom sems su byed na/ 
173a1('bum): rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ spobs pa ha cang myur bar skye ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang glalang cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
173a2('bum): 'dri nas rab 'byor da de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang dgod cing 'dri na rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi
173a3('bum): las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor pan tshun steg cing 'drin ga rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// sems g.yeng zhing 'drin rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dang / 
173a4('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bad kyisas su rig par bya'o// yi ge gzhan la gas ging tshig gi don myi shes par 'drin/ rab 'byor de yang byangan da pa sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// 
173a5('bum): 'di'i ro ma myong nas stan las langs te 'gro na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor da gzhan yang gla lad cing lung 'bog na/ rab 'byorard de yang byang
173a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// glal cing kha thon byed dam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ ston pa dang / glal cing tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor nga de yang byang chub sems dpa'
173a7('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang phan tshun bzhad dgang byed cing 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin tu yid la byed na/ rab 'byor de yang bya
173a8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang phan tshun steg cing 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du ying la byed de/ rab 'byor de de yang
173b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chem pob bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ rab 'byor nga gzhan yang sems g.yeng bas 'dzin tam na 'chang ngamag klog gamag kun chub par byed ngas ga tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor
173b2('bum): de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang yi ge gzhan dang gzhan la chags shing 'dzin tamag 'chang ngas / klog gam/ kun chub par byed dmag tshul bzhin
173b3('bum): du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
173b4('bum): tobacom ldan 'das kyis la gang 'di skad du/ 'di'i ro ma myong nas stan las langs te 'gro na/ rab 'byor da de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o zhes bka' stsa la na ka bcom
173b5('bum): ldan 'das ji'i slad du 'di'i ro myi myong bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' te sems dpa' chen po sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsam
173b6('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la ma spyad pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol
173b7('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las bdag cag lung ma bstan to zhes ma dad pa'i yid kyis stan las langs shing 'dong ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud
173b8('bum): kyilas su rig par bya'o// gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das ji'i slad du gas rab kyi pha rolal tu byin pa las sungs brtan par de dag gan las yangs ga'i mami'i par 'gyur/ bcom ldam nas kyis bka phrul pa rab kyi cu
174a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyon myed par ma chud pa ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung myi bstan te/ de la bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las myi 'byung ngo // bdag
174a2('bum): ya/ gi mying yang yongs su ma brjod do zhes dad par ma gyur na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol
174a3('bum): tu na pa pab mo 'di las/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi mying yongs su ma brjod pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsaladu la/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rjen
174a4('bum): nga po lung ma bstan pa rnams kyi myong ni yongs su myi brjod do// de la bad dge myong yang 'di las myi 'byung / bdag gang du skyes pa'i grong ngam cang grong khyer ras/ gro rdal gyi mying 'di yang myi 'byung ngo zhes de sde
174a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi mnyan to snyam byed cing / 'khor de nas 'gro bar sems na/ sems bskyed pa des/ ji lta ji ltar 'grobar sems shing gom pa ji snyed cig bor ba de snyed kyi skal ba
174a6('bum): yongs su 'dzind par 'gyur te/ de dag la bzod brtson par bya dgos so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bor zhing / mdo sde gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su myi sgrub pa de dag kun chub
174a7('bum): par byed par sems te/ des na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing gi rtsa ba spangs te/ de nyid kyi sal ga dang / mdab ma dang / lo ma la 'jug
174a8('bum): sems par gyur pa de dag ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su myi sgrug
174b1('bum): pa'i mi sngo kun nub par bgyi bar sems par 'gyur ba de dag gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ mdo sde gang nyan thos dang ldan pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa de dag ste/ 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
174b2('bum): shi ga yang dag par spong ba ba ni dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / rgobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag 'dun dang / 'phags pa'i lam lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par 'ar par sgo stong pa nyid dag ma
174b3('bum): ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i rnams te/ de dag la gnas shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom
174b4('bum): banyid 'thob pa dang / rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur gyi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par myi 'gyur ba ste/ rab 'byor sa de dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde gang la
174b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor zhing / kun chub par bya bar sems/ pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su myi / sgrub pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' seMs
174b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
174b7('bum): chen po rnams ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams la slob pa yin no// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ dper na/ khyi la la zhig/ rje bo'i zan nar ma bor te/ las myi las zan btsal bar sems pa dang / 
174b8('bum): 'dra bar de bzhin du/ rab 'byor da ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa 'di bor ste/ yal ga dang
175a1('bum): lo ma dang / mdab ma lta bu'i mdo sde nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa dag la brtan par sems pa 'byung ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud
175a2('bum): ba kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor da gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab mo 'di bor nas/ khye dang / 
175a3('bum): bkur sti'i phyingag nyon thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mde sde rnams kun chub par bya bar sems pa 'byung ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen pos bdud kyi las su mi/ 
175a4('bum): par bya'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ myi la la zhing glang po 'dod laka des glang po rnyed nas glang po'i rjes btsal bar sems pa yod na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i
175a5('bum): ngang tshul can yin nam// gsol bag bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa ka rab la khyor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang
175a6('bum): zag gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing / mdo ste gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa de dag btsal bar sems pa de dag kyang dpe' de dang 'dra bar rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor de yang
175a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ myi zhig rgya mtsho chen po blta bar 'dod la/ ba lang gi rjes btsal bar sems shing / nges pa lang gi rjes
175a8('bum): mthong nas kyang / 'di snyam du rgya ma tsho chen po'i ched 'di dang mnyam 'am/ myi mnyam snyam na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems na skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam na gsol ba bcom ldan 'das de ni
175b1('bum): ni ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes ra
175b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya bar sems pa
175b3('bum): de dag kyang / rnam pa de ltar rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ phya mkhan nam/ phya mkhan gyi slong
175b4('bum): ma nam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i ched du khang pa zhig dbub cing bas dab par 'dod de/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhas myed khang yongs su btsal dbar sems shing / nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal myed khang las
175b5('bum): tshad blang bar sems na/ rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems par skye sa bu des nyi ma dang / zla ba'i gzhal myed khang gi tshad kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad dang / dpe' tshul bzung ste/ de dang
175b6('bum): 'dra ba'i khang pa dbub par nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ bya mkhan nam/ bya mkhan gyi slob ma
175b7('bum): de mkhas pa'i nga tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu de ni byis pa'i nga tshul can tsa rig par bgyi ste/ mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
175b8('bum): papa rab 'byor de de bzhin tu ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' thog pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang / shes
176a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bcal bar sems pa 'byung na/ rab 'byor
176a2('bum): de la d+hi snyam du sems / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam// gsolang ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ bde bar gshegs pa de ni
176a3('bum): ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang ba / rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig 'khor lo/ 
176a4('bum): sbyar ba'i rgyal po mthong bar 'dod la / des 'ams kyi rgyal phran mthong nas/ 'di snyam du 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po de kha dog dang da byibs kyis ji 'dra ba zhig yod ces ka des khams kyi rgyal phrar
176a5('bum): mthong ba'i kha dog dang / dbyibs kyi mtshan ma bzung bar bsams te/ 'di skad du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i kha dog dang dbyings dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma yang sa'i bdag po 'di 'dra ba zhig
176a6('bum): yod grang zhes zer na/ rab 'byor du de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni me lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
176a7('bum): kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang / shes rab kyi
176a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang / rangasas rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bsal bar sems 'byung da/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du nges byangs
176b1('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi sa dang / rigs kyi sa me de dag mkhas par 'chus par yin nas/ gagaso dag bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bru'adang/ rab 'byor de sa bya
176b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'dig steg dper na/ skyes bu shin tu bkres pa la la zhig gis / ro brgya dang ldan pa'i zas rnyed kyang / drug cu la kha zas bcal bar sems
176b3('bum): shing / des kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa de bor nas/ drug cu pa'i kha zas la bza' bar bsams na/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pag bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags
176b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sde'adab / rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i sa na khyang chu sems dang theg pa pa'i riris kyi bu'am rigs kyi bus de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi pa rang mo 'ang thos shing rnyed kyang shes
176b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang / ste rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhye nyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/ rab 'byor da de ji
176b6('bum): snyam du sems byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni me lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ 
176b7('bum): rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig gis/ nor bu rin po che rin thang myed pa rnyed nas/ nor bu mching bu dang bskrun par bsas na
176b8('bum): skyes bu de mkhas pa'i nga tshul can yin nam / gsold pag bcom ldan 'das de ni mi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi
177a1('bum): bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i/ 
177a2('bum): mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa byung na/ rab 'byor de de la ji snyam du sems na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul
177a3('bum): can yin nam/ ka gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan
177a4('bum): yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dri ba'i tshe/ spobs pa mang po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i dkrugs mar 'gyur ba/ de lta bu
177a5('bum): skye bar 'gyur ba 'di ltar gzugs kyi spobs pa dang / sgra'i spobs pa/ dang / dri'i spobs pa dang / ro'i spobs pa dang / reg gi spobs pa dang / chos kyi spobs pa dang / sbyin pa'i spobs pa dang / tshul
177a6('bum): kyi spobs pa dang / bzod pa'i spobs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi spobs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi spobs pa dang / shes rab kyi spobs pa dang // 'dod pa'i khams kyi spobs pa dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi spobs pa dang / 
177a7('bum): gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi spobs pa dang / lung dbog pa dang / kha ton du bya ba'i spobs pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i spobs pa dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang na yang dag pa'i spobs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
177a8('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang / dbang po'i spobs pa dang / stobs kyi spobs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi spobs pa dang / lam gyi spobs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi spobs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i spongs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
177b1('bum): kyi spobs pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i spobs dang / nang stong pa nyid kyi stobs pa dang / byi stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid
177b2('bum): kyi spobs pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed
177b3('bum): ba stong pa nyid spobs pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / myi dmyigs
177b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spongs
177b5('bum): ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / bzod 'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu tu na pa'i spobs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa/ 
177b6('bum): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spongs pa dang / stobs bcu'i spobs pa dang / myi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i spobs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa
177b7('bum): 'bras bu'i spongs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i spongs pa dang / rang byang chub kyi spobs pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya
177b8('bum): chub kyi spobs pa skye bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa spobs pa myed pas rnam par byang ba'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis myi khyab pa'o// rab 'byor/ 
178a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems myed pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skye ba myed cing 'gag pa myed pa'o// rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa myed/ 
178a2('bum): cing rnam par byang ba myed pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khrug pa myed pa'o// rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni brjod du myed pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rnam par
178a3('bum): byang ba myed pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmyigs pa myed pa'o// rab 'byor nga de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la myed cing myi dmyigs te/ rab 'byor dgal
178a4('bum): te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/ chos de dag gis 'khrug par gyur pa na/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
178a5('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byorard kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
178a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri bar nus sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de lta ma yin no// rab 'byor de de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// 
178a7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ 
178a8('bum): de myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigaso
178b1('bum): gyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngobo nyid yod pa ma yin gyi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo sa nyid yod bam
178b2('bum): yin te myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngobo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// 
178b3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// 
178b4('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// chos thams cung stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan da nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// myi byis
178b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed/ pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ myi dmyigs so// dngos po
178b6('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmyigs so// 
178b7('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ myi dmyigs so// stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag nas
178b8('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan rnams
179a1('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// rnam par
179a2('bum): tha rang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / 
179a3('bum): smon pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo rnaMs
179a4('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag
179a5('bum): par rig pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmigs so// snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa yin te myi dmyigs
179a6('bum): so/ thams cad shes nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs
179a7('bum): so// ngo bo nyid myi dmyigs pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ dngos po myed pas dngos po myed pa bri bar myi nus so// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems
179a8('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dngos po myed ces bya bar 'du shes na/ de yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa' ba'i rigs
179b1('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di yi ge bris nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bdag gis bris so zhes mchin/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab ma
179b2('bum): la yi ger mngon par chags pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
179b3('bum): ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan
179b4('bum): 'das gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 'du shes ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 'du byed ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// myig ni yi ge ma
179b5('bum): mchis pa'o// rna ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sna ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lce ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lus ni yi ge ma mchis ba'o// yid ni yi ma mchis pa'o// gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis
179b6('bum): ba'o// sgra ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// dri ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// ro ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// reg ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// chos ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// myig gi rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rna ba'i
179b7('bum): rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes
179b8('bum): pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma
180a1('bum): mchis pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// yid 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
180a2('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
180a3('bum): tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sa'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// chu'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mye'i khams ni yi ge ma
180a4('bum): mchis pa'o// rlung gi khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// nam mkha'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// ma rig pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 'du byed ni
180a5('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mying dang gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// skye mched drug ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// tshor
180a6('bum): ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sred pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// len pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// srid pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// skye ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rga shi ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// nang stong pa nyid ni yi
180a7('bum): ge ma ma chis pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni yo ge ma mchis pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid ni so ga ma mchis pa'o// don dam pa stod
180a8('bum): nyid mi gem mchis par/ chus byas stong nyid na mi gas ma yi pa'o// sus ma byas song banyid naso zhem mchis pa'o/ mtha' 'as 'das pa stong panyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// thog ma dang sa ma myed/ 
180b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid ni mi gem mchis pa'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni mi ga ma mchis pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid
180b2('bum): stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yo ge ma mchis pa'o// dngos po myeng ngam
180b3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni yo ge ma mchis pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 
180b4('bum): dbang po rnams ni oM ge ma mchis pa'o// stobs rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa/ 'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni yi ge ma mchis
180b5('bum): ba'o// 'phags pa'i 'den pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// bas ma gtan rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// tshad myed pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
180b6('bum): ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rnam par tha rad pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / 
180b7('bum): smon pa myed pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnas
180b8('bum): ni yi ga ma mchis pa'o// myi 'jigs pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni yo ge ma mchis pa'o// snying rje chen po ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni
181a1('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'o// masas sa ma sa bya ma thams / sa sams rgya nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi tham
181a2('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid la/ yi ge ma mchis pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par chags par bgyid cing / yi ge ma mchis pa'i brtson 'grus kyi sa
181a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la mngon par chags
181a4('bum): par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i phyirang stong pa nyid
181a5('bum): la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i phyin/ nga stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang
181a6('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'i chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par
181a7('bum): chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis
181a8('bum): pa'i thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par chags
181b1('bum): par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i myi
181b2('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang
181b3('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'i dngos po myong ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i yang dag par
181b4('bum): spong ba rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i dbang po rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / 
181b5('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa/ dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon bar chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'phags pa'i lam
181b6('bum): yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang yi ge ma mchis pa'i bsam gtan rnams la mngon par chags par
181b7('bum): bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i tshad myed pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam
181b8('bum): par tha rad pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo
182a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i ting rje
182a2('bum): 'dzin rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par chags par
182a3('bum): bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i myi 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i so so yang dag par yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge
182a4('bum): ge ma mchis pa'i snying rje chen po la mngon par chags par bgyid/ pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam das la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i
182a5('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par chags bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
182a6('bum): la mngon par chags par bgyid na de 'ang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor
182a7('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / zhu ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 
182a8('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa'i tshe/ yul gyi yad la byed pa dang / skam pa'amam/ yul gyi yid la bya ba mang po bskyed na/ rab 'byorar de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par
182b1('bum): byo'o/ rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa' ba'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / shu ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun nub par byed pa/ 
182b2('bum): dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgo ba'i che grong gi yid la bya ba dang / grong dal gyi yid la bya ba dang / khams kyi yid la bya ba dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi yid la bya ba dang / khyim gyi yid la bya ba dang / bla ma dang ma
182b3('bum): po'i yid la bya ba dang / ma dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / pha dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / phu nu dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / sring mo dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / gnyen pa shes dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / rkun
182b4('bum): po dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / bya drar ba dang ldan pa'i da pa yin la bya ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / sprul 'tshong ma dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / bud myed dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / yid
182b5('bum): la bya ba gzhan mang po sbyin/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang 'i 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'jo ga pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/ 
182b6('bum): bar chad bya ba'i phyir/ bdud sdig to can 'khrug par 'gyur ba nye bar sbyor te/ de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
182b7('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/ kha dang / bkur bsti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / chos gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang po byung
182b8('bum): la/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung dbog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa'i tshe/ de dag
183a1('bum): gir myong bar byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin
183a2('bum): du yid la byed pa'i tshe/ bar chad de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung
183a3('bum): 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa'i tshe/ bdud sdig to can dag mdo sde zab mo gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / 
183a4('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i
183a5('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dag nye bar bsnyen par byed de// de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i ri gas kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo thabs mkhas pas/ bdud kyi bsnyen pa'i
183a6('bum): mdo sde zab mo de dag la 'dod pa myi bskyed de// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs myi mkhas pa dag ni shes
183a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ spang bar sems te/ de la ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la thabs mkhas pa'ang rgya cher bstan da te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las
183a8('bum): kyang thabs mkhas pa cher btsal bar bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
183b1('bum): dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las thabs mkhas pa btsal bar sems pa yod na/ rab 'byor de'ang byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig pa bya'o// 
183b2('bum): shes rab// / bam po bcu gsum pa// / rab 'byor de gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya bar dag
183b3('bum): la/ chos smra ba ni phyi shol byed na/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang chos smra ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri ba dang
183b4('bum): gung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya bar phyi shol myi byed la/ chos nyan pa ni yul gzhan du 'gro na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par
183b5('bum): bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya bar 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni yul gzhan du 'gro na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub
183b6('bum): sos dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni khe dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad ba lhur len cing / gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad lhur
183b7('bum): len la/ chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa nyung zhing / chog shes la rab tu dben zhing brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myi g.yeng ba na sems rtse gcig tu 'dus pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa zhig ste/ khe dang / bkur bstis
183b8('bum): gas na rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'jog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sas dpa' sems dada' chen pos phud kyi las su rig
185a1('bum): par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni/ 'dod pa chung zhing chog shes la rab tu dben zhing brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myi g.yeng ba/ sems rtse gcig tu 'dus pa// shes rab / 
185a2('bum): sna bzhin te// da bgrang gas 'dzags pa chom na par 'dod pa dang / sreg tu yos pa/ dang / bku sti dang / tshigs su 'ayang ba snor len kyang / thos dang / zas dang / mal ma pa/ 
185a3('bum): rkyen ci dang / so byad ltar le nas rab 'byor de yang shes rabakyis romang tu byed pa'as mo ba 'dri ba dang / lung 'thag pa dang / kha tor byed pa'i rgyud byed dang phyi ldan pa sbe par byo de yang byang chul
185a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab da'abyor nga gzhan yang chos smra ba ni/ dgond pa pa/ bsod snyoms pa phya dar khrod pa/ zas phyis myi len pa/ stan gcig pa/ ji thob
185a5('bum): pa'i bsod snyoms len pa/ dur khrod pa/ bla gab myed pa/ shing drung pa/ cog pu pa/ gzhi ji bzhin pa/ chos gos gsum par gyur/ la/ chos nyan pa ni/ dgon pa pa ma yin/ bsod snyoms pa ma yi
185a6('bum): phyag dar khrod pa ma yin/ zas phyis myi len pa ma yin/ stan gcig pa ma yid/ ji thob pa'i bsod snyoms len pa ma yin/ dur khrod pa ma yin/ bla gab myed pa ma yin/ shing drung ba ma yin/ cog pu pam
185a7('bum): yin/ gzhi ji bzhin pa yin/ chos gos gsum pa ma yin na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de
185a8('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdu kyi las su reg par rig par bya'o// par 'byos gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni dgon pa nga sod soms na phyag rab thod lams kyis myi med pa
185a9('bum): gan ga pas ji ma'i pa yo mas led ga cang thong sa thas byed pa shi chung ba so tha gni ci zhi pa chos ses gsas pa gyu pa masas da las yong/ sa
185b1('bum): ma yin// phyag dang khrod pa yin/ zas phyis myi len pa ma yin/ spyan gcig pa ma yin/ ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms len pa ma yin/ dur khrod pa ma yin/ tha gab myed pa ma yod/ shing rlung ba ma yod chog tha
185b2('bum): ma ma yin zla gzhi ji bzhin du ma yin/ chos gos gsum pa ma yin na// rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'jog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan bste/

185b4('bum): lung 'bog par 'dod/ kha ton byed par 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni ma da pa/ tshul khrims ngan pa can/ sdig pa'i chos can zhig ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bri bar myi 'dod / lung 'jog
185b5('bum): par myi 'dod/ kha ton byed par myi 'dod na/ rab 'byor dang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang myi ldan pa ste/

185b7('bum): pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar 'dod/ lung 'bog par 'dod/ kha ton byed par 'dod lag chos nyan pa ni ma dad na/ rab 'byorard de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed
185b8('bum): pa'i rgyu rkyen dang myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing
185b9('bum): sems la chags pa myed/ chos nyan pa ni ser sna can/ chags pa'i sems dang ldan zhing / 'jungs par gyur na/ rab 'byor de de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang na lung 'bog pa dang / 
186a1('bum): kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni/ bdog pa thams cad
186a2('bum): yongs su gtong zhing sems la chags pa myed la/ chos smra ba ni sir sna can/ chags pa'i sems dang ldan zhing / 'jungs par gyur dan/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dris
186a3('bum): dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni
186a4('bum): chos smra ba la gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad yongs su gtong bar 'dod la/ chos smra ni len par myi 'dod na rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo
186a5('bum): 'di 'dra ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi lnga na pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshe na pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan
186a6('bum): yang chos smra ba ni glengs pa tsam gyis shes la/ chos nyan pa ni bkri dgos shing tshig lhur len par gyur na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton
186a7('bum): byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni glengs pa tsam gyis shes la/ chos smra ba
186a8('bum): ni bkri dgos shing tshig lhur len par gyur na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang
186a9('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du
186b1('bum): brjod pa dang / gleng bzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par shes la/ chos nyan pa ni mdo dang
186b2('bum): dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod
186b3('bum): ba dang / gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par myi shes na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor

186b6('bum): smra ba ni mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du rjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba

186b8('bum): ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan la/ chos nyan pa ni pha rol tu phyind
186b9('bum): dris dang myi ldan no// rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi ma 'i ma tu byin pa labu mo 'di 'dri ba dang / zung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed ba'i gyi rkyen dang myi ldan cinarab 'byor
187a1('bum): de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan la/ chos smra ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang myi ldan
187a2('bum): na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor nga de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi

187a7('bum): chos ba ni gzung khro par gyur la/ chos nyan pa ni gzungs mithob na/ rab 'byor de yang zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pabab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / yung 'bog pa dang ka bton byed pa'i rgyu rkye dngamyilan
187a8('bum): bste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gzungs thob par gyur la/ chos smra ba ni gzungs ma thong na// 
187b1('bum): rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi
