187b3('bum): lung 'bog par myi 'dod / kha ton bya bar myi 'dod / mnyan par myi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog par / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang myi ldan pa ste/ 
187b4('bum): rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni bri bar 'dod klag par 'dod/ lung 'bog par 'dod/ kha ton bya
187b5('bum): bar 'dod/ mnyan par 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni bri bar myi 'dod/ klag par myi 'dod/ lung 'bog par myi 'dod kha ton bya bar myi 'do/ ted/ bsgom par myi 'dod par gyur na/ rab 'byor de de yang shes
187b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
187b7('bum): gzhan yang chos smra ba ni 'dod pa'i sred pa dang bral/ gnod sems dang / snyom pa dang / gnyid dang / 'gyod pa dang / bral te/ the tsom dang bral la/ chos nyan pa ni/ 'dod pa'i sred pa dang bcas/ gnod sems dang snyom pa
187b8('bum): dang / gnyid dang / 'gyod pa dang bcas/ the tsom dang / bcas par gyur na/ rab 'byor da de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang myi ldan
188a1('bum): pa ste rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni 'dod ba'i sred pa dang bral la gnod sems dang snyom pa dang / gnyid dang / 'gyod
188a2('bum): ba dang bral / the tsom dang bral/ chos smra ba ni 'dod pa'i sred pa dang bcas/ gnod sems dang / snyom pa dang / gnyid dang / 'gyod pa dang kha cas the tsom dang bcas par gyur na/ rab 'byor da de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
188a3('bum): 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang myi ldan pa'i ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
188a4('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dag/ klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dag kha ton dbyed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/ la zhig der 'ongs te/ sems can dmyal ba'i myi snyan brjod / byor
188a5('bum): song gi skye gnas dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul gyi myi snyan brjod cing / sems can dmyal ba ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal lo// byol song gi skye gnas ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal log yi dgas
188a6('bum): kyi yul ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal lo/ ka khyod kyis sdug bsngal 'di nyid du mthar phyin par gyis shig/ gang sdug bsngal stong phrag mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci
188a7('bum): zhig byas/ khyod yun ring por 'khor ba na 'khor bar gyur ta re zhes zer na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor
188a8('bum): de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byorang gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nang pa zab mo 'di bri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed
188b1('bum): ngag 'chang ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe / la la zhig der 'ongs te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod cing sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi legs parjod/ mche ma'i lha rnams kyi leg
188b2('bum): ba brjod/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi legs parjod/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi legs parjod/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha
188b3('bum): rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi legs parjod/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ snang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs parjod/ chung sdang gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa 'jod/ tshad myed snga
188b4('bum): ba'i lha rnams kyi legs brjod/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs brjod/ dge' ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ chung dge'i lha nam rdzas kyi legs pa brjod/ chang myed dge ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa
188b5('bum): rjod/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi legs parjod/ che ba'i lha rnams kyi le gas pa rjod/ chung che'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs brjod/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams
188b6('bum): kyi legs pa rjod/ myi che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs parjod/ myi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi legs brjod/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi legs brjod/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs brjod / 'og byinagyil
188b7('bum): rnams kyi legs brjod rnams pa mapa' las skye mad kyi lha rnams kyi legs brjod/ rnam shes mapa' las skye mched cil rnams kyi legs brjod / rung bar byed pa'i sgyu mejed kyis rnams kyi legs
188b8('bum): rjod 'du shes byed du shes myed byi bye ma ched kyi rnams kyi legs pa rjod cing / 'dod pa'i 'ams ni 'dod pa'i khams la yi ma myong pas gzugs khas pa rnabams gta ngag tham
189a1('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyis 'di ltar bde'o// gzugs myed pa'i khams ni snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi pa rnams kyis 'di ltar bde ste/ de dag kyang myi rtag cing / sdug bsngal la bdag myed do// rnam par 'gyur
189a2('bum): ba'i chos can/ zang pa'i chos can/ 'jig pa'i chos can/ skye ba'i chos can/ 'gag pa'i chos can yin gyis/ khyod kyis 'di nyid du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyis shig/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
189a3('bum): 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyis shig/ 'di nyid du rang byang chub thob par gyis shig/ phyin chad 'khor bar gyis shig ces zer na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol
189a4('bum): tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// 
189a5('bum): rab 'byor de gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gcig pu ste/ zla myed cing bdag gas byed pa yin la/ chos nyan pa ni 'khor gyi nang bu gnas na rab 'byo/ rang de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'di
189a6('bum): ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gcig
189a7('bum): bu ste/ zla myed cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/ chos smra ba ni 'khor gyi nang na gnas na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang myi
189a8('bum): ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gcig pu ste/ zla myed cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/ chos
189b1('bum): nyan pa ni tshogs yongs su sdud na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa'
189b2('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gcig pu ste/ zla myed cing bdag gis byed pa yin pa/ chos smra ba ni tshogs yongs su sdud na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab
189b3('bum): kyipha rolang tu byi nang pazab mo 'di 'dri dag lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang byi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen thos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// 
189b4('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni/ 'di nang du zhu pa'i 'i bzhin la nga brang ba de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa 'dri ba sbyin no zhes bas chos nyan padeni phyi bzhin 'brang na/ rab 'byor de yang zhes
189b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor dade yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud
189b6('bum): kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni drung du 'gro ba'i skabs myi 'byed na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
189b7('bum): phyi nang pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
189b8('bum): gzhan yang nam smra pa'i bang ba chung ra gyi byi ge rab kyi la mid tu dpa ba po 'di 'di thug par 'a/ slob tu gzhug par da / lung log par 'dod patan byed du tsun pa ma nga
190a1('bum): chos nyan pa ni zang zing cung zad kyi phyir drung du 'gro bar ma mos na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang myi ldan pa ste/ rab
190a2('bum): 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni/ zang zing cung zad kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bri bar 'dod/ klog par 'dod
190a3('bum): lung 'bog par 'dod / kha ton byed par 'dod / bsgom par 'dod/ nyan par 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni zang zing cung zad kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sbyin par myi 'dod 'drir gzhug par myi 'dod/ klog du
190a4('bum): gzhug par myi 'dod/ lung 'bog par myi 'dod/ kha ton byed du gzhug par myi 'dod/ bsgom du gzhug par myi 'dod/ nyan du gzhug par myi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri
190a5('bum): ba dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang bya/ ngang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rigan par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni/ gang du srog
190a6('bum): gi bar chad du 'gyur ba'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos nyanab ni der 'gro bar myi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha re// lang du phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / 
190a7('bum): kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gang du srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba'i
190a8('bum): phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni der 'gro bar myi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang myi ldan pa ste
190b1('bum): rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gang na zas dkon pa dang / gang na chu dkon pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/ 
190b2('bum): chos nyan 'a dir 'gro bar myi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems
190b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gang na bas dkon pa dang / chu dkon pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni der 'gro bar myi 'dong na/ rab
190b4('bum): 'byor da de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang myi ldan ba ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
190b5('bum): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor dgazha na yang chos smra ba ni gang na zas mod pa dang / chu mong ba'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos nyan pa yang rjes su 'brang na/ 
190b6('bum): des de la 'di skang du/ rigs kyi bu khyod pang zing gi don du song ste ci rung / legs par bsam pa sems par gyis shig/ zas thob mthob dang / gsod myi gsod kyis 'gyod par gyur ta re zhes rer na/ de
190b7('bum): phyir chos bstan pa des kyang babs phra mos chos la spang ba byas par 'gyur te/ de yang myi dgal zhing 'di snyam du 'du shes te/ 'din sbyin par 'dod pa'i mtshan ma ma yin gyi/ spong ba'i mtshan ma yin no// 
190b8('bum): snyam na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byorang de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
191a1('bum): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang dge' slong chos smra ba ni/ gang na rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom po'i 'jigs pa dang / rngon pa'i 'jigs pa dang ga/ gcan
191a2('bum): zan khro ba'i 'jigs pa dang / sbrul gyi 'jigs pa dang / 'brog dgon pa 'jigs pa yod pa der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos nyan pa dag kyang chos kyi don tu chos kyis skom zhing rjes su 'brang na/ dge' slong chos sna
191a3('bum): bas chos nyan pa de dag la 'di skad smra ste/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed gang na rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom po'i 'jigs pa dang / rngon pa'i 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan khro ba'i 'jigs pa dang / sbrul gyi 'jigs
191a4('bum): pa dang / 'brog dgon pa'i 'jigs pa yod pa der dong ste/ dzi n+da/ zhes de ltar dge' slong chos smra ba des/ chos myi bstan pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'drir gzhug
191a5('bum): bar myi 'dod/ klog tu gzhug par myi 'dod/ lung 'bog par myi 'dod/ kha ton byed du gzhug par myi 'dod/ nyan du gzhug par myi 'dod par gyur la/ de dag gis dge slong chos smra ba'i tshig
191a6('bum): de dag thos nas/ myi dga' zhing myi dga' ba'i tshul can du gyur te/ dge slong chos smra ba gang na ba der 'gro bar myi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang
191a7('bum): lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang dge slong chos
191b1('bum): smra ba ni/ bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong khyer gtso bor byed par gyur te/ de bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong khyer gtso bor gyur dra pa/ bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong de dag yang dang yang blta bar sems shing / 
191b2('bum): der yang dang yang blta bas/ chos nyan pa'i phyir zlog cing / tshe dang ldan pa dag ngas ni bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong lta dgos te/ bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong du 'gro dgos so zhes nas
191b3('bum): des chos nyand pa de dag phyir bzlog pa'i phyir 'dod na/ rang 'byor de de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyend myi
191b4('bum): ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 'a chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan/ yang bdud sdig to can/ dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing ji nas
191b5('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di su'ang 'dri bar myi 'gyur ba dang / lung 'bog par myi 'gyur ba dang / kha ton byed par myi 'gyur ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed par myi 'gyur ba de lta de ltar thabs sbyor/ 
191b6('bum): ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji'i slad du/ bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byang du bgyis shi / dzi nas
191b7('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di su yang 'dri bar myi 'gyur ba dang / lung 'bog par myi 'gyur ba dang / kha ton bgyid par myi 'gyur ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par myi 'gyur ba de lta de ltar
192a1('bum): thabs sbyor ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da 'di la bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing / 'di skad du nged kyis ji ltar khong du chud pa 'di ni shes rab
192a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yin te/ ji skad du khyed klog pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no zhes dben byed cing / zlog la mos pa myed par byed do// rab 'byor de de la bdud sdig to can gyis de ltar dbyen byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub
192a3('bum): sems dpa' gang lung ma bstand pa de dag ni the tsom skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag the tsom du gyur nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di myi 'dri bar 'gyur/ myi klog par 'gyur/ lung myi 'bog par 'gyur/ kha ton
192a4('bum): myi byed par 'gyur/ myi sgom par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi// byed par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa za// ba mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan
192a5('bum): ba ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdus da kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag dge slong nga gi cha byad du byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung / 
192a6('bum): du 'ongs shing 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon tu byed par 'gyur te/ rgyund tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par/ 
192a7('bum): 'gyur ro// de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro// de ni rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ro zhes zer na/ des tshig de thos nas
192b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la myi spyod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyend myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de de yang
192b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ bar chad du 'gyur ba'i bdud kyi las
192b3('bum): mang du 'byung ste/ bdud kyi las de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rig par byas nas rnam par spang bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
192b4('bum): kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa rig par bgyi ste/ spang bar bgyi ba de dag gang lags/ 
192b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las rab 'byorang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i gzugs
192b6('bum): na ni / khyod com grus kyi la tu phyin pa'i glazugs parnyan da kyi sa/ rab 'byor 'dod pa'i byed pa'i gzunas na ni / 'byor
192b7('bum): kyi cod na sbyin por gzugs n+ti kyi la/ rang 'byor sbyin pa sa rol tu phyi pa'i gzugs ni dud gyis so// de dag kyang chubasems dpa rimam pa chen pa
193a1('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa
193a2('bum): nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang
193a3('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi na pa
193a4('bum): bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
193a5('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo mtshan ma myed pa dang / rnam par thard pi'i sgo smond pa myed pa gang gis rgyund tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang
193a6('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la nye bar snyed du/ 
193a7('bum): te de yang de la dka' ba skyed na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa'
193a8('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag/ sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du lus gser gyi kha dog dang / myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang
193b1('bum): 'od 'dom gang par ldan par byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mos paskyed do// des mos pa bskyed nas rnam pa
193b2('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid las yongs su nyams par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkye nad myi ldan pa ste/ rab
193b3('bum): 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi mo de'i bdun du sangs rgyas la bsdogs pa'i dge slong
193b4('bum): gi dge 'dun nye bar ston te/ des de la 'dod pa skyed cing / bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom rab yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di lta bur shog shig
193b5('bum): ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'dis tshogs yongs su bsdus pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa 'di chos ji ltar stond pa de bzhin du/ 
193b6('bum): bdag gis kyang chos bstand par bya'o zhes/ de de la 'dod pa skyed pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid las yongs su nyam par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / 
193b7('bum): lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyend myi ldan pa ste rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag
193b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ba rgya phrag dum byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag du ma/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
194a1('bum): gapa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rolal tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab
194a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de lta bu dag nye bar ston te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag la 'dod pa skyed par 'gyur ro// des de dag la 'dod pa bskyed nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
194a3('bum): pa nyid las yongs su nyam par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / sgom pa dang / 
194a4('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i rgyu rkyen da myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos da bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de de ci'i phyir
194a5('bum): zhan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la gzugs myed do// tshor ba myed do// 'du shes myed do// 'du byed myed do// rnam par shes pa myed do// myig myed do// rma byed do// sna myed do// 
194a6('bum): lnga myed do// lus myed do// yid myed do// gzugs myed do// sgra myed do// dri myed do// ro myad do// reg myed do// chos myed do// myig gi rnam par shes pa byed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed do// sna'i rnam par
194a7('bum): sapa myed do// lha'i rnam par shes pabyed do// las kyi rnam pa shes pabyud // da kyi rnam pa shes pa myed do// phyag gi dus te ga pa byud // ba'i 'dus te ga pargyad do// lnga'i dus tag brgyad
194a8('bum): lha'i chus cirig pa skyed do// sus kyi 'chus te ga byed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa byed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis chor brgyad do// na pa'i 'dus te reg pa'i byed kyis tshong brgyad do// 'i 'dus te na
194b1('bum): ba'i rkyed kyis tshor ba skyed do// lnga'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyed kyis tshor ba skyed do// lus kyi 'dus pa reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba byed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skyed do// sri'i khams myed do// 
194b2('bum): chu'i khams myed do// rgya'i khams byed do// rlung gi khams myed do// nam ma kha'i khams myed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams byed do// ma rig pa myed do// 'du byed myed do// rnam par shes pa myed do// mying dang gzugs
194b3('bum): myed do// skye mched drug myed do// reg pa myed do// tshor ba myed do// sred pa myed do// lend pa myed do// srid pa myed do// skye ba myed do// rga shi myed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
194b4('bum): myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// nang stong pa nyid myed do// phyi stong pa
194b5('bum): nyid pad do// phyi nang stong pa nyid myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed do// chen po stong pa nyid myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed do// 
194b6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed do// rang gi tshen
194b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed do// dngos po byed pa stong pa nyid myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myed do// 
194b8('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams myed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myed do// dbang po rnams myed do// stobs rnams myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed do// 
195a1('bum): 'a phags pa'i bden pa rnams myed do// bsam gtan rnams myed do// tshad myed pa rnams myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myed do// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad myed do// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
195a2('bum): ma byed do// rnam par 'a'ad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / khacan ma sbed pa dang / smon pa myed pa byed do// mngon par shes pa rnams byed do/ ting nge 'dzin rnams byed do// zungs kyi so rnams myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 'du byed do// byi 'jigs pa bzhi byed do/ 
195a3('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi myed do// byams pa chen po myed do// snying rje chen po myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad myed do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myed do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed do// 
195a4('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid myed do// rang byang chub byed do// thams cad shes pa nyid myed dog lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid myed do// rab 'byor nga gang la gzugs byed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do
195a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' byed do// rang sangs rgyas byed do// nyan thos byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo te gang la tshor ba myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ byang chub sems dpa' byed do// 
195a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na / rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la 'du shes myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos
195a7('bum): myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la 'du byed myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
195a8('bum): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la rnam par shes pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor nga chos
195b1('bum): mas par ni rang bzhin gyis gang po gagang la myig byed pa de la sangs rgyas byung dog byang chub sems dpa' byed do// rang sangs rgyas spyod dog/ nyan thos kyang // de ci'i phyir na ga rab 'byor chos thams pang ni rang bzhin gyis stong sa
195b2('bum): gang brna ba myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ rang sangs rgyas myed do nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la sna myed pa de la
195b3('bum): sangs rgyas myed do / byang chub sems dpa' myed do ga rang sangs rgyas myed do nyan thos byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la lde myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do
195b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed do ga rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la lus myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// 
195b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chosathams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la yid myed pa de la
195b6('bum): sangs rgyas byed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la gzugs byed pa de la
195b7('bum): sangs rgyas byed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la sgra myed pa de la sangs rgyas
195b8('bum): myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la dri byed pa de la sangs
196a1('bum): gargyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir ne na/ rab 'byor dachos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la re myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub
196a2('bum): masems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la reg myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang
196a3('bum): sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la chos myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos
196a4('bum): myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong nga ngo // gang la myig gi rnam par shes pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang byachub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// 
196a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / gang la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// 
196a6('bum): deci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis spyong ngo // gang la sna'i rnam par shes pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
196a7('bum): 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la lce'i rnam par shes pa myed pa de la spangs rgyas skyed do// byung chub sems dbu' byed do// rangasangs rgyus med do// rgyun thos myed do/ deci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos
196a8('bum): thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da chos
196b1('bum): thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis spong ngo // gang la yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni ra
196b2('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis
196b3('bum): stong ngo // gang la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong
196b4('bum): gang la sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub de sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de nga'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // 
196b5('bum): gang la lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong
196b6('bum): gang la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la myig gi 'dus
196b7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la rna ba'i 'dus te reg
196b8('bum): ma'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la sna'i 'dus te reg
197a1('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la lce'i
197a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la
197a3('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis
197a4('bum): stong ngo // gang la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed doka/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga chos
197a5('bum): thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la sa'i khams myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos
197a6('bum): thams cad ni stong bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la chu'i khams myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' byed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin
197a7('bum): kyis // kyi'i lamam byed de sa sangs rgyas byed do// nu sems dpa byed do// ngas ma sa byed do// po myed do// dpo'i phyi rden/ sa khyo chos pas pa ni 'i kyi / 
197a8('bum): 'chung gim 'am byed pa des sangs rgyas myed do// byang cu mas da byed do/ ngasangs rgya byed do// nyin pos byed do// deba'i phyir nen/ rar byor chos bams cad ni nga bzhi kyim songango // gang rnams che/ 
197b1('bum): khams byed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' byed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// na thos byed do// ci'i phyir zhe na/ ra' 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis spong ngo // ngas nasu pa gres pa'i ban
197b2('bum): myed pa de la sangs rgyas byed do// byang chub sems dpa' byed do// rang sangs rgyas byed do// nyan thos med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang lam rig pa myed pa de la sangs
197b3('bum): rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la 'du byed myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ 
197b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos mye da do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la rnam par shes pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// 
197b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la mying dang gzugs myed pa'i de la sangs
197b6('bum): rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la skye mched drug myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// 
197b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' byed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la reg pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems
197b8('bum): dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la tshor ba myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// 
198a1('bum): rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la sred pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems
198a2('bum): dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la le nang pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub
198a3('bum): sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ngade chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la srid pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub
198a4('bum): sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la skye ba myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed
198a5('bum): do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga cho sa thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la rga shi myed pa
198a6('bum): de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la sbyin pa'i pha
198a7('bum): rol tu phyind pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // 
198a8('bum): gang sa chug khrims kyi pha rold tu phyin pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad
198b1('bum): ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
198b2('bum): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan
198b3('bum): thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do/

201b8('bum): myed pa yang dag byar rtsoms pa'i ku sus skyed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang
202a1('bum): rtso pa mas se tsha gyur 'dun pa bsang ste rigs kyi nalas rigs kyi ma sa pa 'i sa tu dpa'ab so 'di d+hi ba dang/ 
202a2('bum): ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / stond pa dang / 'tshul zhin du yid la byed pa dag la'ang bar chad du 'gyur ba mang ngo // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper ma 'das bu gling 'di'i rin po
202a3('bum): mche gser dang nor bu dang / mu tig dang khye du rgya dang / dung dang / man gshel dang byur ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag ni bar chad du 'gyur ba mang zhing / phyir
202a4('bum): rgol ba sang ba dag go// rab 'byor nga de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi mo shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa zabaco 'di 'dri ba ba dang klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa/ 
202a5('bum): dang ga ga ton byed pa dang / stond pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag la'ang bdud kyi las mang po 'byung bar 'gyu ra ro bar cang mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro phyir sgrol
202a6('bum): ba mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro / rab 'byor kyis gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin no// bde bar gshegs pa de ni de bzhin no ga 'jam bu gling 'ang ni rin po che gser dang / nor bu dang gsu
202a7('bum): tig dang / bye dur rA dang dung dang man shes dang / byur ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram gang ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag ni bar chad du 'gyur ba mang zhing slar rgol ba mang ba lags so/ bcom ldan
202a8('bum): 'das de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di 'dra ba dang / klob pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha tron bgyid pa dang stond pa dang ga tshul ban
202b1('bum): yid la bgyid pa de dag ma 'ang 'dud kyi las mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bar chad mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// slar rgol ba mang po 'byung bar 'gyur/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu glen pa
202b2('bum): gang rigs kyi bu dang ka rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton du bgyid pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid bdag gi bar
202b3('bum): chad bgyid pa ni bdud kyi byin gyis rlabs pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu glen pa de dag ni blo na chung zhing / blo gnad par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan skyes bu glen pa gdu rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang bza
202b4('bum): mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'brog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag gi brar chad bgyid pa de dag ni blo rgya shinang du chung bar 'gyur te gsapa
202b5('bum): rgyas kyi chos rlabs po che dag gi sems myi 'jug go// ded cag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di myi 'dri myi glog lung 'bog kha ton gyi bgyid kyi sgom/ tshul bzhin du yid
202b6('bum): la gyi bgyid de// gzhan 'dri 'ang klog pa dang / kha ton bgyid pa dang / smyon pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dag la 'dra bar chad bgyid par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ 
202b7('bum): rab 'byor de ba'i no// de de ban te/ rigs kyi bubs rigs kyi bumo pa ges rab kyi pa rolang tu phyin pa zab po'ang ci 'drin kyi rog lung gyi 'a'og 'khon gyi bcid partso skom tshul ba'i
202b8('bum): bu la la myi byed cing gzhas 'jig dang / zlos pa dang / lung 'dog pa dang / 'aton med pa dang / gon pa dang/ tshus pazhid du med la brgyad pa dag gi bar chad kyang pa de dag ga 'drang nga
203a1('bum): kyis rlabs pa theb pa la gapar du zhugs pa dge pa'i rnab bskyed ba/ dge ba'i chu ba shin tu rung ba/ sngon gyi rgyal pa la dag pa'i rnal sa sgrubs pa/ dag pa'i bshes
203a2('bum): gyis yongs su ma 'bri nad pa sha stag 'byung ste/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ blo chung zhing / blo zhand par 'gyur rol rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin/ 
203a3('bum): pa 'di myi 'dri ga myi glog/ lung myi 'bog kha don myi byed/ myi sgom tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / gzhan 'dri ba dang / glog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / stonang
203a4('bum): pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dag gi 'bar chad byed pa dag ni blo rgya shi nad tu chung bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rlabs po dag la/ de dgra gi sems myi 'jug go// rab 'byor
203a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang ka klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / stond pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dag la khadud
203a6('bum): kyi las 'di dag kyang 'byung mod kyi/ 'ond kyang / rab 'byo rang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing / klog pa dang / lung 'bog cing / kha ton
203a7('bum): byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / gong du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / rtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ 
203a8('bum): byed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sbyinang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
203b1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / gong du nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed pa
203b2('bum): dngag stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / don dam pa stong pa panyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid
203b3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / 'dus pa byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed mamatha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / thog sa dang thas myeng ba snang ya
203b4('bum): pa byes gdor ba myed pa pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzog das par byed pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs
203b5('bum): su rdzogs par byed pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / dngos po myed
203b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang
203b7('bum): gong du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnaMs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / rdza 'phral gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su
203b8('bum): rdzogs par byed pa dang / dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / yongs su rmugs par byed pa dang / 'phags
204a1('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / gong du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa
204a2('bum): shAdang / tshad myed pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang pa gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed
204a3('bum): pa dang / mtha ra kyi gnas pa'i snyoms par dgu pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs
204a4('bum): par byed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / 
204a5('bum): de bzhin gshes pa'i stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed/ pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed
204a6('bum): bdu donams sos su rdzogs pa spyad bdang / sa rgyas mos pa 'dres pa rnams yongs su rtogs par byed pa dang / thams ca shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / las kyi
204a7('bum): bar shes pa nyid/ yongs su rdzogs par byed pacing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed na// rab 'byor de ni sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin par shes par bya ste/ des rigs kyi bu dang
204a8('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri'o// klog go// lung 'dog go// kha ton byed do// tshul bzhin du yid la byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zab mo 'di nyid
204b1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// gong du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa
204b2('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sbyind pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// gong du nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa
204b3('bum): byed do// phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do
204b4('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 'dus dbyas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 'dus ma byas stongapa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
204b5('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ror ba myeng pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su
204b6('bum): rdzogs par byed dog chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rang ga mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par kyang dog dngos myong/ 
204b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ra ba nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa 'ing ba nyid stong pa nyid yos su rdzogs par byung ngo // gong du sa ci ba dgazhag pa rnams yo/ 
204b8('bum): rjes par byad pa slong sa pan su gas pa byed do// chu 'phru rtson pa sa ngas su rdzogs pa rgyad dang/ yang po ma sos la kyang // 
205a1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed dog/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// gong du 'phags pa'i lam bden pa
205a2('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed dogachad myed pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed po/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 
205a3('bum): rnam ma 'thadad pa brgyad yo sas 'a gongs su rdzob to/ rnam par tharang pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ mthar kyi
205a4('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par bya dad do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang // mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mngon par shes
205a5('bum): pa na sa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ting nge 'dzind rnams ma ngas su rdzogs par byed do// gzungs kyi rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongasu
205a6('bum): rdzogs par byed do myi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnam sa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi/ 
205a7('bum): sa rnams s+ho sa su 'ogs pa snad do/ sa gas pacid bangs su nogs pa byed do/ sa gyims pa la byung rdzogs par byed do/ rnam pathams cangs myong
205a8('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
205b1('bum): phyin dpa 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / stand pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs
205b2('bum): shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di 'bri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / ste nad pa dang / tshul bzhin du
205b3('bum): yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi sgo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
205b4('bum): tu phyind pa 'di bri ba dang / klag pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa dang / stand pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba 'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas
205b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang ci snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bri ba dang / klag pa
205b6('bum): dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / stanang pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do byang shar gyi phyogs sarnams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhug
205b7('bum): shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dadag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bri ba dang // klag pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / stand pa dang tshul bzhin/ 
205b8('bum): du yid la bye ba 'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad dog shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dri snyed cig bzhugs shing 'a skyong ba de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu ma
206a1('bum): gang dag gis gas ras kyi 'omang du phyind pa 'di bri ba dang / klag pa dang lung 'brog pa dang / maton b+ha ba dang / smand pa dang / rdul bani du 'di 'a bya ba'i byang bangs pa sang dog sgo chung bya phyog
206a2('bum): mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skye ba de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bri ba dang / klag pa dang / lung 'bog
206a3('bum): pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / stand pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do// nung byad kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag
206a4('bum): kyang rigs kyi bu rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa 'di bri ba dang / klag pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / stand pa dang / tshul bzhi nang du yid la bya ba'i phyir
206a5('bum): dgongs pa mdzad do// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
206a6('bum): byind pa 'di bri ba dang / klag pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / snyan pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad dog steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang
206a7('bum): skyed kyig bzugs pa na na sna nga kyang byas kyi myu/ gas kyikyis de dag gi sags pa pa sod kyi pa 'di bri dang / khag pa dang dung 'bos pa dang na bya ba dang / na bdu
206a8('bum): bzhin gyi ngos bya kyi 'i bangs pa ma dang // phyogs kyi khyang chub sems dpa' mas dpa' na po rgyad gyi ldog pa yang snyed pa dag kyang rigs kyi zung nga / sa kyi bu mos / 
206b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyirang pa 'dri zhing klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / stond pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu rtsonang par byed cing yongs su 'dzin pa byedado// lho phyogs
206b2('bum): kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyar myi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang ga kyi rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / lung 'brog pa dang / kha tan
206b3('bum): byed pa dang / skyo nang dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du tsartsond par byed cing song su 'dzind pa byed do// nub phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir gyi ldog bas
206b4('bum): gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang / gas kyi bumashes dag kyi bar mang du phyind pa 'di 'dri 'ang klog pa dang / lungal dacig pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / gnang pa dang / tshul bzhin
206b5('bum): du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu rlon par byed cing yongs su 'dzin pa byed do// byang phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'a chen po phyir myi ldog pa gang de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs
206b6('bum): kye bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol phyind pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / stond pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin
206b7('bum): pa byed do// byang sharang phyogs mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang
206b8('bum): 'dri zhing klog pa dang / lung 'jog pa dang maton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du med la byed pa de dag gi don du stonang par byed cing yongs su 'dzind pa byed do// gar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi
207a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang
207a2('bum): lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed dang / stond pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa 'de dag gi don du rtsond par byed cing yongs su 'dzind pa byed do// lho nub kyi bye mtshams kyi byang chub
207a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byar myi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dra zhing klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / 
207a4('bum): khabor byed pa dang / stond pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed nga ba de dag gi don du rtsonang par byed cing yongs su 'dzin pa byed nga ngo// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi byang chub sems
207a5('bum): dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang ri gas kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton
207a6('bum): byed dang / stond pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu rtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzind pa byed do// 'og phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog
207a7('bum): pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang stond pa dang / tshul bzhin
207a8('bum): du yid la byed pa de dag gi donang du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzinang pa byed do// steng gi phyogs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog pa gang ji snyed
207b1('bum): pa de dag kyang deshes kyi bu dang byigs kyi rdzu bas kyi paro lang tu sbyind pa 'di 'di nying klog pa dang / lung 'dzag pa dang / kha to byed pa dang / sbyor ba dang / dul ba'i du nga
207b2('bum): byed pa de dag ga don tu btsund par byed cing yongs su 'dzin pa byed do/ rab 'byorang 'di sa ste dper ni/ bud byed la khrig la bu lnga 'a/ tsu ma nyi shum khru
207b3('bum): bzhi bcu 'am/ lnga bcu 'am/ rgya'am/ stong zhig yod na/ de dag ni sa de ji nas kyang // myin par bya'i phyir rtsond par byed cing / bdag gi ma 'di ji ltar na/ nad myed par 'gyur/ dad/ 
207b4('bum): cag gi ma 'di lnga ji ltar na bar chad du myi 'gyur/ bdag dacag gi ma 'di ji ltar na/ ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ bdag cag gi ma 'di ring du 'tsho bar bya na ji ltar bya// bdag
207b5('bum): cag gi ma 'di lus la myi bde ba'i nyams myed par bya na ji ltar bya/ 'di ni bdag cag/ skyad skyed pa ste/ srog gi sbyin bdag go zhes de dag ma de la rim gro
207b6('bum): legs par bya bas rim gro byed do// de dag ni 'di'i srog gi bar chad du gyur tu 'ong ngo // lus nyom chung ngu gyur tu 'ang // lus la sha sbrang dang sbrang bu dang sbru lang gyis
207b7('bum): ces pa'i myi bde bas bab du 'ong ngo // tsha ba dang / grang ba dang / dkris pa dang / skom pas myi bde bar 'gyur tu 'ong ngo / zhes phu dung le nad par bya bas phu dud du byed do// de
207b8('bum): lta bu de dag ma de la 'di ni bdag cag skyed skyed pa'o// 'di ni 'jig rtend 'di stond pa'o zhes bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis/ rgyu nang tu rim gro byed cing sti stang dang
208a1('bum): bkur sti cher byed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par sa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
208a2('bum): rtag tu rgyu nang kyi chad par gzigs shing dgongs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di ni bdag cag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skyed bu'o// 'jigs rten 'di ston stonang ba'o zhes rgyun
208a3('bum): tu gzigs shing dgongs sog shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing
208a4('bum): 'gro sbyong dang / chos stod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de drag kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu byin pa lab mo 'di la / sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun gyi chad par gzigs shing nongs sog lho phyogs
208a5('bum): kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhind gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang/ sa rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston
208a6('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyu nad myi chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/ nub phyogs kyi 'jigs rten gyi khams gang gA'i
208a7('bum): klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos stond pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi
208a8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la ga sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun myi chad par gzigs shing dgongs sog/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
208b1('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos stonang pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa 'ab mo 'di la
208b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyu nang myi chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/ byang sha rad kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jigs rtend gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
208b3('bum): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos stonang pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zab mo la sangs rgyas
208b4('bum): kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyu nad myi chad par zigs shing dgongs daso sharang lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams pa dang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshes pa dgra bci
208b5('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig btsun sa shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos stonang pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
208b6('bum): zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyu nang myi chad par gzigs shing rgongs so// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rte nad gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ 
208b7('bum): som pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos stonang pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyinang pa lab mo 'dil
208b8('bum): sangs rgyas kyi spyad gyis rtag tu rgyun gyi chad par gzigs shing dgongs so// nub byang gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na de bzhinang gshegs pa dgra bcom
209a1('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos stond pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la/ 
209a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun myi chad par gzigs shing dgongs so// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jigs rte nad gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs/ 
209a3('bum): sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la sangs kyis kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyunang myi chad pa/ 
209a4('bum): gzigs shing dgongs so// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jigs rte nad gyi khyi ngas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig
209a5('bum): bzhugs shings 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos stonang pa'i sangs rgyasabacom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu byed pa bab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyu na myi chad par gzhi/ 
209a6('bum): shing dgongs so de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams skyed skyed pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes 'di'ang ston
209a7('bum): skyerang pa'o// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu byinang pa zab mo 'di la sangs kyis kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyur myi dad par ban
209a8('bum): gong dgongs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na// 'di las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsam pan gyi pha yod tu phyi rang pa'i// 'di las byung bani/ 
209b1('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// 'di las 'byung ba ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// 'di las byung ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa'o// 'di las byung ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa'o// 'di
209b2('bum): las byung ba ni/ nang stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni phyi stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni chen po stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba
209b3('bum): ni don dam pa stong pa nyid dob 'di las byung ba ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid/ 'di las byung ba ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni thog ma dang tha ma
209b4('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni rang bzhin/ stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong
209b5('bum): pa nyid dog/ 'di las byung ba ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do// ladi las byung ba ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni dngos po myed pa'i ngog
209b6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so 'di las byung ba ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni dbang po
209b7('bum): rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni stobs rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnam so// 'di las byung ba ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'di las byung ba ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// 'di/ 
209b8('bum): las byung ba ni bsam gtan rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni tshad myed pa rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni rnam par tha rad pa brgyad do// 'di las
210a1('bum): byung ba ni mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o// 'di las byung ba ni// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed dang / smond pa myed pa'o// 'di las byung ba ni mngon par shes pa nas
210a2('bum): so ka 'di las byung ba ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni myi 'jigs pa rnams so// 'di las
210a3('bum): byung ba ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// 'di las byung ni snying rje chen po'o// 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so lngas 'byung ba ni rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras su'o// 'di las byung ba ni
210a4('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// 'di las byung ba ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// 'di las byung ba ni dgra bcom pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni rang byang chub bo// 'di las byung ba ni lam gyi rnam par shes
210a5('bum): ba nyid do / 'di las byung ba ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs nga'i byang chub bo// las byung ba ni rgyu nang tu zhugs pa rnams so/ 'di las byung ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams so// 'di las
210a6('bum): byung ba ni phyir myi 'ong ba rnams so// 'di las 'byung ba ni dgra bcom pa rnams so// 'di las bya ni rang sangs rgyas rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin
210a7('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
210a8('bum): pa zab mo 'di la rtend te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// rab
210b1('bum): 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / sgom pa dang tshul bzhin du yid
210b2('bum): la byed pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas spyan gyis rtag tu rgyu nad myi chad par gzigs shing dgongs so// rab 'byor nga byang chub seMs
210b3('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ci nas kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
210b4('bum): yongs su nyam par myi 'gyur bar rtag tu rgyu nad myi chad par spang ba mdzad do// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni de bzhin gshegs
210b5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams skyen/ pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni 'jig rte nang stong nad pa'o zhes bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes
210b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams skyed pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'jig rten ston
210b7('bum): ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas de bzhin gshegs pas/ bskrund pa lags/ 'jigs rtend ni de bzhin gshegs pas gang la gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das
210b8('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bskyed do// myi 'jigs pa bzhi skyed do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi skyed do// byams
211a1('bum): spyad / sa pa so sang snad / []smra sa mas pa yang ltung @
211a2('bum): cang mkhyen pa nyid bsgreng ngo // rab 'byor chos po dog gis de ni de bzhin gshegs pang rtsa brtsam pa yang dag pa ma rdzags pal brjod do/ rab 'byor de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'dzis
211a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa skyed do// gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhind gshegs pas gsungs pa'i 'jig rten gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsa' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga phung po lnga ni de bzhin
211a4('bum): gshegs pas 'jig rte nang du gsungs so la pa bcom lda/ ngan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zab mos phung po lnga ni ji ltar bstanang pa lags bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
211a5('bum): pha rol tu phyinang pa ni ji ltar byung ba lnga sta rang pa la som ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ shes rab rol tu phyin pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag 'jig par gam
211a6('bum): ma yin/ rab tu 'jig par ston pa ma yin te/ skye zhes bya bar myi stonang to// 'gag ces bya bar myi stonang to// kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya bar myi stonang to// rnam par byang ba zhes
211a7('bum): 8/ 'phel zhes byas bya nga// 'thab sa bya bar gyi sa// blang zhes bya bar gyi snang / ngo nas bya bar byen 'ang / 'as zhes bang du smra / sa
211a8('bum): bar myi stonang to// da ltar byung zhes bya bar myi ston to// de ci'i phyir zher/ stong pa nyid la 'jig pa myed do// rab tu 'jig pa myeng // mtshan ma myed pa la 'jig po myongad ngo // rab tu 'jig pa
211b1('bum): myed do// spon byed pa la 'jig pa myed do// par 'du 'jig pa myed do// mngon pa 'du bya ba myed pa la 'jig pa 'am/ rab tu 'jig pa myed ngo // skye ba myed pa/ 
211b2('bum): la 'jig pa 'am/ rab tu 'jig pa myed do// dngos po myed pa la 'gri pa 'am/ rab tu 'jig pa myed do// rang bzhin myed pa la 'jig pa 'am rab tu 'jig pa myed do// rab 'byor nga de ltar de bzhin gshegs
211b3('bum): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'jig rte nang stonang par gsungs te/ rab 'byor nga sems can tshad myed/ grangs myeng // dpag tu myed pa'i sems dang spyod pa mkhyenang pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi
211b4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa nyid la brtend cing rab tu mkhyen to de rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyirang pa zab mo 'di la ni sen/ das can myed do// sems can du gdags pa myi dmyigs so// gzugs
211b5('bum): myed do// gzugs su gdags pa myi dmyigs so// nor ba myed do// tshor bar gdags pa myi dmyigs so// 'du shes myed do// 'dun sa su gdags pa myi dmyigs so// 'du byed myed do// 'du byed du
211b6('bum): bdags pa myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes par myed do// rnam par shes par gdags pa myi dmyigs so// myig myed do// myig tu gdas pa myi dmyigs so// rna ba myed do// rna bar gdags pa myi dmyig sa
211b7('bum): pa rgya ga pa rgya pa / la gyi rgyal pa ma kyang
212a1('bum): gdas pa myi myigs so// chos myed do// chos su gdags pa myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa myed do// myig gi rnam par shes par gdags pa myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam par
212a2('bum): shes pa myed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gdags pa myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa myed do// sna'i rnam par shes par gdags pa myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa myed po lce'i rnam par shes pa
212a3('bum): gdags pa myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes myed do// lus kyi rnam par shes par gdags pa myi myigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed do// yid kyi rnam par shes par gdags pa myi dmyigs
212a4('bum): so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed do// myig gi 'dus te regapar gangs pa myi dmyigs so/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed // rna ba'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa myi dmyigs so
212a5('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa myi dmyigasaso// lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed do// lce'i te reg par gdags pa myi dmyigs so
212a6('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg par gdags pa myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg par gdags pa myi dmyigs so
212a7('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rtse nad kyis tshor ba myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor bar gdags pa myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor
212a8('bum): bskyed do// rna ba'i 'dus te rag pa'i rgyarab kyis tshor ba gdags pa myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i nye nang gyi sa tshar myeng ngo // sna'i 'dus te rig pa'i byind kyis tshor bar/ 
212b1('bum): gdags pa myi dmyigs so// lha'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
212b2('bum): myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar gdags pa myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor bar gdags pa/ 
212b3('bum): gyi dmyigs so sa'i khas myed do// sa'i khams su gdags pa myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams myed do// chu'i khams su gdags pa myi dmyigs so// mye'i khams myang ngo // mye'i khams su gdags pa myi dmyims
212b4('bum): rlung gi khams myed do// rlung gi khams su gdags pa myi dmyi/ gas so// nam mkha'i khams myed do// nam mkha'i khams su// gdags pa myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams
212b5('bum): myed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams su gdags pa myi dmyig sa so// ma rig pa myed do// ma rig par gdags pa myi dmyigs so// 'du byed myed do// 'du byed du gdags pa myi dmyigs so/ 
212b6('bum): so// rnam par shes pa myed do// rnam par shes pa gdags pa myi dmyigs so// mying dang gzugs myeng ngo // mying dang gzugs su gdags pa myi dmyigs so// skye mched drug myed do// skye mched drug
212b7('bum): tu gdags pa myi dmyigs so// reg pa myed do// reg pa myed par gdags pa myi dmyigs so// tshor ba myed do// tshor bur gdags pa myi dmyigs so// sred pa myed do// sred par gdags pa myi dmyigasaso
212b8('bum): lend pa myed do// lend par gdags pa myi dmyigs so// srid pa myed do// srid par gdags pa myi dmyigs so// skye ba myed do// skye bar gdags pa myi dmyigs so// rga shi myang ngo // rga shi
213a1('bum): gdags pa myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang/ 
213a2('bum): khar gdags pa myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind par gdags pa myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha
213a3('bum): ro la tu phyind par gdags pa myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind par gdags pa myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed de/ 
213a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par gdags pa myi dmyigs so// / nang stong pa nyid myed do// nang stong pa nyid du gdags pa myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid myed do// phyi stong pa nyid du gdags pa myi dmyigs so/ 
213a5('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid du gdags pa myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du ga dgas pa myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid myed do// chen po stong pa nyid du
213a6('bum): gdags pa myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid du gdags pa myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed do// 'dus ma
213a7('bum): byas stong pa nyid du gdags pa myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa
213a8('bum): myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gdags pa myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed do/ 
213b1('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid du gdags pa myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed do// kyi
213b2('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
213b3('bum): du gdags la myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myed do// dran pa
213b4('bum): nye bar gzhag par gdags pa myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba rnams myed do// yang dag par spong bar gang gas pa myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
213b5('bum): myed do/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par gdags pa myi dmyigs so// dbang po rnams myed do// dbang por gdags pa myi dmyigs so// stobs rnams myed do// stobs su
213b6('bum): gdags pa myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag tu gdags pa myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par
213b7('bum): gdags pa myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myed do// 'phags pa'i bden par gdags pa myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan rnams myed do// bsam gtan du gdags pa myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa rnams myed do// 
213b8('bum): tshad myed par gdags pa myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug par/ gdags pa myi dmyigs so// rnam par thard pa brgyad
214a1('bum): myed do// rnam par tha rang pa brgyad du gdags myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dgur gdags pa myi
214a2('bum): dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa myed do// rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myang bar gdags pa myi dmyigaso/ 
214a3('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams myed do// mngon par shes par gdags pa myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzind rnams myed do// ting nge 'dzind tu gdags pa myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams myed do// 
214a4('bum): gzungs kyi sgor gdags pa myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshe gas pa'i stobs rnams myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stob/ sa su gdags pa myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa rnams myed
