245a7('bum): 'byung ba'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir stond pa'o// nam dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid mthong ba myed
245a8('bum): ba'i phyir ston pa'o// nam ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir stond pa'o// nam dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ 
245b1('bum): la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir stond pa'o// nam dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ 
245b2('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir stond pa'o// nam yang dag par spong ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ 
245b3('bum): nam rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir stond pa'o// nam dbang po la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i cha/ 
245b4('bum): dbang po rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir stond pa'o// nam stobs la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ stobs rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam byang chub kyi yan lag
245b5('bum): la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i che ga byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir stond pa'o// nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la dumyigs pa'i stong
245b6('bum): rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir stond pa'o// nam 'phags pa'i bden ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'phanas
245b7('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams mameng bskyed pa'i phyira'i stond pa'o// nam bsam gtan la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i ji/ bsam gtan rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o// namatshad myed pa la
245b8('bum): dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ tshad myed pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir stond pa'o// nam gzugs myed pa'o snyoms par 'jug pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe
246a1('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir stond pa'o// nam rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rnam par thard pa brgyad mthong
246a2('bum): mched pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthong ba myed pa'i phyir stond pa'o// na
246a3('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa/ 
246a4('bum): mthong ba myed pa'i phyir stonang pa'o// nam mngon par shes pa la dmyi rdzogs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa na mas mthong ba myed pa'i phyir stond pa'o// nam ting nge 'dzin/ 
246a5('bum): la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzinarnams mthong ba myed pa de'i phyir stond pa'o// nam gzungs kyi sgo la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ gzungs kyi/ 
246a6('bum): ske rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir stonang po'o// nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i cha/ de bzhi gshegs pa'i stangs bcu mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam myi bas
246a7('bum): pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes la myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ myi 'jigs pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir stonang pa'o// nam so so yang dag par rig pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ so so yang
246a8('bum): dag par rig pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam snying rje chen po la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ snying rje chen po mthong ba myed pa'i phyir stond pa'o// nam sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
246b1('bum): pa bco brgyad la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i chi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o// ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byub
246b2('bum): ba'i tshe/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba myed pa'i phyir stond pa'o// nam lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa
246b3('bum): nam phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i cha/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba myed pa'i phyir stond pa'o// ni dgra bcom pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ dgra
246b4('bum): bcom pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam rang byang chub la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rang byang chub mthong ba myed pa'i phyir spyond pa'o// nam lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam
246b5('bum): bar shes pa'i 'byung ba'i tsha/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid ma thong ba myed pa'i phyir stond pa'o// nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyend/ pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rnam
246b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir stond pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di de bzhin gshegs bskyed cing 'jig rten du stond pa'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang / 
246b7('bum): ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing / 'jig rtend ston pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni 'jig rtend du stong pa zhes rjod de/ 'jig
246b8('bum): rtend du ji ltar stong zhes rjod ce na/ gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du chod do// tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// 'du shes stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// 'du byed stong ngo // 
247a1('bum): sna stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// lce stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// lus stong nge zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// yid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// gzugs
247a2('bum): ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten nga do// ltung ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten mchod do// dri spong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du da dag rasnang ba zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod de/ reg snang ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten
247a3('bum): du rjod do/ chos stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// myig gi rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ 
247a4('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa stong nge zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'dzi/ rtenang du rjod do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya
247a5('bum): bar 'jig rten du rjod do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar/ 
247a6('bum): 'jig rtend du rjod do/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong nge zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjong do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du/ 
247a7('bum): rjod do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten bya che nga / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong do zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// na ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis cho
247b1('bum): bstong de zhes bya bar 'jig rten du ra dang / rtswa'i lus te reg pa'i byind kyis tshor bsong de zhes bya bar 'jig rtend du rjod da/ lce'i bus te ga pa'i rgyund kyis tshor bkong de zhes bya bar bani rten du dang / 
247b2('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshar bstong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bstong nge zhes bya bar 'jig rten du chod do// sa'i khams stong ngo zhes bya dang / 
247b3('bum): 'jig rten du rjod do// chu'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// mye'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du dzad de/ rlung gi khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// nam mkha'i langs
247b4('bum): stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rno bar shes pa'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// mying dang gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// skye mched drug stong ngo
247b5('bum): zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// sred pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// len
247b6('bum): pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// srid pa spong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du chod do// skye ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rga shi stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjed do// sbyin
247b7('bum): pa'i 'i ro mang du phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod da/ tshul khrims kyi pha yong du srind pastong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten durjod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong nge shes bya bar 'dzi ma
247b8('bum): marjod do// brtson 'grus kyi ron du phyind pa sod do zhes bya dang lag rten du rjod do// bas gtan gyi pha rol du kyi nad pa song ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// shes rab kyi pha rolo dang du phyin pa
248a1('bum): stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar 'jig rten tu rjod do// stong pa nyid snang ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes
248a2('bum): bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// chen po stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar
248a3('bum): 'jig rten tu dang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// dus rgyas stongs nyid snying nge zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjo do/ marnams 'das pa snang ngo zhes bya ba 'dzin te
248a4('bum): da/ 'oms dang sa byed pa stong pa nyid nga ngo/ byang rten gyi nga/ dang byed pasteng pa nyid stong / bya gta tu dang / rang po stong ba nyid na
248a5('bum): bya bangar 'ang gi rten du rjod de/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid / ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du dang / myi rgyags te/ 
248a6('bum): song pa nyid stong nge zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod // dam pa myed du spyodang ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten tu rjod do// ngomo nyidadi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya dang 'dzig rted da do// ngos brgyad ba ni ngom nyid stong / 
248a7('bum): pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag po stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ yang dag par spong ba rnams steng ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
248a8('bum): stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// dbang po rnams song ngo zhes bya bar 'jigi rten dang / grangs rnams song pa zhes bya bar 'jig rten du da do/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten
248b1('bum): du rjod do/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar rjod de/ bas gtan rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// tshad myed
248b2('bum): pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rnam par tharang pa brgyad stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// mthar kyis
248b3('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong ngo zhes bya bar bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// mngon
248b4('bum): bar shes pa rnaMs stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod de/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
248b5('bum): stobs bcu stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod dag myi dzi gas pa pazhi stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod dag la sa yang dag par rig pa pa ni stong nge zhes bya bar 'dig rten gyi du/ 
248b6('bum): byams pa chen po stong po zhes bya bar 'jig rten durjod do/ snying rje chen po stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ 
248b7('bum): rgyunang du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i sras bu stong de zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// phyir gyi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du
248b8('bum): nyi nga / dgra chom pa nyid stong nge zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rang byang chub stong ngo zhes bya bar ba gi rten gyi nga / las gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten da do// rnam pa sa
249a1('bum): cad pa byed pa 'di gang ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten tu dod do/ rab 'byor de ga shes rab kyi 'oyod tu sbyin pade bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten du stond pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan lang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
249a2('bum): byin pa ni de ngazhi gshegs pa na na steng gis bya bar rjod/ 'azhi jizhes bya ba rjod/ tu shes bya sa pa byed / rab kya de yang dashes pa kyi yom phyid pa/ 
249a3('bum): dgani gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten med pa'o// rang 'byor dgazha yang shes rang gi ba robang du phyid pa ni de bzhini gshegs pa la bdini rten stong zhes bya ba sod ce/ bzhirten stong zhes bya dang sa sod den
249a4('bum): bya ba zhon to// 'jig rten na lce stong zhes bya ba donang / 'jig rten nams stong shes bya bar stod do/ 'jig rten na mid song zhes bya bar spyod to// 'jig ton na gzugs stong shes bya bar yod
249a5('bum): 'jig rten na sgra stong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten na dri stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na ro stong zhes bya bar stonang to// 'jig rten na reg stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na chos stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na myig
249a6('bum): gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten narna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na sna'i rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na lce'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya
249b1('bum): sonod to// 'jig rten na lus stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to
249b2('bum): 'jog rtenanan pa'i dus te ga pastong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten na sna'i dus te reg pa steng zhes bya bar ston to// 'ag rten na lce'i 'dus te reg pa song zhes bya bar smon pa/ 
249b3('bum): 'jig rten na lus kyi dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten na myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bstong zhes bya bar ston to/ 
249b4('bum): 'jig rten narna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ste/ dang nye bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na lce'i dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
249b5('bum): pa rnyong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bstong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyan kyis tsho ba stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten nam 'i
249b6('bum): khams stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na chu'i khams stong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten na mye'i khams stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na rlung gi khams stong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rtend na nam mkha'i
249b7('bum): khams stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten ni rnam par shes pa'i khams stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten nam rig pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na 'du byed stong zhes bya bar ston to/ 
249b8('bum): 'jig rten na rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na mying dang gzugs stong zhes bya da ston to// 'jig rten na skye mched drug stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na
250a1('bum): gareg pa stong zhes bya bar stod cog 'jig rten natshor bstong zhes bya ba na nga/ 'jig rten na sreng pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na lend pa stong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten na
250a2('bum): tsarab/ srid pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na skye ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/ 'jig rten na rga sha stong zhes bya bar stond to/ 'jig rten na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten
250a3('bum): ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rtend na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ stong zhes
250a4('bum): khyabya bar ston to// 'jig rten na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar
250a5('bum): ston to// 'jig rten na phyi stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na phyi nang stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig
250a6('bum): rtenan chen po stong pa nyid stong rdo zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten na don dam pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten na 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rtend ni
250a7('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong \u0f7fzhes bya bar ston to// 'jig
250a8('bum): ten na dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten na rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong po zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong po zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na rang gi
250b1('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong po zhes bya ba bston to/ 'jig rtenan gyi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid nga 'i zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong che zhes bya bar ston te/ 'jig rten na ngo ngo nyid sto
250b2('bum): pa nyid stong tsho zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten na dngas pa myed pa'i ngong nyid stong pa nyid stong rje zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rtend na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rjes sung sa zhes bya bar don to/ 'jig rten na yang dgapa
250b3('bum): spong ba rnams stong po zhes bya bar stong to// 'jig rten nardzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong rje zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na dbang po rnams stong po zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na stobs rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar ston to/ 
250b4('bum): 'jig rten na byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong rje zhes bya bar ston/ to/ 'jig rten na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong to zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na 'phags 'di bden pa rnams stong
250b5('bum): zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na bsam gtan gyi rnams stong sde zhes bya bar ston da to/ 'jig rten na tshad myed pa rnams stong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten na gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
250b6('bum): 'ardza 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya bar stonang to// 'jig rten na rnam par tha ra pa brgyad stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na
250b7('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya
250b8('bum): kha ra stond to// 'jig rten na gzungs kyi sgra rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na myi 'jigs pa bzhi stong zhes bya bar ston to/ 
251a1('bum): casha 'jig rten ngan so so yang dag par rig pa rnams pa'i stong zhes bya bar stonang ngo // 'jig rten ma byams pa chen po stong zhes bya bar ston to/ 'jig rten ngan snying rje chen po stong zhes bya bar stonang to// 'jigs rten na sangs rgyas kyi
251a2('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten da na phyir myi
251a3('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na rang byang chub stong zhes bya bar stond to// 'jig rten na la~M gyi rno par shes pa nyid stong zhes bya bar stond tog
251a4('bum): 'jig rten na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid stong zhes bya bar sto/ nad to// rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten stonang to// / 
251a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phra ga brgya pa// bam po bcu bdun pa'o// 
251a6('bum): rab 'byor de gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab pa ces bya bar ston te/ ji ltar na 'jig rten pas gyis myi khyab par stond ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rte
251a7('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// 'du shes kyi 'jigi rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyarab po'i
251a8('bum): ces bya bar ston to/ rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// myig gi 'jig rten pas kyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// sna'i 'dzin
251b1('bum): rten me bco gyis kyi chub ces bya bar stonang to/ lce'i 'jig rten bsam gyis kyi khyab ces bya bar stond ngo // lus kyi 'jig rtend bsam gyis myi khyab ces byar stonang ngo // yid kyi 'jig rten pas kyis myi khyab ces bya ba/ 
251b2('bum): smonang tog gzugs kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stonang to// sgra'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab pa ces bya bar stond to// dri'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// ro'i 'jig
251b3('bum): rten pas kyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// rog gi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// chos kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis
251b4('bum): myi khyab ces bya bar myi ston tog/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stonang ngo // sna ba'i rnam par shes pani 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stonang to// lce'i rnam pa/ 
251b5('bum): gre ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab pa ces bya b.raston to// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khya
251b6('bum): ces bya bar ston to// myigri hri bad+ha ma ti ga pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stonang to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jog
251b7('bum): rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// yid kyi 'dus te rog
251b8('bum): pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab pa ces bya bar stond to// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab pa ces bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
252a1('bum): tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis kyi khyab ces bya bar stond to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyund kyis tshor ba'i
252a2('bum): 'jag rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i
252a3('bum): 'arten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stonang to// chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten pas kyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston te/ 
252a4('bum): khams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stonang to// rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// ni mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten pas gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to na
252a5('bum): shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya b.raston de to// ma rig pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar/ ston to 'du byed sum gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// rnam par shes
252a6('bum): pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// mying dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// skye mched drug gi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// reg pa'i 'jig rten
252a7('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// sred pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// len pa'i 'jig rten pas kyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ 
252a8('bum): srid pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond te/ skye ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// rga zhi'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// 
252b1('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// bzod pa'i nga ro dang
252b2('bum): nid pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang du phyind pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten
252b3('bum): bam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyeb ces bya bar ston to// phyi stong pa
252b4('bum): da kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stonan to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten pas gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston te rlon
252b5('bum): po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston rte/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten pas gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab
252b6('bum): ces bya bar stond to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyad ces bya bar ston te thogam dang tha ma myed pa
252b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar
252b8('bum): ston to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// myi dmyigs pa stong/ 
253a1('bum): ba nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston do// dngos po myeng ba stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston rtso// tho ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi sa da bsam gyis
253a2('bum): myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyadab ces bya bar ston to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya
253a3('bum): bar ston to/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar son to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// dbang po rnaMs kyi 'jig rten pa ma
253a4('bum): gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten bas gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i lam yan/ 
253a5('bum): lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bas kyis myi khyab ces bya ba ston to// bas gtan rnams gyis myi khyeb ces bya bar sto nad to// 
253a6('bum): tshad myed pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// rnam par
253a7('bum): tha rad pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten pas kyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// rnam par tha radad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
253a8('bum): ma myong ba dang / smond pa myed pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam
253b1('bum): kyis myi khyab ces bya bar stonang ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// de bzhin gshes pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig chen bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// 
253b2('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya
253b3('bum): bar ston to/ snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// rgyund du zhugs kyi 'bras
253b4('bum): bu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to na lan cig d+hi ri 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ 
253b5('bum): dgra bcom nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston da/ to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten pas gyis myi khyab zhes
253b6('bum): bya bar sngon to/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khu ces bya bar stond to// rab khyod gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyinod pa zab mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar smon te/ 
253b7('bum): lagi rten nga ltar dben zhes bya bar song cen/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stond to// 'du shes kyi la
253b8('bum): rten dan zhes bya bar ston to/ kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rtend bden pa zhes bya pa son to// phyi'i 'jog rten da na zhes bya bar yod do// rna ba'i 'jig rten de/ 
254a1('bum): zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ lce'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston / sus kyi 'jig rten daden zhes bya bar don po min gyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar don to// garnas
254a2('bum): kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// sgra'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// dri'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// reni 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// reg gi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston rten
254a3('bum): chos kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stond to// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stond to// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i rnaM bar shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes
254a4('bum): bya bar stond to// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya
254a5('bum): bar stonang to// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhe sa bya bar stond to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stond te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes
254a6('bum): bya bar stond to/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stond to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stond to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stond te
254a7('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor
254a8('bum): pa'i 'jig rten dben pa zhes bya bar ston te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to lus kyi 'dus te ras rkyen gyis cho 'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// yid
254b1('bum): kyi dus nyig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa'i 'jig rten da na zhes bya ba sngon dang / sa'i khams kyi ni rten daden zhes bya ba ston to/ nu'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stod te/ mye'i khams
254b2('bum): kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stond to// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten
254b3('bum): ngasan zhes bya bar ston to// ma rig pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston te/ rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// 
254b4('bum): myi nga dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stond to// skye ma ched drug gi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten
254b5('bum): dben zhes bya bar stond to// sred pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ le nad pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// srid pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// skye ba'i 'jig rten dngen
254b6('bum): zhes bya bar ston to// rga sha'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// 
254b7('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stond to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyind pa'i 'dzin
254b8('bum): rten dben zhes bya bar stond to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes
255a1('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// don
255a2('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stond te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stond to// mtha' las
255a3('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stond teto// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid/ kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston te
255a4('bum): dang myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar so// nad to// / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rtenadaben zhes bya bar ston to chos thams cad spyong
255a5('bum): kha nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stond to// rmyi/ dmyig pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston te dngos po myong ba stong
255a6('bum): pa nyid kyi 'jig tes dben zhes bya bar spon tog ros ci stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stond to// dngos po myed pa'i ngom nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten 'den zhes bya bar ston to/ dran banye bar gnas
255a7('bum): kha rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ 
255a8('bum): dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya byar ston to stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnaMs kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
255b1('bum): brgyan pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar smond to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya ba son sto// chad byed pa rnam
255b2('bum): kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stond do// rnam par thad pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// 
255b3('bum): ma thard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stod to// rnam pas dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i 'jog rten dben zhes bya bar smon
255b4('bum): temangon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stond te/ ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stond to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stond to// de bzhin gshegs
255b5('bum): ba'i stongs rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston te/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston ta/ so so/ yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi bangag rten den zhes bya ston po byams chen
255b6('bum): pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// snying rje chen po'i tshig chen dben zhes bya ba ston to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya na to// rgyun du zhug pa'i bras
255b7('bum): gu 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stond to// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stond to// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten deben zhes bya bar ston to// dgra bcom pa nyid
255b8('bum): jig rten dben shes bya ba nan rang byang chub kyi 'jigi rten dben zhes bya ba sonalam gyi rnam pa shes nyid kyis rten dben zhes bya bar ston
256a1('bum): gnam pa thams car mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rtend dben zhes bya bar stonang to// rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten stond pa'o// rab

261a2('bum): ba stong ba zhes bya bar stond to// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// snying rjechen po'i 'jig rten
261a3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 
261a4('bum): lan ni ga phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes rnga bya bar ston to// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo/ 
261a5('bum): nyid pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten ngo 'o/ nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi 'jin/ rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid
261a6('bum): kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten dngos po myed pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston te/ rab 'byor shes
261a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos
261a8('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'du shes kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten
261b1('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// myig gi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'jig rten dngos po myong ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'jig rten dngos
261b2('bum): kho myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'jig rten
261b3('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// gzugs kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngabo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sgra'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dri'i 'dzig
261b4('bum): rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// ro'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// reg gi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba ston to/ 
261b5('bum): chos kyi'i jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig
261b6('bum): rten dngos po myed pa li ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
261b7('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba ston to// myig gi
261b8('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong

262a2('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i

262b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar ston to// dang stong ba nyid kyi ga rten pos po myed pa'i ngo bo da stong ba zhes bya bar ston to// phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'dig rte dngos pa spyod kyi ngabo nyid stong
262b7('bum): bi zhes bya bar ston to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyis bya bar ston to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'dzin rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid spyod zhes bya bar ston to// chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo

262b9('bum): po skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong bu zhes bya bar ston to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i
263a1('bum): du ljangag du sa kAn pas byung snang pa la bsam 'a zhin nga jig 'a ma pa byungs
263a2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar stonang to/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar bston tog rang gi mtsha na nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i/ 
263a3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhe bya bar ston to/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stonang to// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed

263a5('bum): dngas po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stonang to/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myeng pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// yang dag par spong sa

263a7('bum): rlog sa skyed pa'i nyid stong bzhes bya ba ston // mas so kyi shi rten pos bskyed pa'i chos stong ba zhes byab yon kyang tshu sems rnams
263b1('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa ni zhes bya bar ston to// bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// chang myong pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bon
263b2('bum): stong ba zhes bya bar sngo nang te gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar spyon to// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten dngos po byed/ 
263b3('bum): ba'i ngongo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stan to/ mtharang kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ji banyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par b.rang ba'i sgra stong pa nyid dang /

263b5('bum): bya bar ston to// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myeng po'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// gzungs kyi sgo / kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
263b6('bum): ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston te/ 
263b7('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stonang to// byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// snying rje chen po'i

264b1('bum): ra g+sa shes bya / phyig shi shes pa ma ni zhes byab yin / rna ba'i rnam pa shes pa'i 'ji chem mi shes byabar rdzun s+ho/ 'i sa
264b2('bum): bdeshes pa'i 'ji nyi ma ni zhes bya bar ston te/ blo'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig te na ni zhes bya bar ston to/ sus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig te ma'i zhes bya bar man teg med kyi rnam pa mashes

264b8('bum): tshul mas kyi 'jig mi ni zhes bya bar ston to/ mye'i khams kyi mi gra ne 'i zhes bya bar ston to// rlung gi khams kyi 'jig ne mi ni zhes bya byad sgom ga rnam ma pa'i khams kyi 'jig na
265a1('bum): gzhe bya rlomog rnam pa shes pa'i khams kyi skyes bya son to// marig 'i 'di kes ni zhes bya bar smo to// 'du bye kyi 'ag zhe ma mi zhes bya bar ston te/ rnam par shes pa'i 'jis /

265a4('bum): zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang ba'i 'jig na sa bya bar ston to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu byinang pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang mi

265a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa'i 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar ston tog/ gnang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston rtog phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig tem ni zhes bya bar ston to// phyibyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rtemi ni zhes

265a8('bum): di na sems kyab na/ lusas byam pang na 'i sa rgya ba ma sa mas sa la gang banyid na ngag ma'i shes kyi ga yo ma dpal byeng pa nga
265b1('bum): khyen gyi nga sa dang skyed bstong dkan ni 'a pa smras / rab na nga nyid kyi ga 'is ba ldan ra
265b2('bum): mi bya ba rung to/ rang shes ma mang ba nyid kyi 'jig rten mizhes bya ba snyen to myi byigs pa sang kyi kyi 'jig tem ni nas byab ston pos rangs bskyed ba stong banyid kyi 'jig cema'i nus
265b3('bum): ston to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston /

266a1('bum): lus 'i sgornamapa kyi 'ing ken ni nas bya ba nadu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rloms kyi'i 'jig na mni nas bya bar yon te// myi jigs pa pa'i'i 'jis rten ni zhes bya ba ston / 
266a2('bum): gamis ya dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten zhes bya bar stonang to/ byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten yo ma zhi ga sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa pos brgyad kyi 'jig nem ni zhes bya bar sgom
266a3('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stonang to// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stonang tod/ 
266a4('bum): dam bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stonang to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lam gyi rnam pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid
266a5('bum): kyi 'jig chem ni zhes bya bar ston to// ra 'byor de ltar ma/ shes rab kyi pha rolang tu byinang pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa skyed ci 'jig rten stor pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan ya zhes rab kyi la
266b1('bum): ma nyis kyang btsun ga yi kyi 'jig rten gang pa'i ces kya gags rgyags kyi 'di rten stong pa nyid ces bya ba yin ta gA'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar smo pa dri 'dig rten spong pa nyid
266b2('bum): ces bya bar ston to// rer 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston de to/ reg gi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stonang to// chos kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten

266b4('bum): nyid ces bya bar ston to// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i

266b8('bum): kyi tshor mi'i 'jig rte stong pa nyid ces bya bar rton to sgo'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten snyeng 'i zhes bya bar son to/ sus kyi 'dus te ga pa'i rkyen kyi mi mang ba'i 'jig rten mo
