272b2('bum): lasam gyis kyi khyab dbag tu myed gzha' du myed pa ste/ spyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor 'tha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid byas ma gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ phyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ 
272b3('bum): rab 'byor thog ma dang ba ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myong gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dor ba myeng pa stong pa nyid kyang khyi ma sa gzhal du myang ba ste/ 
272b4('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bas dam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa da dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang bsam
272b5('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam ba'o// rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam/ 
272b6('bum): ba'o// rab 'byor myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzham
272b7('bum): du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myeng ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam po'o// rab 'byor dngos po myong ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam
272b8('bum): cis kyi bya dngag tu mye gan skyeng ba rnye kyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rangab 'byor kyad banye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang bams kyis gyi khyab dpag tu myed gsus du byed pa ste/ phye ma sa pa dang sanyam thog pa / 
273a1('bum): la nas kyang gnan gyi kyi rgyam ba mangs sas snang pa ste/ byin nyam pa sa nyam po'o// rab byo chu phrul gyi nang ba rnams kyang bsam gyis kyi khyab bag tu mye pa la gan du mye ma/ 
273a2('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dadabang po rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor stobs rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal
273a3('bum): du byed ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor byang chub kyi sam lag rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yam
273a4('bum): lag brgyad pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa so/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
273a5('bum): ba'o rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ phyi mnyam pa dang mnyam po'o/ rab 'byor tshang myong ba rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed pa ste/ 
273a6('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myang gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang / 
273a7('bum): ma bye sa che kyim ma'adas ma thog/ ra rtso ma mchim ma noms par 'ag pa sa kyis kyi rgyab ga myeng gas byang sa kyi
273b1('bum): du nyas po garab 'byor rnam thar ba radang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / macan ma myeng ba dang / smon pa myed pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myung ba sten gyi mnyam pa dang mnyam po'o/ rab 'byor mngon
273b2('bum): shes pa rnams kyang bsom gyis myi khyab dpag tu myang gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor ting nge 'dzind rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du byed pa skye/ myi mnyam 'ja
273b3('bum): mnyam por/ rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab pag tu mying gan du byed pa ste/ phyi mnyam 'odang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsumang bas ma gyis myi khyab dpag tu
273b4('bum): gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor da myi 'jig sa pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga so so yang dag par rig pa
273b5('bum): rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dbyams pa chen po yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi ma
273b6('bum): ba dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de snying rje chen po bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang bsam gyis myi khyab
273b7('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor
273b8('bum): man cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'ang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor daphyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed pa ste/ 
274a1('bum): kyi mnyam pa dang mnyam po'o// rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myong ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam po'o/ rab 'byor rang byang chub kyang bsam
274a2('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myeng pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang
274a3('bum): mnyam po'o/ rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gyis kyi khyab dpag tu skyeng gzhal du myed ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad
274a4('bum): byu bas ma gyis myi khyab pag tu myed gzhal du byed pa deste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi chos nyid ga yin pa de la ni sems kyi dmyigs so/ 
274a5('bum): sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang myi dmyigs so rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzha nyel du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs
274a6('bum): sa ma ma gyis kyi gra gas mye gas pa du myed ban khyim ma pa ma tshas kyi phyigs ca le byor 'dushes pasam gyis kyi khyab pag myed gnas
274a7('bum): khyim ma pa nga dum bya sa kyi dmyigs so// rab byor 'du byed bsam gyis kyi khyab dpag tu myang gnas myed ba ste// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam tha ma gyi dmyigs cag 'am
274a8('bum): rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dmyig bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myong gzhal
274b1('bum): du myeng pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab byorang sna bsam gyis myi khyab dgag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor ngas pas
274b2('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ster myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byord lce bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam yid myi
274b3('bum): dmyigs so// rab 'byorang lus bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga yid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed ba ste
274b4('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byord ra gzugs bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor smra bas
274b5('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myang gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyamab dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dadri bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myeng ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
274b6('bum): ngas myi byigs so/ rab 'byor rdo bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gnam du myed pa ste/ phyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor reg bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gnas du byed
274b7('bum): ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor du chos bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dmyig gi rnam par
274b8('bum): shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myong gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ 
275a1('bum): e myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang kyi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang sna'i rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so ga/ rab 'byor
275a2('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzha
275a3('bum): du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa stekamyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// 
275a4('bum): rab 'byor myig gi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag datu myeng gzhal du myeng pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi rgyu ma dgas so/ rab 'byor nga rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi
275a5('bum): khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyi sa myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myeng ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang
275a6('bum): mnyam ka yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myang gzhal du myeng pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang lus kyi 'dus te
275a7('bum): reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnye
275a8('bum): bdang tam pa yang gyi dmyigs so// rab byor myig go 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tham ma gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ ra
275b1('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam
275b2('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myeng pa ste/ myi mnyam pa pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang lho'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ 
275b3('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyam dpag tu myang gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi
275b4('bum): dmyigs so// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tsher ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga sa'i khams
275b5('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi ma nyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor chu'i kham sa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ 
275b6('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dmyo'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga rlung gi
275b7('bum): khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa sten
275b8('bum): kyi mnyas pa dang nyam pa yang gyi byigs so/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gnal du byed pa ste/ khyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ar gyi dbyigs mo rab tu
276a1('bum): ma'ig pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gamal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor 'du byed bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myeng ba ste
276a2('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dmying dang gzugs
276a3('bum): bdam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myeng pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de skye mched drug bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed / gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa
276a4('bum): ba dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga tshor ba bsam
276a5('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga sred pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myang gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang
276a6('bum): mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga len pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myang gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga srid pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag
276a7('bum): tu byed / gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab byor de skye ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam tha yang myi dmyigs so
276a8('bum): rab 'byor ngan shi bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng
276b1('bum): gim byed pa ste phyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang phyi dmyigs so rab 'byor dul khrims kyi pha rolang tu phyinang ba bsam gyis myi khyab dbas tu mye gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi myigago
276b2('bum): rab byor nga bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bsam gyis myi
276b3('bum): khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor bsam gtan ga pha rol tu phyi nang pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang
276b4('bum): mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu dbyi nang pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu mying gzhal du myed pa ste dmyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs sog rab 'byor/ 
276b5('bum): nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed ga zhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du
276b6('bum): myed pa ste phyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myang gzhal du myed ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs sag rab 'bya
276b7('bum): stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de chen po stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myong ba ste/ 
276b8('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor
278a1('bum): a 'dus byas snying banyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gnal du myed ba sten myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong panyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myong / 
278a2('bum): gzhal du myed ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myung ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs
278a3('bum): rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab
278a4('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi
278a5('bum): dmyigaso// rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ rab 'byor nga rAgi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis
278a6('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myeng ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed/ gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi man
278a7('bum): ba dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa
278a8('bum): nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dngos po myong ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du
278b1('bum): myong ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myong ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// 
278b2('bum): pas pa rnams pas kyis kyi pal myo gan kyed ste khyim sa sa kyi gyis so/ gru kyi rna ma kyim
278b3('bum): dngag tu byed gnal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs sos rab 'byor nga dbang po rnams bsam gyis myi khyab pag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ phyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa sa na sbyi
278b4('bum): rab 'byor de stobs rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu mye gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigaso darab 'byor nga byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsam gyis myi khyab
278b5('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang myi mnyam ba yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam ya nalag brgyad pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myang gi zhal
278b6('bum): myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i 'den pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dbyin
278b7('bum): rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga tshad myed pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu mye
278b8('bum): gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang man
279a1('bum): pas gyi dbyigs so/ rab 'byor rnam par b.rang pa brgyad bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pase/ myi mnyas pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor mthar kyis
279a2('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myeng ba skyeg myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor rnam par tha rang ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
279a3('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga mngon par shes pa rnams bsam gyis
279a4('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam du ba dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed
279a5('bum): bste myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rang / 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed / gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam tha ma
279a6('bum): myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab
279a7('bum): 'byor da myi 'jigs pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
279a8('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dbyams pa chen po bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du byed
279b1('bum): b+ha khyimanyam pa dang nyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor ni 'i chen po bams kyis kyi khyab ga me gzhal du myed khyimanyas pa dang nyam pas kyi dbyigs so/ rab 'byer/ 
279b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi dmyigs dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byo rang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsam/ 
279b3('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed ra gzhal du myed pa ste/ gyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhan
279b4('bum): du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyi gso// rab 'byor phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis myi khyab dpag/ tu myong gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang
279b5('bum): myi dmyigs so/ rab 'byor nga dgra bcom pa nyid bsam gyisamyi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang ma nyi ba yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor ngarang byang chub bsam gyis
279b6('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myeng pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa steg myi mnyam
279b7('bum): pa dang mnyam pa sad myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor du rnam pa thams cad mkhye nang pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa gang myir myin so// gsolang
279b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gzugs pas ma gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu
280a1('bum): a ga ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du shes byasam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang
280a2('bum): mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du byed bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa legs/ ci'i slad du ni zhes bsam gyis
280a3('bum): myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags // ci'i slad du myig bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam bu dang
280a4('bum): mnyam pa myi dmyigs po lags/ ci'i slad du rna bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa da dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags pa ci'i slad du sna
280a5('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shingamyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa legs/ ci'i slad du skye bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
280a6('bum): ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ 
280a7('bum): ci'i slad du yid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam tha myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lom bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu mchis gzhal du mchis
280a8('bum): shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du / sna bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ 
280b1('bum): ci'i slad byini bsas gyis kyi bya ba pag tum mchis gzhas tum mimis kri m+b+himanyam pa dang nyas gyi dbyigs pa lags/ ci'i slang du ra bsam gyis kyi byang smang chub mchim sa rnam bachis ning
280b2('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du reg bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang ma 'gyu bya/ myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chos cam
280b3('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags na ci'i slad du myig gi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing
280b4('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i rnam par shes bya bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyis
280b5('bum): ba logs/ ci'i slad du sna'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam ba myi myigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lho'i rnam par shes
280b6('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
280b7('bum): mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma michis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ 
280b8('bum): ci'i slad du myig gi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dri myigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rno ba'i 'dus te reg pa zas ma gyis mye khya
281a1('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa
281a2('bum): myi dmyigs pa lags ga ci'i slad du lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg
281a3('bum): pabasam gyis myi khyab dpag rngu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
281a4('bum): mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myig gi 'dus te reg pa busum gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa
281a5('bum): gas ga ci'i slad du na pa'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags
281a6('bum): ci'i slad du sti'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags pa ci'i skad du lho'i 'dus te reg pa'i
281a7('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba tamam gyis kyi khyab dpag du ma mchis gzhal dum mchis shing / phyi mnyam pa nga mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lagrus ci'i rma du sus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyes gyis tshor babasas kyis kyi
281a8('bum): byams brgyab mchis gna' tum mchis gig kyi ma na padang nyas kyi dmyigs pa lags ci'i slad du mid kyi dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba ba ma kyis kyi rgyab gras rgyam mchisags chum
281b1('bum): kyi kyigs pa ga na mas las kyis kyi khya bas byams la gas sam ma ma kyi #
281b2('bum): rnamams pa'i slang du ma ma kha'i khams bsam gyis kyi sa pa dpag tum mchis gnal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyas pa myi dbyigs pa lags ga ci'i mang du ngam par shen
281b3('bum): ba'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i srid du ma rig pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
281b4('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du byed bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa
281b5('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mying dang gzugs bsam gyis
281b6('bum): myi khya ba dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags / ci'i slad du skye mched drug bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / 
282a1('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
282a2('bum): tshor ba bsam gyis kyi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shig kyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sred pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing
282a3('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du len pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tum mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
282a4('bum): srid pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma/ mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags ci'i slad du skye ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal
282a5('bum): du ma mchis shig/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du na shi bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs
282a6('bum): pa lags/ ci'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshul khrims kyi pha rol
282a7('bum): tu phyi nad pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags// ci'i slad du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag/ 
282a8('bum): rgyam mchis sum myos pag kyi phyogs pa lags ci'i srang du 'artson 'grus kyi pa rol tu phyin pa bas ma kyis kyi khyab pag tum mchis gzhal rgyam mchis zhing / khyi mnyam pa dang
282b1('bum): sa du d+hAg sa kyin kyi ga tu rnams sakyi ma kyi phyugs pa akyA Sh+Tha
282b2('bum): ngag tu kyis gna' dum mchis shi kyimanyam pa dang mnyam kyigyi myigs pa lags ci'i sang du byi stong pa nyid bsam gyis kyi khyab pag tum mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing kyi mnyam
282b3('bum): dang nyam pa myi dbyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bri stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag du ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam gyi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad
282b4('bum): stong ba nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis kye gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyig nyes pa lags// ci'i slad du// chen po stong pa nyid bsam gyis
282b5('bum): myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags// ci'i slad du dond pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing
282b6('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags
282b7('bum): ci'i slad du 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis kyi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzha' du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam bgyi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slang bu gapas 'das pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis
283a1('bum): myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma
283a2('bum): mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa gyi
283a3('bum): dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
283a4('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa legs/ ci'i slad du rang gi mtshan nyid
283a5('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu/ 
283a6('bum): ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis/ gzhal du ma mchis ni
283a7('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang myi dmyigs pa
283a8('bum): lags pa/ ci'i slad du dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dran pa
283b1('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams pasam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs tha lags/ ci'i slang du yang drag thar sung ba rnams zas ma gyis
283b2('bum): myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du
283b3('bum): ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dbang po rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis/ gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyig
283b4('bum): ba lags ka ci'i slad du stobs rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dadapag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa da nga mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags ka/ ci'i slad du byang chub
283b5('bum): yan lag rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis ga zhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
283b6('bum): pa bsam gyis kyi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzham
283b7('bum): du ma mchis shingag / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du/ bsam gtan rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
283b8('bum): phyi byigs pa lagasas ci'i thang du bar byed pa rnams pasam gyis kyi khyab dpag tum mchis gzhas dum ma chis shig kyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa gyi dbyigs pa lags pa ci'i slang du gzugs
284a1('bum): e myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags pa ci'i slad du rngam par tha rang pa brgyad/ 
284a2('bum): bsam gyis myi gabang dpag tu ma mchis gza' du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsam gyis myi khyab dpas
284a3('bum): tum mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu/ 
284a4('bum): ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mngon par shes pa rnams bsam dgyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / 
284a5('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags ga ci'i slang du ting ba de 'drimams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnas du ma mchis shing myi dmyigs pa lags ga ci'i slang du/ 
284a6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags // ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsam gyis myi khyab
284a7('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myi 'jigs pa 'izhi bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myi mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mye man
284a8('bum): ba dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags
284b1('bum): ci'i slad du byams pa chen po bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi myigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du snying rje chen po bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
284b2('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags / ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing ba myi
284b3('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags ka ci'i slad du rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lag/ 
284b4('bum): ci'i slad du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang yang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags ci'i slad du phyir myi 'ong/ 
284b5('bum): ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis ga zhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa la gas// ci'i slad du dgra bcom pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab
284b6('bum): raba' chub sa kun ba rdus ma'i sa kyig / sbyinanyam bya dang sa nyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags / ci'i slang durang byang chub bsam gyis myi khyab dbag tum mchis gzhal dum mchis shing / khyi mnyam pa
284b7('bum): ba dang mnyam tha myi dmyigs pa lags ga ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpago tshu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad
284b8('bum): du rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags
285a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po// / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga gzugs la
285a2('bum): 'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor 'du shes la yang

290a6('bum): ji'i slad du sa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ the'i slad du chu'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs

290b1('bum): ya mas pa dang dpag pa dang yang dang mnyas pa dang myi mnyam pa myi rimyigs pa lags dzi'i slad du ma rig pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa gyi dmyigs pa lags pa dzi'i grang
290b2('bum): du 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags ka ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lag
290b3('bum): ji'i srad du mying dang gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du skye mched drug la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang kyi
290b4('bum): gyi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du reg dpa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du tshor ba la bsam pa
290b5('bum): dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du sred pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags
290b6('bum): ji'i slad du len pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dgran pa/ byas ba myi dmyigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du srid pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang sgranyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
290b7('bum): pa pa dgang sa par ltags pa kyi myigs pa 'gas 'i'i grang sa gis bamam pa dang thag pa ma bas kyi mab gyi gyigs sa
290b8('bum): gyu 'i ba ya 'i dpal bams pa ga pa dang sa ya myi tshigs pa 'gas 'i mang gyu khrim 'i 'i sas sa rdzasag
291a1('bum): nga gapa dag ma pa kyi shA N+DI kyigs sakyi ma byal pa gyi phyin pa
291a2('bum): ba dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi rimyig
291a3('bum): pa lags// ji'i slad du nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du phyi stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa
291a4('bum): dang chang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa la/ gas/ ji'i slad tu phyi nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang te dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyig
291a5('bum): b.lags ci'i srang tu stong panyid stong pa nyid la bsam ba dang phag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang phyi mnyam bgyi dbyigs pa lags/ ci'i slang nguchen po stong pa nyid sa bsam pa dang / 
291a6('bum): du sbyis rnam pa kyi kyigs pa 5/ ma ma ma sto pa nyings bsnas pa dang gag pa gyu kyi gru
291a7('bum): 'i ming kya 'dus bya ba nyed pa sam dag pa dpa nga nyam tha kyis kyigs pas ming sa sus sa thas
291b1('bum): rang dpag par ngachang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ rdzi'i srad du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam
291b2('bum): bkyi dmyigs pa lags dzi'i slad du thog ma dang tha ma myed pa sto ba nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa mye rimyigs pa lags/ dzi'i slang du dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la
291b3('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myinyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags
291b4('bum): ji'i slad du chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dang ga pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang
291b5('bum): dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs palags/ ji'i slad du myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa
291b6('bum): lags/ ji'i slad du dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang
291b7('bum): da mam pa dang kyis nyam pa gyi dmyigs pa lags// ji'i srad du dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang nga dang mnyam pa dang phyim nyam la ma 'ji sra
291b8('bum): du ngan pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ri'i slang du yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang cang nga
292a1('bum): mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du dbang po rnams la
292a2('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ dzi'i slad du stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ dzi'i slad du byang chub
292a3('bum): kyi yan lag rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnye/ 
292a4('bum): ba myi myigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du bsam gtan rnams la bsam
292a5('bum): ba dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa la gas/ ji'i slad du tshad myed pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang drang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ 
292a6('bum): ji'i slad du gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ dzi'i slad du rnam par tharang pa brgyang la bsam pa rang dpag pa dang chang dang / 
292a7('bum): mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dbyigs pa lags/ ji'i slang dum par kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi ma nyam pa myi dbyigs pa lags/ ji'i slang du rnam
292a8('bum): par tha rang ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myong ba dang / smon pa myong ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags pa ji'i slad du mngon par shes pa rnams la bsam pa dang / 
292b1('bum): datheg par nga bar dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags pa dzi'i slad du ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang myi dmyigs pa lags/ dzi'i slad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams sa bsam
292b2('bum): ba dang dpag pa dang ca dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ji'i slang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dpag po dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang kyi mnyam pa gyi dmyigs pa lags/ 
292b3('bum): dzi'i slad du kyi 'jigs pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ dzi'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bsam pa dang chudra dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa
292b4('bum): myi dmyigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du byams pa chen po la bsam pa dang dadapag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags ji'i slad du snying rje chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang ma
292b5('bum): ba dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang / mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du/ 
292b6('bum): rgyunang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags// ji'i slad du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang
292b7('bum): phyi mnyam pa kyi myi ga dmyigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du bIr myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag par bachang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam gyi dmyigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du dgra bcom pa nyid la bsam/ 
292b8('bum): ba dong dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa legs/ ji'i slad du rang byang chub la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du lam/ 
293a1('bum): kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bsam pa dang dbag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dbyigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du ngam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang dbag pa dang cang dang mnyam pa dang / 
293a2('bum): myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal bka rab 'byor nga gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed/ gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa sta/

293a4('bum): de'i phyir tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa da myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor 'du shes kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis kyi khyab dbag tu myang gzhal du myed las myi mnyam pa dang
293a5('bum): mnyam ste/ de'i phyir 'du shes la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor/ 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid pas kyis myi khyab dpag tu gzhal du myed la myi

293b1('bum): rnyed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs sas rab 'byorang sna'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu kyang gsal du myang

293b5('bum): du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid la ba sam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khya

293b7('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sgra la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dri'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab ba gardzu
293b8('bum): myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dril bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga ro'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dngas
294a1('bum): gtu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ rol bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de reg gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis
