294a4('bum): shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myang gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir myig gi rnam pa dar shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam
294a5('bum): da kyi mnyam bgyi dbyigs so// rab 'byor na pa'i rnam pa shes pa'i dri bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab bag tu myed panas tu myong la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa steg de'i phyir rna ba'i
294a6('bum): rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ 
294a7('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga lho'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam
294a8('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu mye dag zham du mye la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// 
294b1('bum): khyo sus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid pasam gyis kyi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed sa kyimyi mnyam pa dang mnyam bsre ga de'i phyir chus kyi rnam par shes pa la ba sum pa dang dbyug byu da nga
294b2('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid kyi ni
294b3('bum): ba shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dmyig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myung gzhal du myed la
294b4('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir myig gi 'dus te reg pa nga la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor ngarna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
294b5('bum): ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed ga zhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang
294b6('bum): myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor sna'i'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa la bas
294b7('bum): dudung bag pa dang rbad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da sngo'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ 
294b8('bum): de'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
295a1('bum): a gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
295a2('bum): ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myang gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// 
295a3('bum): rab 'byor dmyig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myang gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshe
295a4('bum): babasam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi/ dmyigs so// rab 'byor ngan pa'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyi/ sa tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
295a5('bum): gnas myed du m+b+hi ma ma ba sa sa ste/ de'i phyir na pa'i dus rog pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpa' pa dang dang rnazhum pa dang phyi sanyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor pa'i
295a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpa'
295a7('bum): pa dang tshong dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myong la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ 
295a8('bum): de'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba li ngo bo nyid bsam
295b1('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi
295b2('bum): dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed/ gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te
295b3('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor sa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la
295b4('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa s+ho/ de'i phyir sa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang chu'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam
295b5('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa te dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chu'i khams la bsam pa dang rab theg pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigan
295b6('bum): rab 'byor mye'i khams phyi myong bas ma gyis kyi klubang pag ni sbed kun sa skyed/ kyimanyam nga chu na de'i phyir mye'i khams la bas ma pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa gyi
295b7('bum): dmyigs so// rab 'byorang rlung gi khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rlung gi khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang nga
295b8('bum): mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang nam mkha'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir nam mkha'i khas
296a1('bum): khabasam pa dang sa pa da dang nyas pa dang kyi mnyas pa myi dbyigs so// ra 'byo ma pa shes pa'i khams kyi rlo nyid bsas kyis ni khyab thug tu sbre gnas bye
296a2('bum): kyi nyam pa dang nyam pa ste/ de'i phyi sa par shes pa'i khams sa byasam pa dang ga pa dang dang mnyas pa kyi mkham pa myi dbyigs so/ rab byo mi mig pa'i po nying byas pa kyis
296a3('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ma rig pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid
296a4('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga rnam
296a5('bum): sa par mi nying bams gyis kyi khyab ngag tu myang sam myed pakhyi mnyam padang nyam ste/ do byi ma 'ges pa thamam 'ang zhug pa das nga mnyam par kyis
296a6('bum): myi dbyigs so// rab 'byor mying dang gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam ba ste/ de'i phyir mying dang gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag
296a7('bum): dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor skye mched drug gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam ste de'i phyir skye mched drug la bsam pa
296a8('bum): dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myang la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir reg pa la bsam
296b1('bum): dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myang gzhal du myeng la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshor za la bsam
296b2('bum): dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de sred pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed ga zhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sred pa la bsam
296b3('bum): ba dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da len pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myang gzhal du mye la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir len pa la bsam
296b4('bum): ba dang bag pa dba' dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs darab 'byor sring pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam padas 'di'i phyir sring ba la bas/ 
296b5('bum): 'drang bag pa dbang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs rab 'byor daskye ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gan la du myong la phyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir skye
296b6('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor ngag shi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnye ba ste/ de'i phyir rga shi la bsam pa dang
296b7('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyi myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ ji'i phyir
296b8('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu mye
297a1('bum): gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol
297a2('bum): tu phyi nang pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu byed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'azod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam
297a3('bum): bamyi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang du phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang tu phyin
297a4('bum): bsam pa dang pag gtud dang mnyam pa dang m+b+hi ma pagyi dbyin to/ da byo pas pa gtan gi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i ngo bo nyid pas dkyis kyi khyab dpag tu myed gzhas du myed lan skye
297a5('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam ste/ de'i phyir bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin/ kha la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi
297a6('bum): pha rol tu phyinang pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam
297a7('bum): ba dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu byed gzhal du byed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang
297a8('bum): dpag pa dang zang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor phyi sto 'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed / gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid
297b1('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dgyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed lag kyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
297b2('bum): ste de'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang phyi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal
297b3('bum): du myed la skye mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyig so// rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis
297b4('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa ste nga de'i phyir chen po stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor
297b5('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myedagazhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ngon/ dam pa stong pa nyid bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang
297b6('bum): dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs sos rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed le myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'dus byas
297b7('bum): stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang rang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la
297b8('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo na
298a1('bum): nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi ma
298a2('bum): myi dmyigs so/ rab 'byor nga thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma myed/ 
298a3('bum): bstong pa nyid la bsam pa dang bags pa ya de dang mnyam pa dang kyim nyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dang byed bstong panyid kyi des nyid ma sa gyis myi rgyab dpag tu kyang gnas sgyu
298a4('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dor ba myed pa stong pa nyi rna ma bsam zang dang zag pa dang tshad dang blanam dang myi mnyam pa/ myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga rang bzhin
298a5('bum): stong ba tan tu rnga ma rta zas ma gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
298a6('bum): mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs sog/ rab 'byor nga chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir/ 
298a7('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed
298a8('bum): la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam za ste/ de'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngos
298b1('bum): nyid bsam gyis dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ 
298b2('bum): rab 'byor dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dngos po myeng pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
298b3('bum): mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la
298b4('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyadapa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du
298b5('bum): myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dngos po myeng pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dran
298b6('bum): bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsas kyis kyi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la phyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dran banye bar gzhag pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag bya dang / 
298b7('bum): chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pamyi myigs so// rab 'byor nga yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myang la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir/ 
298b8('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal
299a1('bum): da kyimam pas kyi 'phru gyi dang gapa das dang ma ma sa kyi ga
299a2('bum): mchis nyid pasam gyis kyi khyab pag tu mye gzhal du mye sa kyi mnyas pa dang mnyam ba ste/ de'i phyir dang po rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dpa' dang mnyam pa dang phyi mnyam pa myi dbyigs so// rab 'byor
299a3('bum): stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa steg/ de'i phyir stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang man
299a4('bum): myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyingo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la
299a5('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi nyam pa myi drin/ gas so// rab 'byor nga 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myu la
299a6('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnye pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam/ 
299a7('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng ga zhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga bsam
299a8('bum): gnyen rnams kyi ngobo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dngag tu byed gzha' du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'asam gtan rnams la bsam pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs son
299b1('bum): rab byor bar myed pa rnams kyi ngo btang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myang gnal du myed lAkra myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chang myed pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang mya mnyan
299b2('bum): bamyi dmyigs sag/ rab 'byor rang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzugs myed pa'i
299b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga rnam par tha ra pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhab du myed
299b4('bum): sa myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par thar pa brgyang la bsam pa rdang jazag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam ba myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor mthar kyis gnas pa'i smos
299b5('bum): bar 'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gan la du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mthar kyi sa gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsam tha dang / 
299b6('bum): dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myang/ 
299b7('bum): gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myeng ba dang / smon pa myed pa la bsam bsam dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi
299b8('bum): dmyigs so// rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mngon par shes pa rnams la bsam za dang
300a1('bum): pag pa dang sa dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// ra 'byor ting 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis kyi khyab dadag tu myeng gzha' du myeng la gyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pasreg ngo'i phyir ting
300a2('bum): kyi nad rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang
300a3('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag
300a4('bum): du skyeng gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcul bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / cad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs sog rab 'byor
300a5('bum): myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo na nyid zasam gyis rmyi khyab dpag tu myed rapagazhal du byed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir myi 'jigs pa ba zhil bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa
300a6('bum): dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa
300a7('bum): rnams ma tham ma tha dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dbyams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
300a8('bum): bste/ de'i phyir byams pa chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi myigs so// rab 'byor nga snying rdzichen po'i ngo na nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myang gzhal du myeng la
300b1('bum): myigags pa dang mnyam pa ste/ do phyir snying rje rnathas bsam pa dang pag tha dang mdzaja tha ma thA da mya mnyam tha rgya dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bas brgya kyi bo nying bsan
300b2('bum): kyis kyi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa m+b+ha/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyang la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnam pa gyi dmyigan
300b3('bum): rab 'byor brgyu nang du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ kyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ ri'i phyir rgyund tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dbang dbag/ 
300b4('bum): pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang myi nyam tha dza myigs so// rab 'byor/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnye ba ste/ 
300b5('bum): de'i phyir khan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dbang dang mnyam pa dang myi man ma la gyi rab 'byor daphyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed/ 
300b6('bum): gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myinyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid
300b7('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'a
300b8('bum): rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rang byang chub la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyig so// 
300b9('bum): rab 'byor lam gi rnam pa shes pa'i nyid kyi ngo bo nyid/ bsam gyis kyi khyadapag tu myed/ gzhal du myongs myi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir
301a1('bum): oMkham gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis kyi khyab dpag tu myed
301a2('bum): gzhang du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// 
301a3('bum): rang byor de'i snyam du sems / gzugs gang bsam gyis/ myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang dmanyam pa de la gzugs dmyigs su yod dam ga tshor
301a4('bum): gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la tshor ba dmyigs su yong ngam/ 'du shes gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myang gzhal
301a5('bum): dumyed pa ste// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du shes dmyigs su yod dam/ 'du byed gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du byed dmyig
301a6('bum): su yod dam/ rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa dmyigs su yod dam// myig gang bsam gyis myi
301a7('bum): kyam sa kyi byed gzhas byed pa ste// kyimyi mnyam pa dang mnyas pa de labyin dbyigs kyi yongasas/ na ba gang bsas kyi ltub sa byed gas du byed pa / kyi mnyam pa dang mnyam
301b1('bum): dmyigs su yod dam/ sna gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna dmyigs su yod dam/ lce gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed ga zha/ 
301b2('bum): du myong ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce dmyigs su yod dam/ lus gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhil du myong ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de lus dmyig su yod dam/ 
301b3('bum): srid gang bsam gyis kyi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myeng ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang marnam pa rlo ma yid dmyigs su yod dam// gzugs gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzham du myed pa ste/ 
301b4('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de gzugs dmyigs su yod dam/ sgra gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sgra dmyigs su yong dam
301b5('bum): drigang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed ba ste/ kyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dri dmyigs su yong ngam ro gang khams gyis myi khyab dpag tu myong gzhal du myed pa ste/ 
301b6('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ro dmyigs su yod dam/ reg gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam po dang mnyam pa de la reg dmyigs su yod dam/ chos gang ba
301b7('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chos dmyigs su yod dam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed
301b8('bum): khyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la myig gi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su yong ngam/ rdza ba'i rnam par shes pa gang bas ma gyis kyi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa sten myi mnyam pas
302a1('bum): na pa'i rnam pa gyes pa mas su so da/ hU~M rnas pa shes gang mas kyisaN+DI kyab drug tu med gzhas du myeng ba ste/ kyisanyam bu dang sa pa / 
302a2('bum): ya sI rnam par shes pa myigs su song ngam/ sgo'i rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sgo'i rnam
302a3('bum): shes pa dmyigs su sod dam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi rnam par
302a4('bum): shes pa dmyigs su yod dam/ yid kyi rnam par shes dpa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myong ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid
302a5('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su yod dam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu mya ga rnam du myeng ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la myig gi 'dus
302a6('bum): te reg pa dmyigs su yod dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed lo myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su yod dam/ sna'i
302a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su yod dam/ lho'i 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis
302a8('bum): myi khyab dpog tu myed ga zhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lho'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su yod dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal
302b1('bum): myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su song dmag yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam
302b2('bum): pa dus yi kyi 'dus te dgas rtsegs su ya dang pa/ myig gi 'dus d+hi ga pa khyud sam gyis myi khya byung bag tu myong gas pa skyed pas+ho/ kyi mnyam pa dang nyam pa des kyi
302b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dmyigs su yod dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myong ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa la
302b4('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dmyigs su yod dngam/ sI'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gang bsam dgyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam
302b5('bum): ba dang mnyam pa de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tsher ba dmyigs su yod darma lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myong gzhal
302b6('bum): du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dmyigs su yod dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag
302b7('bum): tu myed gzhal du myeng ba snye/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dmyigs su yong dmag yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gams kyis kyi
302b8('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myong ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dmyigs su song ngam/ sa'i khams gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myi khya
303a1('bum): gsas byed skye gyi sa 'a sa smra pa la si'i lalas myigs su songangs tshun 'ams gang bsam gyis kyi khya sas bye pal du myed pa rnyes rgya
303a2('bum): ba dang mnyam pa de la chu'i khams dmyigs su song ngam/ myo'i khams gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myang gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa ma rnam pa de la gyi khams dmyigs kyu
303a3('bum): song dag rlung gi khams gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rlung gi khams dmyigs su yod dam/ nam mkha'i khams gang bsam gyis
303a4('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa de la nam mkha'i khams/ dmyigs su yod dam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams gang bsam gyis myi khyab
303a5('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa'i khams dmyigs su yod dam// ma rig pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal
303a6('bum): du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ma rig pa dmyigs su yong dam/ 'du byed gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du byed
303a7('bum): dbyigs su sod ngam / rnam par shes bgang masas gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ gyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa dmyigs su yong dam/ bying dang
303a8('bum): 'brugs byam ma gyis gyi khyab dpag tu byed gzhal du byung ba ste/ khyi mnyam pa dang nyam pa la mying dang gzugs kyi 'du sod pa skye 'o du ga sa gyis kyi rgya nga/ 
303b1('bum): gnal du myed pa ste/ myi mnam tha dang mnyam pa de la skye mched drug dmyigs su mdza jam ka reg pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la reg pa
303b2('bum): dmyigs su yod dam/ tshor ba gang bsam gyis myi khyi ba zag tu myang ga zham du myongag myi ma mnyam za dzang rmanya tha za de lo tshor ba dmyigs su yong dmag sred pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu
303b3('bum): myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa rda la sred pa dmyigs su yod dmag len pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la len pa
303b4('bum): dmyigs su yong dmag srid pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa rjem srid pa dmyigs su yong dam/ skye ba gang bsam gyis
303b5('bum): myi khyab dpag du myeng gnas du myang ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnya bde la skye ba dmyigs su yong dmag shishi gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ phyi mnyam pa pa/ 
303b6('bum): mnyam pa de la rga ga dmyigs su yod dam// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myong ga zhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
303b7('bum): dmyigs su yod dmag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bla sam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmyigs
303b8('bum): mu song ngas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa ga zasam gyis myo rgya bar thog tu myo ga zham du myang ba sten myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs su yod dam/ brtson 'grus
304a1('bum): ci rol na pa gang bsam gyis kyi rgyab ga bye gnas du rgya bas kyi mnyam pa dang nyam pa de lnga rtsom 'azus kyi rol tu pa dbyinas su song shA/ pas sa gtanag par/ 
304a2('bum): tu byinang bkang bsam gyis kyi khyab dpag tu byeng ga nas myed brtsed gyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pade sabasas ka mig sa ro song tu phyinang pa rtsigs su song dam / shes pa kyi ro bang tu byi mang ba
304a3('bum): bsam gis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dmyigs su yod dam/ nang stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed/ 
304a4('bum): gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la nang stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ phyi stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang
304a5('bum): mnyam pa de la phyi stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed pa ste myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la phyi nang spyod pa nyid dmyigs su
304a6('bum): yod dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myeng ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su song ngam/ chen po stong pa nyid gang bas
304a7('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chen po stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du
304a8('bum): myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la don dam pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su yong dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang bsam gis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa del
304b1('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmyigs
304b2('bum): su yod dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa snye/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nga/ de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su yong ngam/ 
304b3('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myeng ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ dor ba myed pa
304b4('bum): stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du mye nga pa ste myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang bas
304b5('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyakha dang mnyam pa de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi
304b6('bum): khyab bag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmyigs su song ngam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis kyi khyab dpag tu myeng / 
304b7('bum): gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ 
304b8('bum): myi mnyam pa de la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dngos po myed pa sngo/ 
305a1('bum): ga panyid dmyigs su song dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myeng ba sten myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su song ngamag dngos po myed na
305a2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su yong dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang bas
305a3('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myang gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ yang dag par spong ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal
305a4('bum): du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yang dag par spong ba dmyigs su song ngam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa gang bas dam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myo gzhal du myed pa ste/ 
305a5('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rdzu 'phrul gyi narkang pa dmyigs su yod dam/ dbang po gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dag
305a6('bum): so nam sna dmyigs su yong ngam/ stobs gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du med pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la stobs dmyigs su yong dam/ byang chub kyi yan lag gapa
305a7('bum): sas kyis kyi khyab dpag tu myed gzhas du myed pa / phye mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de'i byung chub kyi yan lag dmyigs su song ngam 'bags pa'i lam ldan lag spyang pa gang bas
305a8('bum): kyis kyi byab dag mye ga' myed khyi mnyam pa dang nyam pa de la 'phags pa'i rnas pam pag zung ba gyigs bu sang pas/ 'phags pa'i 'den pa gang babs kyis kyi rtsa
305b1('bum): tu skyed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyas pa dang mnyam pa de la 'gas pa'i bden pa dbyigs su yong ngam / bsam gtan gang bsam kyis kyi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhas du myeng ba sten
305b2('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la bsam gtan dmyigs su yod dam/ tshad myed pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la tshad myed pa
305b3('bum): dmyigs su yod dam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms pa
305b4('bum): 'jug pa rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ rnam par thar pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed/ gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag rnam par tha rad pa
305b5('bum): rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myeng ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
305b6('bum): de dag la mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myeng ba dang / smon pa myed pa gang bsam
305b7('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pas/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myeng ba dmyigs su yod dam
305b8('bum): mngon par shes pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la mngon par shes pa rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ ting nge 'dzin
306a1('bum): oM gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myeng bkreg myi mnyam tha dang mnyam pa de sa ting nge 'dzin rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ gzungs kyi sgo gang bsam gyis myi khyan dpag tu
306a2('bum): skye gsal du byed pa steg myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmyigs su yod dngam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gang bas mo gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed pa
306a3('bum): myi mnyamal pa dang mnyam pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dmyigs su yong ngas/ myi 'jigs pa gang bsam gyis kyi khyang dpag tu byed gzhal du byung ba ste/ myi mnyam par
306a4('bum): mnyam pa de dag la myi 'jigs pa rnams dmyigs su yong dam rjes so yang dag par rig pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myang ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam padzes
306a5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ byams pa chen po gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzha la du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de lha byams pa
306a6('bum): rje chen po gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de langag la/ snying rje chen po dmyigs su song ngam/ spangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang
306a7('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmyigs su yong dam/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gang bsam gyis
306a8('bum): gyi khyab dpag tu byed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmyigs su song ngam/ yan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang bsam gyis kyi khyab dpag tu
306b1('bum): myed gzhal du myed pa sten gyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmyigs su yang ngam dma' phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ kyi
306b2('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmyags su dmyigs su song ngamag dgra bcom pa nyid gang zas mi gyis myi rgyan dzazag tu myong ga zham du myong ba ste/ rmyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nga la
306b3('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid dmyigs su song ngam/ rang byang chub gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rang byang chub dmyigs su yod dmag lam gyi rnam
306b4('bum): bkres pa nyid grang bas ma gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lam gyi rnam pa 'i sa pa nyid dmyig su yong dam ga rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
306b5('bum): pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi dmyigs su yod dam// gsolang pag bcom ldan 'das
306b6('bum): de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis za ka 'a sum rnga zag rab 'byor de de bas na rnam grangs des chos thams cad bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
306b7('bum): ba'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam pa dang bral ba'i phyir/ bsam gyis kyi khyab pa'o// dpag pa dang bral ba'i phyir dpag tu myed pa'o// 
306b8('bum): chad dang bral ba'i phyir gzhal du myed pa'o// mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa dang bral ba'i phyir namyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des ma/ chos thams cad bsam gyis myi khyab dpag
307a1('bum): skye / sa ra byo pa na da sa sa ma mas mas pas
307a2('bum): da khyab ga dadag pa las yongs su 'das pas na ngag tu byed pa'o// chang las yongs su 'das pas na gzhal du skyed pa'o// mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa las yongs su 'das pas na/ phyi mnyam pa dang mnyam ngas
307a3('bum): rab khyo dgis kyi khyab ces bya ba 'di bsam du myeng pa'i tshig bla dgas so / rab 'byor dpag tu myed ces bya ba 'di ni/ dpag tu myong ba'i tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byor gzhal du myong ba zhes bya ba 'im
307a4('bum): nad myed pa'i tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byor du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mnyam pas mnyam 'i tshig bla dgas te rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam gyis
307a5('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du byed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya ba ni/ nam mkha' bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir ro// dpag tu myed
307a6('bum): ces bya ba ni / nam mkha'i dpag tu myed pa'i phyir ro// gzhal du myed ces bya ba ni nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir ro// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni/ nam mkha' myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pan
307a7('bum): phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni bsam gyis myi khyab dngag tu myed gzhas du myed pa/ gyi mnyam pa dang mnyub bste/ de ni d+hA dang / myi dang / lam yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
307a8('bum): nags tham ma tha'am dngag par kyi nus te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas rnams ni gzhal du myong ngo // sang sargyas kyi chos rnams ni gzhal du byed do// de ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhin gshegs pa'i bas
307b1('bum): kyis myi khyab pa dang / dpag tu myed pa dang / gzhal du myed ba dang / khyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i cheg/ dge slong lnga baN+DI nye bar len pa myed par zag pa las sems rnam par gros lo// 
307b2('bum): ge slong ba ng+gA blaganyi bus nye bar len pa skyed par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong pa stong phrag drug cu dang / dag snyong ma stong brog sum chus ni chos rnams la grub dang tha ba zhing
307b3('bum): dri ma dang bral ba'i chos kyi myig rnam par dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag nyi shus ni/ myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la sangs/ 
307b4('bum): rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lhung bstan to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu byi nang pa stong phrag brgya ba las le'u sum cu bzhi'o// 
307b5('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di
307b6('bum): ska ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha ro long tu phyi nang pa 'di ni zab pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyinang pa 'di ni don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas tho shes rab kyi pha rolang tu byed
307b7('bum): pa'adi ni cang ma mchis pa'i na skye ra gnas pa'o// shesas kyis la tu byin pa 'dzin na byug tu ma mchis pa'i slang byenye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa'i dir don gnas dus
307b8('bum): rmil pa rdzu phye bar ga sa theg pa lda las shes ma ma byed pa na phyi ma da gas pa'i mang bya gnas pag sa na sa pa 'am
308a1('bum): kyi rtson po kyi gyu pa nga shA pa'i byigs rab po'i phyir bye ra khyo shes 'i phyi nga pa zhib ma 'a na/ gang tu byin pa lta dus so/ rab kyi
308a2('bum): sarab kyi pha rol tu byi nang ba zab mo 'dir nin stong pa nyid lus so/ gyi stong pa nyid 'dus so// byi nang stong pa nyid 'dus stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so // chen po stong pa nyid 'dus so
308a3('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// 'dus pa byas stong pa nyid 'dus 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus so// mtha' las 'das pa ste nga ba nyid 'dus so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
308a4('bum): 'dus so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'dus so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'dus so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// dngos po myed
308a5('bum): stong pa nyid 'dus so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dug/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'dus so// yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'dus so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
308a6('bum): ni 'dus so// dbang po 'dus so// stobs lnga 'dus so// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'dus so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dus so// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'dus so// bos mo gtan ba'i
308b1('bum): gabs bcu dus so/ phyi 'arigs pa bzhi 'dus so/ so so sang dag pa rig pa pa'i 'dus so// byams pa chen po 'dus so/ snying rje chen po 'dus so// sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa bco brgyad 'dus so// 
308b2('bum): rgyu tu zhugs pa'i rdzas sa so/ kyi lus rgya kyi rgyal ba'i byas sa sum sa/ kyang chu lus
308b3('bum): thigs pa nyid 'dus so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dus rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang skur ba/ srid pa brtan par gyur pa'i rgyal po'i gos
308b4('bum): ba 'am/ yul gyi rgos pa gang ci'ang rung ste/ de dag thams cad la blon po las su bcug na/ de'i tshe rgyal po ni rgyal po'i dgos pa dang / yul gyi dgos pa la snying las chung zhing / khur bor ba yin
308b5('bum): rab 'byor de de bzhin du nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

309a1('bum): myong ba'i gangs pa'o/ zhesas kyi par mdza byed pa 'dzin bya bgyim tam pa dang gas pa'i phyi'i khar gnas pa la/ 'o ci'i byor zhe na rab tung pa'i 'di gyur shes

339a6('bum): reg pa mngon pa chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// ra ba la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// sreng ba la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzungs
339a7('bum): myi bya'o// len pa la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// srid pa la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// srid pa la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// 
339a8('bum): yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// skye ba la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// rga shi la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa
339b1('bum): lamangon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar gyi bya'o// chub khrims kyi pha rol du byin pa la mngon par chags par gyi bya'o// sangs su gzung bar myi bya'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags
339b2('bum): par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyinang pa la mngon par chags par myi
339b3('bum): bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// 
339b4('bum): phyi stong pa nyid la/ mngon parachags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par myi
339b5('bum): bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// 
339b6('bum): chus nyas snang mnying la mngon pa cams pa kyi myog song su gzung bar gyi bya'o// lus gnyis stong pa nyid pa mngod rigs pa bya'o/ yongs su gagrang bar gyi bya'o// mtha' sa sa
339b7('bum): pa nyid pa mngon pa gas par gyi byar/ yongs su gzung bar myi byab thog ma dang ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma mngon pa rachags par gyi byos/ yongs su gzung bar gyi byo'o/ 'od byed pastong pa nyid la mngon pa
339b8('bum): bar gyi bya'o/ yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par dgas par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par gyi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bye'o
340a1('bum): rag mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa
340a2('bum): nyid la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags
340a3('bum): bar myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// 
340a4('bum): yongs su gzung bar gyi bya'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mdo ngan par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// dbang po rnams la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar
340a5('bum): mi bya'o/ stobs rnams la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// nga sa su gzung bar myi bya'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon pa chags par gyi bya'o/ yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// 'phags ci
340a6('bum): mas namag rgyu pa la mngon par chags par myi bya'o/ yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par gas par gyi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// bsam gtan rnams la mngon
340a7('bum): rgyalags par gyi bya'o/ yongs su gzung ba gyi byor/ mang myeng pa rnams la mngon par chags par gyi byar/ yongs su gzung ba myi bya'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par
340a8('bum): kyi phyo'o/ yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// rnam par bar ba rnams la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// ngas sugazung bar gyi bya'o// bar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par gyi gyi
340b1('bum): yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon dar
340b2('bum): chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// de bzhin gshegs
340b3('bum): pa'i stobs bcu la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// myi 'jigs pa bzhi la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mngon par
340b4('bum): chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// byams pa dachen po la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// snying rje chen po la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs
340b5('bum): b.rung bar gyi bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma dres pa 'aso brgya la mngon par rags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mngon par chags par gyi skye
340b6('bum): yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung ba
340b7('bum): myi bya'o// dgra bcom pa nyid la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// rang byang chub la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// mam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par
340b8('bum): bar chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par chags par
341a1('bum): myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa'an spyod pa'i lha dag gis
341a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa 'di ni zab cing blta dka' la rtogs par dka' ba ste/ myi rtan pa/ brtag pa'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ zhi zhing phra ba la
341a3('bum): mkhas pa dang / byang ba dang yid gsal bar 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la mos pa de dag ni/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa'o// 
341a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la mos pa de dag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te stong
341a5('bum): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dang pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brkyong pa dang / rgyunang tu zhugs pa dang / lan
341a6('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas su gyur te/ de dag thams cad pa shes dang / slong ba gang snyed cig mchis pa dang / shes rab kyi pha ro gong du phyi nad pa zab mo 'di la gdugs
341a7('bum): smig dumos zhing bas pas te gzhas pa dang / gag pa dang / dbyang ba gnyis nags rab kyi pa ro 'ong tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gdugs gcin tumos pa nyid ces legs pa'i tog du 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du na
341a8('bum): doni 'di ltar dang pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ci ram pa dang / spong ba gang mi snyeng ba deni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// chos kyi
341b1('bum): su za ba'i sems pa dang / spos pa sa badzin / khyang sems dpa sems dpa ben pa'i gyis pa cos la yod pa lab pa'i sa smra dang / ba dzi nu di/ byu na
341b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i sde shes/ gang ci tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ci tsama'i de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
341b3('bum): chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ci tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i
341b4('bum): chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ci tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i
341b5('bum): 'ong ba nus so// dam bcom pa nyid kyil shes gang cirnam pa dang spong ba gang tsam par ni/ byang chubasems dpa sems dpa'abya chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pathob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/ 
341b6('bum): rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ci tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
341b7('bum): kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la bka' stsal pa/ lci'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang snod byang chub sems dpa'
341b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ci tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
342a1('bum): mi skye ba'i chos la 'azod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// brgyad pa'i ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang / spyong ba gang ci tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
342a2('bum): ya rin po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i seshes gang ci tsam pa dang spong ba gang ci tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
342a3('bum): chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i seshes gang ci tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ci tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sos dngu
342a4('bum): na po'i myo skye ba'i chos sa bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i ye shes gang gis pa dang / song ba gang ci tsam pa do ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' byen
342a5('bum): na pa'i gyi skye ba'i chos pa bzod pa mom pa'i 'thong bar zhus so// 'i bu dgarigs kyi bu' rigs kyi bum gang bu yang rung ste/ ges rab kyi la ming tu phyimang pazab mo 'di
342b1('bum): ba ba'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral ba/ mdo sde gzhan la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar spyod pa dag ni/ ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhen
342b2('bum): de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di las phul du bya ba'i chos gang la dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyu nang tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyi
342b3('bum): 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslab par byab dang / myod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ga mngon par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang la byang chub
342b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bslab par bya ba dang / gang la de bzhin gshegs pa dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslabs te bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
342b5('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag rgya cher bstan to// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / 
342b6('bum): gzugs yong ba ni spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/ ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nipha rol tu phyi nang pa chen mo
343a1('bum): ste bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni dpag tu ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa'o// 'di ni gzhil du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa'o// 'di ni myi man
343a2('bum): mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di la slabs shing / dang pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur
343a3('bum): rjes su 'brang ba rnams 'byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ brkyang ba rnams byung bar 'gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa rnams 'byung bar gyur te/ 'byu
343a4('bum): zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar rnams 'byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar gyur da ste/ phyir myi 'ong ba rnams 'byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ 
343a5('bum): dgra bcom pa rnams 'byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ de la bslabs shing / rang sangs rgyas rnaMs 'byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ de la bslabs
343a6('bum): shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ 'byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ yang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu
343a7('bum): phyind pa zab mo 'di ni/ 'grib pa 'am/ 'phel bar yang myi ganga'o zhes nas/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
343a8('bum): spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la ldan gsum du/ gsus phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dong ste/ de dag shin tu yang myi ring ba zhig tu phyin
343b1('bum): sdu par gyur / 'dad pa na spyod pa'i sti dag ni 'dod pa'i khams su 'khod / gzugs yod pa' na spyang ba'i lha'i bu dgra ni gzugs yod pa 'i khams su 'khong da/ de nas tshe dang ldan
343b2('bum): kyid kyis bcom ldan 'das po 'di skad ces gsolang to/ bcom ldan 'das kyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ga zhes rab kyi pha 'ong tu phyi nang pa zab mo 'ang thos ma thag tums par
343b3('bum): 'gyur zhing / gong du 'dra ba dang / 'dzi nang pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par 'gyid ring / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na de nas gi 'phos te// 'dir skyes par gyur pa lags ka
343b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu/ mos shing zhum par
343b5('bum): myi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par myi 'gyur// rmongs par myi 'gyur shing / the tsom myi za/ nem nur myi byed la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zlab mo 'di nyam par mngon par dga'
343b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin du pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang / srid la bya ba de dag dang myi 'bral la yid la bye ba de dag 'gro 'am 'ong ba 'phru/ 'greng ngam 'dug gram
343b7('bum): sa yang chung ste/ rtagargyun myi 'chang bar 'jigs par myi byed cing / chos smra ba'i gang zag de dgal yang / rtag tu rgyun myi chang par 'brang ste/ rab 'byor dper na
343b8('bum): mabe'u kyi 'dor ba ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha ro yang tu phyi nang pa zab mo 'di ni/ don du nam shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa 'di mngon du ma byas / rnan pa
344a1('bum): 'dres par ma byas pa/ yid kyis rtogs par ma byas/ lta bas shi nang du khong du chung par ma byas kyi bar drug chos smra ba de myi gtong na/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
344a2('bum): pag dgi kyi'i nang nas gi 'phos nas kyi'i nang du skyes pa'o/ co'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi byings/ stoms shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin
344a3('bum): pa zab mo 'di thos nas ka bzung ba dang // bcang ba dang / klag pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas par gyur to// gong du yang bris shing / glegs bam du byas te/ 
344a4('bum): me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror byas par gyur to// bkur sti dang / thu dung dang
344a5('bum): mod ba byas par gyur to/ dge ba'i rtsa bgod kyis kyi'i mi nas mi yos nas khyi'i na du skyes te/ shes pa kyi rolang tu phyin pa zab mo 'angs yang thos mthag tu
344a6('bum): byu ba zhig nga sa sums kya kyisems pa semapa ga ste cig nga ma pa la'i nga pa
344a7('bum): kyigan das la ba snyen pa byar byed byeng galas gi 'phos te 'di skyes pa den kyi ma grangs mchis pas ma ma sa ma ldan ras kyis pa 'bu'ang ba byo rje
344b1('bum): bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa las/ de nas shi 'phos te// 'dir skyes pa den
344b2('bum): sa rab kyi pa ra mang tu byi nang pa zab ma 'di thos ma thag tu / mos par 'gyur ro// mos par gyur nas kyang 'dri zhing / bris nas kyang / lung 'bog go ka kha ton du byeng // rdum bzhin du ming
344b3('bum): byed do// de'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thab mo 'dri thom srog
344b4('bum): thos nas kyang bzung ngo ngog/ bcangs so// yongs su bcang ngas so// blags so// kun chub par byas so// kha ton du byas tshul bzhin du yid la byas so// de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid
344b5('bum): mings byed pa de nyid kyis/ 'dir skyes pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rje mtho dga' ldan gi lha rnams dpa/ skal ba mnyam pa
344b6('bum): las shi 'phos nas myi ning du skal ba mnyam par skyes na yang / de ni yon tan de dag nyid dang ldan par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa
344b7('bum): mas dpa' chen po des ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byams pa la/ shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa zab mo 'di yongs su dri ba dang / yongs su brtag pa byas
344b8('bum): bos de ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba nges 'dir skyes par rig par bya'o// / 
345a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pabam po / rab 'byor da gzhan yang gang zas byang chub sems dpa'i theg dpa
345a2('bum): gang gis sngon gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rang ba zab mo 'di bstanang pa'i tshe sha nem nung du 'gyur/ rmongs par
345a3('bum): 'gyur sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang gis sngon gyi mtharang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos kyang yongs su
345a4('bum): madris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni ges rab kyi pha robang tu phyinas bsrab mo 'di bstanang pa'i che/ nem nur du 'gyur/ mongs par 'gyur dang / sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur
345a5('bum): khyo zhan pa sapas cang sa kyi yo yus kyi yo yos su sa nga@
345b1('bum): tha dag tshul khrims kyi rosongs nyind 'thos kyang yongs sum dris yongasas bdag pa ma byas pa de ni gis ra phyi ros gyid pa'ab mo 'di bganang pa'i cha mem dung du gyur 'ongs par gyur
345b2('bum): sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang geng zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mtha rang sbyin pa'i pha rolang tu phyinang pa thos kyang yongs su
345b3('bum): ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyi mang pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur sems// zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi nan pa gzhan du 'gyur ro rab 'byor/ 
345b4('bum): gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis/ sngon gyi mthar nang stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris pa yo/ sa su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
345b5('bum): zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe// nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byord gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
345b6('bum): pa gang gis sngon gyi mtharang gyi stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha ro la na phyinang pa zab mo 'di bstanang pa'i tshe/ nem rur du 'gyur/ rmongs par gyur/ 
345b7('bum): sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar ra phyi nang stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ 
345b8('bum): yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi mi'i ming du phyinang pa zab mo 'di bsarang pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// 
346a1('bum): rab 'byor nga gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar da stong pa nyid stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris// yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol da
346a2('bum): tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa/

346a8('bum): zos kyang yongs sa ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi phyi rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i cha/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan
346b1('bum): du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngor gyi mthang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris / yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
346b2('bum): phying b.lal mo 'di pag na pa gnas su ru byur/ rmongs par gyur/ sengs bum par gyu sems kyi rnam pa g.yang du gyur ro/ 'byor gzhan yang ga ga kyang chub pa sa dag rig pa pag sa

347b1('bum): yongs su btag pam byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyiring ba zab mo 'di bstan pa'i gachem sur du 'gyur/ mongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//

348b1('bum): bshad pa'i ne cas cugamo sa par 'gyu sangs zhum par sug sems kyi rnam pa pagan du 'gyur garab 'byor gzhan yang krung dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'ag gis sngon gyi lag

349b7('bum): nga yig pa gang gis gyi pa ny-ing chechen po sas kyang yongs sa ma ni / yos su gag pa ma byas pa de / gas la kyi na sa kyi pa mo 'ji bshad pa'i ma/ sa su du gyur/

350a1('bum): 6// bco brgyad thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur sems zhum par 'gyur/
