350a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas te/ nyi ma gcig gam gnyis sam/ gsum 'am bzhi 'am lngar rjes sum 'brangs na/ gang zag
350b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing rtog pa dang / nyi mi gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum 'am bzhi 'am lngar rjes su 'brang bar byed pa'i che/ 
350b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa phab mo 'di myi 'phrogs par myi 'gyur te/ yongs dri ba dang yang myi ldan par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga de ni de ltar yang 'gyur teka gang gis shes rab kyi pha
350b3('bum): rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di yongs su ma dris/ yongs su ma brtags rjes su 'brang ba ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zab mo 'di ma'and pa la de tsam gyis dge ba'i bsam pa dang / mos pa
350b4('bum): skye bar 'gyur te/ de ni bar bar mos shing / bar bar mos pa myed/ dpar 'gyur te/ de ni ldam ldem gyi blo nges 'phrogs gang / shing bal gyi gzegs ma bzhin du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga gang zag byang
350b5('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni yun ring po nas theg pa la zhugs pa ma yin par rig par bya ste dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma bzung ba'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
350b6('bum): sangs rgyas la bsnyen pa bkur ma byas pa'o// rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa des ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i lung ba/ cos// kha ton du ma byas pa le/ tshul
350b7('bum): bzhin du yid lam byas te/ des ni/ shes rab kyi pha tsho lang tu phyin pa lam bslabs sog bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la ma bslabs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la ma
350b8('bum): bskabs so// bzod pa'i pha rolang sa phyind pa la ma bslabs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la ma bslabs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa la sa sti bskabs son pa stong pa nyid lam
351a1('bum): kha srabs so// khyi stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid lam bslabs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs po/ cher po stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid la ma
351a2('bum): bslabs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid lam bslabs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// 
351a3('bum): dong pa myed pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
351a4('bum): bya ma bslabs so// dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam la
351a5('bum): ma paslabs so// yang dag par spong ba rnams lam bslabs so// rdzu 'brus kyi rkang pa rnams la ma bsrabs so// dbang po rnams la ma bslabs so// stobs rnams lam bslabs so// byang chub
351a6('bum): ldan pa ga rnams lam pa las s+ho// phags pa'i ya tan lag ud pa lam bsrags so// lags pa'i bden parnams lam bslabs so// ma rdza rnams lam 'asrangs so/ 
351a7('bum): byed pa mas byed pa ma la jug pa ma so// ma yang pa yang sa / pa
351b1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams la ma bslabs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la ma bslabs so// myi 'jigs pa bzhi la ma bslabs so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi lam bslabs so// byams pa
351b2('bum): chen po la ma/ bslabs so// snying rje chen po la ma bslabs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la ma bslabs so// rgyund tu zhugs pa 'bras bu la ma bslabs so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
351b3('bum): 'bras bu la mabaslabs so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ma bslabs so// dgra bcom pa nyid la ma bsgrubs so// rang byang chub la ma bslabs so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la ma bslabs so// 
351b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la ma bslabs so// rab byod dade gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs par rig par bya ste/ de ni dad pa tsam dang / 
351b5('bum): dga' ba tsam dang // mos pa tsam dang ldan par zad de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zab mo 'di bri ba 'am/ klag pa 25/ lung 'bog pa 'am/ kha ton du bya ba 'am/ tshul bzhin du
351b6('bum): yid la bya bar myi nus so// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'ji 'dri zhing lung myi 'bog pa dang / kha ton myi byed
351b7('bum): cing tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'dis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / 
351b8('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol da tu phyind pas gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyird pas gzhan la phan myi
352a1('bum): myi ngos pa dang / 'angs byas stong panyi sa gastan pas kyi 'ongs pa dang / dus sa bya stong pa nyid kyis gdun sa pa m+b+hi ngogs pa dang / ma' sa 'das
352a2('bum): pa nyid kyis gagangal bar myi dogs pa dag thogs dang la myed pa stong pa nyid g+hazhan la phar myi 'dogs pa dang / dor bskyed ba stong pa nyid kyis gzhanas lan myi 'dobs pa dang rang bzhi
352a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'jogs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / 
352a4('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / dngos
352a5('bum): bskyed pa'i ngo banyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhanas pan myi 'dogs pa dang / dran panye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis bzhams pan myi 'dogs pa dag / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis gnanas pa gyi jogs ste/ 
352a6('bum): rdzu gyul gyi zhing pa nam gyis gzhan la par kyi dogs pa dang / dbang ponas kyis gzhan la ngan gyi 'dogs pa dang / stobs rnams kyis gzhan sa lar gyi 'dogs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan la galas
352b1('bum): kyis gzhan pas gyi dogs pa dang ga/ 'bags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas gzhan la ngan myi 'dogs pa dang 'phags pa'i bden rnams kyis gzhan la b.ran myi 'dogs pa dang / khangam ga sa
352b2('bum): rnams kyis gzhan la par myi dogs pa dag yar myed pa rnams kyis gzhan la phar myi 'dogs pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis gzhan la paran gyi 'dogs pa dang / 
352b3('bum): rnam par tharang ba brgyad kyis gdamag par myi 'dogs pa dang / mthar kyis gzhan pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la
352b4('bum): myi 'dogs pa dang / mtshan ma myed pas gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / smon pa myed pas gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / mdo ngan par shes pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / 
352b5('bum): ting nge 'dzind rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang // gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / de bzhin gshes pa'i stobs bcus gzhan la phan myi
352b6('bum): 'dogs pa dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhis gzhan la phan myi 'dog sa pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / byams pa chen pos gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / 
352b7('bum): ti rje chen pos gtan la la myi 'dogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa po brgyad kyis gzhan la pan myi 'dogs pa dang / rgyun bzhugs pa'i bras dus gzhan pas kyi dogs pa dang / 
352b8('bum): 'i gyi ba'i thas nal pa lci ngongs pa dang / phyi myong ba'i las dus ma la kyi dgas pa dang / dgra po da kyis ga sa gyi dos
353a1('bum): gaka rang byang chub kyi'i zhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / las rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis gzhan la phani myi 'dogs pa dang / 
353a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang 'thun par myi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang 'thun par myi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang 'thun par myi spyod/ bzod pani pha rol daH
353a3('bum): phyind pa dang 'thun par myi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'dun par myi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun par myi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid dang 'thun par myi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid dang / 
353a4('bum): 'thun par myi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang 'thun par myi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang 'thun par myi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid dang 'thun par myi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dang 'thun par myi spyod/ 'dus
353a5('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang 'thun par myi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang 'thun par myi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang 'thun par gyi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang 'thun par myi spyod/ 
353a6('bum): bskyed pa stong rang na par ni spyod/ rang bya stong pad dang lung par gyi spyod/ ngos thams pad stong panyid dang phun pa sbyong rang stong banyid dang yun pa kyi spyong // 
353a7('bum): sa nga pa dang lda pa tu byed/ sa nga dang ldan pa nga/ sto dang ldan pa stong/ 
353b1('bum): 'thun par myi spyod/ sobs rnams dang 'thun par gyi skyong / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang 'thun pal gyi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'thun par gyi spyong // b.lags pa'i bden
353b2('bum): brnams dang 'thun par gyi spyod pa bsam gtan rnams dang 'thun par gyi spyod/ chad myed pa rnams dang 'thun par myi spyod/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang 'thun par myi spyod/ rnam par
353b3('bum): thard pa brgyad dang 'thun par myi spyod/ mthar kyis gzhan pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang 'thun par myi spyod// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang
353b4('bum): 'thun par myi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang 'thun paramyi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang 'thun par myi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang 'thun par myi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs par
353b5('bum): stobs bcu dang 'thun par myi spyod/ myi 'jigs bzhi dang 'thun par myi spyod// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang 'thun par myi spyod// snying rje chen po dang
353b6('bum): 'thun par myi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang 'thun par myi spyod// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'thun par myi spyod lan cig phyir 'ong ba
353b7('bum): 'bras bu dang 'thun gyur gyi spyod byed myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'thun par ma spyod/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'thun par gyi spyod// rang byang chub dang 'thun par myi spyong lam gyi rnam
353b8('bum): ba nyid dang 'thun par myi spyod/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang 'thun par myi spyod na// de ni gnas gnyis dang / sa gnyis po las sa gcig la gnas par 'gyur te da ni
354a1('bum): 'di lta nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis sprin gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
354a2('bum): phyinang pa zab mo 'di ma bris nam bstand/ kha ton du ma byas/ tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'das kyang pha rol la phan ma btags/ byang chub sems dpa'i
354a3('bum): theg pa pa 'a rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di dang 'thun par ma spyad pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am
354a4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo des gnas gnyis dang / sa gnyis po de las gcig la gnas par 'gyur rlog par bya'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa
354a5('bum): ri na/ rab 'byor myi de dag ni rgya mtshochen po'i pha rol kyi 'gram du ma phyind par dus byed par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor myi gang rgya mtsho'i dbus sa gru rtog pa'itshig shing ngam ga gang du
354a6('bum): lag ging leb pag/ rgyal ba 'ang/ rol 'du nyid 'ayid pa de dag 'i kyi mtsho dus byed par kyi gyur te/ ga ma sa byed par rdza son ponas pa yod kyi tsham du phyin ma/ 
354b1('bum): mnyes ma nyams par thang la phyin par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dad patsam dang / dga' ba ma dang / mos pa tsam dang lda
354b2('bum): ba gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di myi 'dri myi stond/ kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi 'dri myi ston
354b3('bum): kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi 'dri myi ston / kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang
354b4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi
354b5('bum): byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang nu/ sbyind pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi 'dri myi stond/ kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten
354b6('bum): nang stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi stond/ kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi stond/ kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed
354b7('bum): cing myi rtend pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byeng tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi stonang/ kha ton du myi byed
354b8('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi sto nad/ kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'dri myi ston
355a1('bum): kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed ci'i myi rten pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi sonod te/ kha ton du gyi byang tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi nad pa dang / 
355a2('bum): 'dus ma byas stong bakhyod kyi dri gyi stod/ khaton dumi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing gyi nad pa dang / mtha' la grangs pasong pa nyid 'dri na pa
355a3('bum): myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi nad pa dang thob ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid mi 'dri myi stonod kha ton du myi byang tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi nang pa dang
355a4('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston kha ton mang du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston kha tom du
355a5('bum): myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi stond ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten dpa / 
355a6('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'drim ston/ kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid 'gyi byed cing myi nad pa dang / kyi gas pa stong pa nyid myi 'dzi myi stond kha ton du kyi
355a7('bum): byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi ta nang pa dang / dngos po myong ba stong pa nyid kyis dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / ngo bo
355a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyi dri gyi ston kha ton du mi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi nad pa dang / dngos po myong ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi stonong kha ton du mi byed tshul
355b1('bum): bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myi 'dri myi ston da kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi te nad pa dang yang dag par
355b2('bum): spong rnams kyi dri myi stond bton du mi byed chul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi nang pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myi 'dri ma stong ton du mi zad nal
355b3('bum): bzhin du yid la myi byi cing myi rtend pa dang dbang po rnams myi 'dri myi stonakha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi nad pa dang stobs rnams myi 'dri/ 
355b4('bum): myi gonang kha ton du myi byeng tshul bzhin du yid la da myi byed cing myi rend pa dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnam das myi 'dri myi stonang kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin
355b5('bum): du ladi la myi byed cing myi yi nad pa dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi 'dri myi ston da kha ton du mr-i byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten dpa
355b6('bum): dang 'phags pa'i bden parnams kyi ng+gA snod khaton du mi byed tshul ba 'i du mings myi byed cing mi nadu pa dang bsam gtanarnams kyi rgya ston
355b7('bum): kyid tshul ba du ngas byed myi da pa byed du ma d+hIHspyod/ shA kyi cing rgyal bzhin du ying mgyis n+d+he du ba dang / 
355b8('bum): mthug ba byed pa'i stongs par 'jus pa nams rgya 'di gyi ma / la ma du sa bying rgyal bzhi la byed pang kyi 'ang pa dang / rnam pams gas kyi
356a1('bum): brtsod myi byed tshul ba mi du meng la ma gyi mi gyi nang pa dang / mdzad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa sa myungang gyi ston ma dun byed smra
356a2('bum): la ma kyi meng pa dang rnam par thad pa'i ste steng pa'i dang ma ma med pa dang snod brgyad pa rgya 'di na sod kyi byed tshul
356a3('bum): du yid la myi byed cing myi nang pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams myi dri myi ston kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi dad pa dang / ting nge 'dzid rnams kyi
356a4('bum): rgya stonang kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi nad pa dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi 'dri myi so dang kha ton du myi byeng tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed/ 
356a5('bum): cing myi rtend pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myi 'dri myi ston kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang rmyi
356a6('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi bye cing myi rtend pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi myi 'dri myi stond kha ton du
356a7('bum): myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi nyend pa dang / byams pa chen po myi 'dra myi stond kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang snying rje
356a8('bum): na kyi tsu so/ kha mo kyi myi rgyal pa mi du 'ang 'akyi gyi myi nad pa dang / sa rgyas kyi tshos sa 'dres pa ci rgyad kyi 'di myi yong/ na kyi gying
356b1('bum): rdul bzhin yid la myi byed cing myi rtonod pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid myi 'dri myi gsod/ kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi nad pa dang / lam gyi
356b2('bum): rnam bshes pa cid myi 'dri myi stonod kha ton du ma byeng tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi sred pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid myi 'dri myi stond kha con durtsa
356b3('bum): byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa de dag ni bar ma dor byang chub las nyams par gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
356b4('bum): rgyas kyi sa mngon du byed par 'gyur ro// rab 'byo rang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs
356b5('bum): par 'chang rgya ba'i don tu dad pa yod cing bzod pa nga mos pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa dang dga' ba da nga spro ba dang myi gtong ba yod cing
356b6('bum): brtson 'grus myi 'dor ba de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri'o lung 'bog go/ kha ton du byed do/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed do/ 
356b7('bum): rtend par byed do/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dad pa yod de bzod pa yod mos pa yod/ lhag
356b8('bum): ba'i bsam pa yod dga' ba yod spro ba yodamyi gtong ba yod brtson 'grus myi 'dor ba yod pa yin te/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pas
356'a1('bum): dang yod pa da yos su ya dang myed pa logs nas
356'a2('bum): bzung ba dang / nang stong panyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rtsi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / song ba nyid
356'a3('bum): panyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chen po stong pa da kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dus byas stong pa nyid/ 
356'a4('bum): sa yongs su srung ba dang / 'dus ma byas kyi sa s+ya sma dang / su 'das da kyis sos su byung ba / 
356'a5('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chos thams cad
356'a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po myed pa
356'a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su gzung ba dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang
356'b1('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pas yongs su bzung ba dang / yang dag par spong bas yongs su bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas yongs su bzung ba dang / dbang pos yongs su
356'b2('bum): bzung ba dang / stobs kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pas yongs su bzung ba dang / 
356'b3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pas yongs su bzung ba dang / bsam gtan gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / tshad myed pas yongs su bzung ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas
356'b4('bum): yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang // mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par thar
356'b5('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pas yongs su bzung ba dang / mngon par shes pas yongs su bzung ba dang / 
356'b6('bum): nge 'dzind kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / gzungs kyi sgos slongs su bzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su gzung ba dang m-i bu jigs pa
356'b7('bum): banyis yongs su 'azung ba dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su 'azung ba dang / byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang / stong rje chen po'i yongs su
356'b8('bum): 'byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco tsun gyis yongs su 'azung ba / thams cadags pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / las tsa rnam pa
357a1('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas par mdor nyi zho myong bar nyan thos kyi sa las 'das ka zang sangs rgyas kyis las
357a2('bum): 'das te sems can yongs su smyin par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byorang
357a3('bum): 'di lta ste/ dper na bud myed dam skyes pa la la zhig bum pa ma bsregs gang so ma btang bas chu bcu par sems na/ rab 'byor dbum pa de ni ring por myi gnas te myur du 'gyes shing 'jig par
357a4('bum): rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na de ni bum pa de so ma btang dba'i phyir te de ni tha mar sa nyid du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor dade de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
357a5('bum): gyi bu mo dag la'ang blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang ba cu mngon par rdzogs par bcang rgya ba'i phyi dad payang sod/ yod pa'ang song mos pa'ang sod// lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod dag
357a6('bum): me sgo nga song kyi spyong payang thong sa grus ma 'dod pasang yod / mod kyi de dag gis rab kyi sad tu phyin pas yongs sum bzung / thabs mkhas pas songs sum bzung / bsam gan
357a7('bum): ba rol ngas phyir pas yongs su ma lung / so 'grus kyi ros sa byed pas yongs sum 'thung ba yod pa'i b.rod tsa nyid pas songs sum zung / tshul khrims kyi 'oso pa byed pas songs su
357a8('bum): nga tsun pa'i das phyi pas sol su ma lu ma nga kyid rgyas yos pas lung khri song bab kyis sems sa nga rgya spong bathaMd kyis sems sa pa
